GK16andhvc3u:1: tṛtīya uddyotaḥ - - - evaṃ vyaṅgyamukhenaiva dhvaneḥ pradarśite saprabhede svarūpe
GK16andhvc3u:2: punarvyañjakamukhenaitatprakāśyate--- locanam tṛtīya uddyotaḥ smarāmi smarasaṃhāralīlāpāṭavaśālinaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:11: vivakṣitānyaparo vācya iti vyaṅgyārthapravaṇa evocyate ityevaṃ mūlabhedayoreva yathāsvamavāntarabhedasahitayorvyañjakarūpo
GK16andhvc3u:12: bālapriyā atha tṛtīyodyotaṭippaṇī prārabhyate athāhaṃ prauḍhamudyotaṃ tṛtīyañca yathāmati /
GK16andhvc3u:17: śambhoḥ dehārdhaṃ prasahya harantīmityanena parameśvaryāḥ tathāvidhāt parameśvarādapyatiśayitaṃ pāṭavaṃ dyotyate /
GK16andhvc3u:20: tasya saṅgāta dvitīyoyotena saha prasaṅgarūpāṃ saṅgatimityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:49: avivakṣitavācyasyātyantatiraskṛtavācye prabhede padaprakāśatā yathā maharṣervyāsasya---'saptaitāḥ samidhaḥ śriyaḥ',
GK16andhvc3u:50: yathā vā kālidāsasya---'kaḥ sannaddhe virahavidhurāṃ tvayyupekṣeta jāyām',
GK16andhvc3u:51: yathā vā--'kimiva hi madhurāṇāṃ maṇḍanaṃ nākṛtīnām',
GK16andhvc3u:52: eteṣūdāharaṇeṣu 'samidha' iti sannaddha' iti 'madhurāṇā'miti ca padāni vyañjakatvābhiprāyeṇaiva kṛtāni /
GK16andhvc3u:55: kiṃ ca yadyapyartho vyañjakastathāpi vyaṅgyatāyogyo 'pyasau bhavatīti,
GK16andhvc3u:56: śabdastu na kadācidyvaṅgyaḥ api tu vyañjaka eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:58: na ca vācyasyāvivakṣitādirūpeṇa yo bhedastatra sarvathaiva na na prakāśitaḥ kintu prakāśito 'pyadhunā punaḥ śuddhavyañjakamukhena /
GK16andhvc3u:59: tathāhi vyaṅgyamukhaprekṣitayā vinā padaṃ vākyaṃ varṇāḥ padabhāgaḥ saṅghaṭanā mahāvākyamiti svarūpata eva v.yañjakānāṃ bhedaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:60: na caiṣāmarthavatkadācidapi vyaṅgyatā sambhavatīti vyañjakaikaniyataṃ svarūpaṃ yattanmukhena bhedaḥ prakāśyata iti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:62: sa evaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ---etattāvatrribhedatvaṃ na kārikākāreṇa kṛtam /
GK16andhvc3u:64: na cedānīṃ vṛttikārobhedaprakaṭanaṃ karoti bālapriyā pradarśita ityukterabhiprāyāntarañcāstītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:73: nanvevaṃ punarvyañjakamukhenetyatra punaśaśbdo 'nupapanna ityatastātparyaṃ vivṛṇoti---na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:77: 'vyañjakamukhatvam' iti pāṭhe vācyasyetyādeḥ vācyasambandhiyadavivakṣitādirūpaṃ avivakṣitatvādikantena hetunā yo bhedaḥ dhvaneravāntarabhedaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:87: locanam tataścedaṃ kṛtamidaṃ kriyata iti kartṛbhede kā saṅgatiḥ?
GK16andhvc3u:89: avivakṣitavācyādīnāmapi prakārāṇāṃ darśitatvādityalaṃ nijapūjyajanasagotraiḥ sākaṃ vivādena /
GK16andhvc3u:91: tenāvivakṣitavācyo dviprabhedo 'pi pratyekaṃ padavākyaprakāśa iti dvidhā /
GK16andhvc3u:92: tadanyasya vivakṣitābhidheyasya sambandhī yo bhedaḥ kramadyotyo nāma svabhedasahitaḥ so 'pi pratyekaṃ dvidhaiva /
GK16andhvc3u:93: anuraṇanena rūpaṃ rūpaṇasādṛśyaṃ yasya tādṛgvyaṅgyaṃ yattasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:95: atha ca rāmāyaṇamahābhārata prabhṛtini lakṣye dṛśyata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:96: dhṛtiḥ kṣamā dayā śaucaṃ kāruṇyaṃ vāganiṣṭhurā /
GK16andhvc3u:100: samicchabdena ca vyaṅgyo 'rtho 'nanyāpekṣalakṣmyuddīpanakṣamatvaṃ saptānāṃ vakrabhipretaṃ dhvanitam /
GK16andhvc3u:103: atra ca vācyasyātyantatiraskāraḥ pūrvoktamanusṛtya bālapriyā svarūpamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:106: ityasya kartṛbhede sati saṅgatatvaṃ na sambhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:107: 'vyaṅgyamukhena pradarśite punarvyañjakamukhenaitatprakāśyata' ityanena pradarśanaprakāśanayorekakartṛkatvaṃ svarasataḥ pratīyate,
GK16andhvc3u:127: 'śabdena ce'tyanantaraṃ tasyaivārthāntarasaṅkramitavācye yathā---'rāmeṇa priyajīvitena tu kṛtaṃ locanam yojanīyaḥ kiṃ punaruktena /
GK16andhvc3u:129: tathaiva madhuraśabdena sarvaviṣayarañjakatvatarpakatvādikaṃ lakṣayatā sātiśayāmilāṣaviṣayatvaṃ nātrāścaryamiti vakrabhipretaṃ dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:132: 'pratyākhyānaruṣaḥ kṛtaṃ samucitaṃ krūreṇa te rakṣasā soḍhaṃ tacca tathā tvayā kulajano dhatte yathoccaiḥ śiraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:133: vyartha samprati bibhratā dhanuridaṃ tvadyvāpadaḥ sākṣiṇā' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:134: rakṣaḥsvabhāvādeva yaḥ krūro 'natilaṅghyaśāsanatvadurmadatayā ca prasahya nirākriyamāṇaḥ kodhāndhaḥ tasyaitattāvatsvacittavṛttisamucitamanuṣṭhānaṃ yanmūrdhakartanaṃ nāma,
GK16andhvc3u:135: mānyo 'pi bālapriyā vyaṅgyo 'rtha iti pāṭho dṛśyate tatsatve dhvanitamityasya bodhitamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:151: anatilaṅdhyaṃ śāsanaṃ yasya tatvena yā durmadatā ahamanatilaṅdhyaśāsana iti durabhimānaḥ tayeti krodhāndhatve hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:157: taiti yathā tādṛgapi tayā na gaṇitastasyāstavetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:159: yathā yena prakāreṇa kulajana iti yaḥ kaścitpāmaraprāyo 'pi kulavadhūśabdavācyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:160: uccaiḥ śiro dhattai evaṃvidhāḥ kila vayaṃ kulavadhvo bhavāma iti /
GK16andhvc3u:161: atha ca śilaḥkartanāvasare tvayā śīghraṃ kṛtyatāmiti tathā soḍhaṃ tathoccaiḥ śiro dhṛtaṃ yathānyo 'pi kulastrījana uccaiḥ śiro dhatte netyapravṛttatayā
GK16andhvc3u:162: evaṃ rāvaṇasya tava ca samucitakāritvaṃ nirvyūḍham /
GK16andhvc3u:173: priyaśabdasya pravṛttinimittaṃ yatpremanāma tadapyanaucityakalaṅkitamiti bālapriyā rāvaṇena hi śrīrāmasya purato māyāsītāśiraśchedaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:189: uccaiśiśaro dhatta iti prārthanāpratyākhyānena krodhāndhe kasmiṃścit kāmini śiraḥkartanāyodyukte sati śira unnataṃ karotītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:206: emea jaṇo tissā deu kavolopamāi sasibimbam /
GK16andhvc3u:207: paramatthaviāre uṇa cando cando via varāo //
GK16andhvc3u:209: avivakṣitavācyasyātyantatiraskṛtavācye prabhede vākyaprakāśatā yathā---- yā niśā sarvabhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī /
GK16andhvc3u:210: yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:219: pratyuta tadadhikavastukartavyaṃ tato dūranikṛṣṭaṃ śaśibimbaṃ kalaṅkavyājajihmīkṛtam /
GK16andhvc3u:221: tathāpi yadi parīkṣakāḥ parīkṣante tadvarākaḥ kṛpaikabhājanaṃ yaścandra iti prasiddhaḥ sa candra eva kṣayitvavilāsaśūnyatvamalinatvadharmāntarasaṃkrānto yo 'rthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:224: evaṃ prathamabhedasya dvāvapi prakārau padaprakāśakatvenodāhṛtya vākyaprakāśakatvenodāharati---yā niśeti /
GK16andhvc3u:226: tena hyuktena na kaścidupadeśyaṃ pratyupadeśaḥ siddhyati /
GK16andhvc3u:238: kalaṅkavyājo yaḥ śaśaḥ tena jihmīkṛtaṃ malinīkṛtam /
GK16andhvc3u:240: dvitīyacandrapadasya candrapadavācyatvena guṇaśūnyatvena vā rūpeṇa lakṣaṇātra bodhyā /
GK16andhvc3u:250: anena hi vākyena niśārtho na ca jāgaraṇārthaḥ kaścidvivakṣitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:251: kiṃ tarhi? tattvajñānāvahitatvamatattvaparāṅmukhatvaṃ ca muneḥ pratipādyata iti tiraskṛtavācyasyāsya vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:252: tasyaivārthāntarasaṅkramitavācyasya vākyaprakāśatā yathā--- visamaio kāṇa vi kāṇa vi vālei abhiaṇimmāo /
GK16andhvc3u:253: kāṇa vi visāmiamao kāṇa vi avisāmao kālo //
GK16andhvc3u:256: iti chāyā ) locanam niśāyāṃ jāgaratavyamanyatra rātrivadāsitavyamiti kimanenoktena /
GK16andhvc3u:257: tasmādbādhitasvārthametadvākyaṃ saṃyamino lokottaratālakṣaṇena nimittena tatvadṛṣṭāvavadhānaṃ mithyādṛṣṭo ca parāṅmukhatvaṃ dhvanati /
GK16andhvc3u:258: sarvaśabdārthasya cāpekṣikatayāpyupapadyamānateti na sarvaśabdārtānyathānupapatyāyāmartha ākṣipto mantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:259: sarvoṣāṃ brahmādisthāvarāntānāṃ caturdaśānāmapi bhūtānāṃ yā niśā vyāmohajananītattvadṛṣṭiḥ tasyāṃ saṃyamī jāgarti kathaṃ prāpyeteti /
GK16andhvc3u:273: nanvatra nidrākālarūpaniśāpadārthe sarvabhūtasambandhānvaye sarvapadārthaghaṭakatayā saṃyamino 'pi tadanvayaḥ prāptaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:274: sa ca jāgartītyetadarthānvayino 'nupapannastasmādanenoktavyaṅgyasyāviṣkṛtatvānna dhvanitvamiti śaṅkāṃ pariharati---sarvaśabdārthasyetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:289: locanam na tu viṣayavarjanamātrādeva saṃyamīti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:290: yadi vā sarvabhūtaniśāyāṃ mohinyāṃ jāgarti kathamiyaṃ heyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:291: yasyāṃ tu mithyādṛṣṭau sarvāṇi bhūtāni jāgrati atiśayena suprabuddharūpāṇi sā tasya rātriraprabodhaviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:295: anyastu na paśyata na ca manyata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:297: evaṃ ca paśyata ityapi munerityapi ca na svārthamātravibhrāntam /
GK16andhvc3u:299: yattacchabdayośca na svatantrārthateti sarva evāyamākhyātasahāyaḥ padasamūho vyaṅgyaparaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:307: keṣāmapi mūḍhaprāyāṇāṃ dhārāprāptayogabhūmikārūḍhānāṃ vā aviṣābhṛtamayaḥ kālo 'tikrāmatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:312: na ca te sādhane sarvathā bālapriyā iyaṃ kathaṃ prāpyeteti matyā tatprāptyupāyamanutiṣṭhatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:327: atra paśyatītyetaccaritārthabahiṣkaraṇavṛttitvena manyata ityetaccaritārthāntaḥkaraṇavṛttitvena ca rūpeṇa lakṣakamityāha---tasyaivetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:349: tanmātraviśrāntena atra hi vākye viṣāmṛtaśabdābhyāṃ duḥkhasukharūpasaṅkramitavācyābhyāṃ vyavahāra ityarthāntarasaṅkramitavācyasyā vyañjakatvam
GK16andhvc3u:350: vivakṣitābhidheyasyānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyasya śabdaśaktyudbhave prabhede padaprakāśatā yathā--- locanam na vivakṣite /
GK16andhvc3u:358: evaṃ kārikāprathamārdhalakṣitāṃścaturaḥ prakārānudāhṛtya dvitīyakārikārdhasvīkṛtān ṣaḍanyān prakārān krameṇodāharati--vivakṣitābhidheyasyetyādinā
GK16andhvc3u:360: dhanairiti bahuvacanaṃ yo yenārthī tasya teneti sūcanārtham /
GK16andhvc3u:371: na ca na vivakṣite vivakṣite eva /
GK16andhvc3u:375: 'viṣaṃnimbamamṛtaṃ kapittham' ityādau nirūḍhalakṣaṇayā duḥkhasādhanaṃ nimbaṃ sukhasādhanaṃ kapitthamityevārthe vivakṣitaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:376: prakṛte tu kālaḥ keṣāñcidduḥkhamayaḥ keṣāñcitsukhamayaścātikrāmatītyarthasya vivakṣitatayā
GK16andhvc3u:377: viṣapadasya kiñcitsādhanakaduḥkhe amṛtapadasya kiñcitsādhanakasukhe ca lakṣaṇā duḥkhasukhayorviśeṣo vyaṅgyaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:380: ajñātaviśeṣadharmāvacchinnavācakasya keṣāmapīti śabdasya ca duṣkṛtināmityādyuktārthaviśeṣe saṅkrāntirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:389: dhanairarthijanasya vāñchāṃ prātuṃ daivena na sṛṣṭo yadi nāmetyabhyupagame /
GK16andhvc3u:391: jaḍo 'haṃ pathi prasannāmbudharastaṭākaḥ athavā kūpaḥ kiṃ kasmāt /
GK16andhvc3u:400: 'asmi na sṛṣṭa' prātuṃ dhanairarthijanasya vāñchāṃ daivena sṛṣṭo yadi nāma nāsmi /
GK16andhvc3u:401: pathi prasannāmbudharastaḍāgaḥ kūpo 'thavā kiṃ na jaḍaḥ kṛto 'ham // 1 //
GK16andhvc3u:402: atra hi jaḍa iti padaṃ nirviṇṇena vakrātmasamānādhikaraṇatayā prayuktamanuraṇanarūpatayā kūpasamānādhikaraṇatāṃ svaśaktyā pratipadyate /
GK16andhvc3u:403: tasyaiva vākyaprakāśatā yatā harṣacarite siṃhanādavākyeṣu--'vṛtte 'sminmahāpralaye dharaṇīdhāraṇāyādhunā tvaṃ śeṣaḥ' /
GK16andhvc3u:406: anyo hi tāvadavaśyaṃ kaścitsṛṣṭo na tvahamiti nirvedaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:412: atha ca kūpo jaḍo 'rthitā kasya kīdṛśītyasambhavadviveka iti /
GK16andhvc3u:418: mahasya utsavasya āsamantātpralayo yatra tādṛśi śokakāraṇabhūte vṛtte dharaṇyā rājyadhurāyā dhāraṇāyāśvāsanāya tvaṃ śeṣaḥ śiṣyamāṇaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:419: itīyatā pūrṇe vākyārthe kalpāvasāne bhūpīṭhabhārodvahanakṣam eko bālapriyā ityanena gamyamarthamāha--anyo hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:432: vṛttau 'kūpasamānādhikaraṇatāṃ pratipadyata' ityanena jaḍapadasya kūpapadasāmānādhikaraṇyamevoktanna tu taṭākapadasāmānādhikaraṇyamapi,
GK16andhvc3u:448: atra hyasamarpitamapi kusumaśareṇa madhumāsalakṣmyā mukhaṃ gṛhītamityasamarpitamapītyetadavasthābhidhāyipadamarthaśaktyā kusumaśarasya balātkāraṃ prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:449: atraiva prabhede vākyaprakāśatā yathodāhṛtaṃ prāk 'sajjehi surahimāso' ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:450: atra sajjayati surabhimāso na tāvadarpayatyanaṅgāya śarānityayaṃ vākyārthaḥ kaviprauḍhoktimātraniṣpannaśarīro manmathonmāthakadanāvasthāṃ vasantasamayasya sūcayati /
GK16andhvc3u:453: mahārghaṇa utsavaprasareṇa manoharasurasya manmathadevasya āmodaścamatkāro yatra tat /
GK16andhvc3u:462: 'prauḍhoktimātraniṣpannaśarīraḥ sambhavī svataḥ' iti prācyakārikāyā iyataivodāhṛtatvaṃ bhavedityabhiprāyeṇa /
GK16andhvc3u:463: tatra padaprakāśatā yathā--- satyaṃ manoramāḥ kāmāḥ satyaṃ ramyā vibhūtayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:467: śeṣa' ityasya nāgarāja iti ca vivaraṇam /
GK16andhvc3u:480: vāṇiaa hattidantā kutto ahyāṇa bādhakittī a /
GK16andhvc3u:482: atra lulitālakamukhītyetatpadaṃ vyādhavadhvāḥ svataḥsambhāvitaśarīrārthaśaktyā suratakrīḍāsaktiṃ sūcayaṃstadīyasya bhartuḥ satatasambhogakṣāmatāṃ prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:483: locanam ityatra kavinā yo virāgī vaktā nibaddhastatprauḍhoktyā jīvitaśabdo 'rthaśaktimūlatayedaṃ dhvanayati---sarva evāmī kāmā vibhūtayaśca
GK16andhvc3u:485: tadeva ca jīvitaṃ prāṇadhāraṇarūpatvātprāṇavṛtteśca cāñcalyādanāsthāpadamiti viṣayeṣu varākeṣu kiṃ doṣoddhoṣaṇadaurjanyena nijameva jīvitamupālabhyam,
GK16andhvc3u:486: tadapi ca nisargacañcalamiti na sāparādhamityetāvatā gāḍhaṃ vairāgyamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:492: atra luliteti savarūpamātreṇa viśeṣaṇamavaliptatayā cahastidantādyapāharaṇaṃ sambhāvyamiti vākyārthasya tāvatyeva na kācidanupapattiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:493: bālapriyā kāmāḥ kāmyamānā vanitādayaḥ tadabhāve jīvitābhāve /
GK16andhvc3u:506: lulitāḥ itastato vikīrṇā alakā yatra tathāvidhaṃ mukhaṃ yasyāssā /
GK16andhvc3u:511: svatassambhāvitaṃ loke 'pyaucityātsambhāvyamānaṃ śarīraṃ ysaya tathāvidhasyārthasya śaktyā sāmarthyenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:525: anenāpi vākyena vyādhavadhvā śikhipicchakarṇapūrāyā navapariṇītāyāḥ kasyāścitsaubhāgyātiśayaḥ prakāśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:526: tatsambhogaikaratho mayūramātramāraṇasamarthaḥ patirjātaṃ ityarthaprakāśanāt tadanyāsāṃ cirapariṇītānāṃ muktāphalaracitaprasādhanānāṃ daurbhāgyātiśayaḥ khyāpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:527: tatsambhogakāle sa eva vyādhaḥ karivaravadhavyāpārasamartha āsīdityarthaprakāśanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:528: nanu dhvaniḥ kāvyaviśeṣa ityuktaṃ katkathaṃ tasya padaprakāśatā /
GK16andhvc3u:539: avācakatvāditi yaduktaṃ so 'yamaprayojako heturiti chalena tāvaddarśayati--syādeṣa doṣa iti /
GK16andhvc3u:540: evaṃ chalena parihṛtya bālapriyā hastidantāderapāharaṇamanāharaṇaṃ dantādyanāharaṇamiti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:545: 'avavakṣitavācyasye'tyādikārikāyāṃ samudāyasyaiva dhvanipadārthavādatra pakṣa eva codyasyopapatteśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:563: smṛtāste tvākāṅgakṣādasahakṛtā vākyārthamanubhāvayantīti mate padasmāritatvarūpaṃ padaprakāśatvaṃ tattadartha eva vartate /
GK16andhvc3u:564: tatra ca kāvyaviśeṣatvarūpaṃ dhvanitvannāstītyato dhvaneḥ na padaprakāśatvaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:566: anena granthena padanna dhvaniprakāśakamavācakatvādityarthaḥ phalita ityabhipretya 'syādeṣadoṣa' ityādisamādhānagranthamavatārayati locane---avācakatvādityādi
GK16andhvc3u:570: kiṃ ca kāvyānāṃ śarīrāṇāmiva saṃsthānavaśeṣāvacchinnasamudāyasādhyāpi cārutvapratītiranvayavyatirekābhyāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:571: bhāgeṣu kalpyata iti padānāmapi vyañjakatvamukhena vyavasthito dhvanivyavahāro na virodhi /
GK16andhvc3u:573: yadi paro brūyāt---na mayā avācakatvaṃ dhvanyabhāve hetūkṛtaṃ kiṃ tūktaṃ kāvyaṃ dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:574: kāvyaṃ cānākāṅkṣapratipattikāri vākyaṃ na padamiti tatrāha--satyamevaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:577: tathā ca padaprakāśo dhvaniriti prakāśapadenoktam. nanu padasya tatra tathāvithaṃ sāmarthyamiti kuto 'khaṇḍa eva pratītikrama ityāśaṅkyāha--kāvyānāmiti
GK16andhvc3u:579: nanu bhāgeṣu padarūpeṣu kathaṃ sā cārutvapratītirāropayituṃ śakyā?
GK16andhvc3u:581: tataḥ kim? manohārivyaṅgyārthasmārakatvāddhi cārutvapratītinibandhanatvaṃ kena bālapriyā asādhaka ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:586: nanu vastuvṛttena parihāraḥ kimartha ityataḥ kāvyānāmityādigranthamavatārayiṣyan bhūmikāmāha--yadi para ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:591: kāvyaviśeṣo dhvaniḥ kāvyañca tathāvidhaṃ vākyamiti vākyameva dhvaniḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:593: tathāca pade dhvanyabhāve avākyatvaṃ heturiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:611: saṃsthānaviśeṣaiḥ śabdasandarbhaviśeṣaiḥ mukhādyavayavasaṃyogaviśeṣaiśca avacchinno viśiṣṭo yassamudāyastatsādhyāpītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:628: vākye saṅghaṭanāyāṃ ca sa prabandhe 'pi dīpyate // DhvK_3.2 //
GK16andhvc3u:630: vākye saṅghaṭanāyāṃ ca sa prabandhe 'pi dīpyate // 2 //
GK16andhvc3u:632: yathā śrutiduṣṭānāṃ pelavādipadānāmasabhyapelādyarthaṃ prati na vācakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:635: tacca śrutiduṣṭatvamanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ bhāgeṣu vyavasthāpyate tathā prakṛte 'pīti tadāha--aniṣṭasyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:639: evaṃ dṛṣṭāntamabhidhāya pādatrayeṇa turyeṇa dārṣṭāntikārtha uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:641: yata eva miṣṭasmṛtiścārutvamāvaiti tena hetunā sarveṣu prakāreṣu nirūpitasya padamātrāvabhāsino 'pi padaprakāśasyāpi dhvane ramyatāsti smārakatve 'pi padānāmiti samanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:664: virodhinaḥ syuḥ śṛṅgāre te na varṇā rasa-cyutaḥ // DhvK_3.3 //
GK16andhvc3u:665: ta eva tu niveśyante bībhatsādau rase yadā /
GK16andhvc3u:666: tadā taṃ dīpayanty eva te na varṇā rasa-cyutaḥ // DhvK_3.4 //
GK16andhvc3u:668: virodhinaḥ syuḥ śṛṅgāre tena varṇā rasacyutaḥ // 3 //
GK16andhvc3u:669: ta eva tu niveśyante bībhatsādau rase yadā /
GK16andhvc3u:670: tadā taṃ dīpayantyeva tena varṇā rasacyutaḥ // 4 //
GK16andhvc3u:681: yataste varṇā bhūyasā prayujyamānā na rasāṃścyotanti sravanti /
GK16andhvc3u:682: yadi vā tena śṛṅgāravirodhitvena hetunāvarṇāḥ śaṣādayo rasācchṛṅgārāccyavante taṃ na vyañjayantīti vyatireka uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:704: tallakṣaṇamuktaṃ bhaṭṭedbhaṭena---“śaṣābhyāṃ rephasaṃyogaiḥ ṭavargeṇa ca yojitā /
GK16andhvc3u:706: rasaścyuta iti pāṭhe te na iti padadvayamityāśayena vyācaṣṭe---te varṇā ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:710: rasacyuta iti pāṭhe tu tenetyekaṃ padamityāha--yadi vetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:712: rasāccyavanta ityasya taṃ na vyañjayantīti ca /
GK16andhvc3u:714: śaṣāvityādiślokena śakārādivarṇasatve śṛṅgārāvyaktyabhāvarūpo vyatarekaḥ pradarśita ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:717: 'ta eve'tyādikārikāyāścaturthapāde rasaścyuta iti pade cālakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya dyotanaṃ yathā--- utkampinī bhayaparaskhalitāṃśukāntā te locane pratidiśaṃ vidhure kṣipantī /
GK16andhvc3u:718: krūreṇa dāruṇatayā sahasaiva dagdhā dhūmāndhitena dahanena na vīkṣitāsi //
GK16andhvc3u:721: asminviṣaye śṛṅgāralakṣaṇe śaṣādiprayogaḥ sukavitvamabhivāñchatā na kartavya ityevaṃphalatvādupadeśasya kārakākāreṇa pūrvaṃ vyatireka uktaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:722: na ca sarvathā na kartavyo 'pi tu bībhatsādau kartavya eveti paścādanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:723: vṛttikāreṇa tvanvayapūrvako vyatireka iti śailīmanusartumanvayaḥ pūrvamupāttaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:726: tena varṇānāmapi śrutisamayopalakṣyamāṇārthānapekṣyapi śrotraikagrāhyo mṛduparuṣātmā bālapriyā pāṭhe tenetyekaṃ padaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:727: rasacyuta iti pāṭhe tu te neti tadadvayamiti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:729: ślokābhāyāmiti nirdeśe dvābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ pratapāditau yāvanvayavyatirekau tābhyāmityarthasya pratītyā yathāsaṅkhyamanvayasya prasaktirbhavatī,
GK16andhvc3u:730: ślokadvayeneti nirdeśe tu ślokātmakadvyavayavaghaṭitasamudāyena pratipāditau yāvanvayavyatirekau tābhyāmityarthasya pratītyā yathāsaṅkhyamanvayasya
GK16andhvc3u:731: ślekadvayeneti nirdeśe tu ślokātmakadvyavayavaghaṭitasamudāyena pratipāditau yāvanvayavyatirekau tābhyāmityarthasya pratītyāna tatprasaktiriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:738: śrutiḥ śravaṇaṃ yeṣāntaiḥ śabdaiḥ samarpyamāṇā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:744: atra hi te ityetatpadaṃ rasamayatvena sphuṭamevāvabhāsate sahṛdayānām /
GK16andhvc3u:745: padāvayavena dyotanaṃ yathā--- vriḍāyogānnatavadanayā sannadhāne gurūṇāṃ baddhotkampaṃ kucakalaśayormanyumantarnigṛhya /
GK16andhvc3u:747: ata eva ca sahakāratāmevābhidhātuṃ nimittasaptamī kṛtā varṇapadādiṣviti /
GK16andhvc3u:750: śrotraikagrāhyo 'pi ca svabhāvo rasaniṣyande vyāpriyata eva,
GK16andhvc3u:755: te vibhavādayo yadā viśiṣṭena kenāpi padenārpyamāmā rasacamatkāravidhāyino bhavanti tadā padasyaivāsau mahimā samarpyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:758: tatra ca śoko nāmeṣṭajanavināśaprabhava iti tasya janasya ye bhrūkṣepakaṭākṣaprabhṛtayaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:759: pūrvaṃ rativibhāvatāmavalambante sma ta evātyantavinaṣṭāḥ santa idānīṃ smṛtigocaratayā
GK16andhvc3u:793: tallocanagatatathāvidhaguṇagaṇaṃ buddhau kṛtvā rasāviṣṭena vaktrā te ityuktam,
GK16andhvc3u:794: sa evārthaḥ pratipattrāpi parāmṛśyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:796: yatra hyanuddiśyamānadharmāntarasāhityayogyadharmayogitvaṃ vastuno yacchabdenābhidhāya tadbuddhisthadharmāntarasāhityaṃ tacchabdena nirvācyate
GK16andhvc3u:803: te iti sātiśayavibhramaikāyatanarūpe apa locane vidhure kāndiśīkatayā nirlakṣe kṣipantī kastrātā kvāsāvāryaputra iti tayorlocanayostādṛśīcāvastheti sutarāṃ śokoddīpanam /
GK16andhvc3u:806: kiṃ kurutāṃ tathāpi ca dhūmenāndhīkṛto draṣṭumasamartha iti na tu savivekasyedṛśānucitakāritvaṃ sambhāvyate,
GK16andhvc3u:807: iti smaryamāṇaṃ tadīyaṃ saundaryamidānīṃ sātiśayaśokāveśavibhāvatāṃ prāptamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:812: yatra yo vidvān sa pūjya ityādau /
GK16andhvc3u:814: tathāvidhaṃ yaddharmāntaraṃ pūjyatvādikaṃ tatsāhityasya yogyaḥ prayojako yo dharmo vidvattvādiḥ tadyogitvaṃ tatsambandha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:817: tadbuddhisthañca yaddharmāntaraṃ viddhattvādakaṃ tasya sāhityaṃ sambandha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:853: te iti tiṣṭhetyuktaṃ kimiva na tayā yatsamutsṛjya bāṣpaṃ mathyāsaktaścakitahariṇīhārinetratribhāgaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:856: tatra śuddhasyodāharamaṃ yathā rāmābhyudaye---'kṛtakakupitaiḥ' ityādi locanam tribhāgaśabda iti /
GK16andhvc3u:857: gurujanamavadhīryāpi sā māṃ yatā tathāpi sābhilāṣamanyudainyagarvamantharaṃ vilokitavatītyevaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:861: varṇapadatadbhāgādiṣu satsvevālakṣyakramo vyaṅgyo nirbhāsamāno 'pi samastakāvyavyāpaka eva nirbhāsate,
GK16andhvc3u:864: vākyaṃ tu dhvaneralakṣyakramasya na nimittatāmātreṇa varṇādivadupakāri,
GK16andhvc3u:865: kiṃ tu samagravibhāvādapratipattivyāpṛtatvādrasādimayameva tannirbhāsata iti 'vākya' ityetatkārikāyāṃ bālapriyā padasyaivātra prādhānyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:866: vṛttau 'jhaṭiti kanake'tyādyudāharaṇāntaraṃ prakṣiptamata eva na vivṛtaṃ locane /
GK16andhvc3u:867: pravāsodyatamātmānaṃ gurujanasannidhāne dṛṣṭavatyāḥ prayāyā darśanaprakāraṃ kaścit syayaṃ parāmṛśati ;
GK16andhvc3u:870: kucakalaśayoḥ baddhaḥ kṛta utkampaḥ yena tam /
GK16andhvc3u:872: tvaṃ tiṣṭeti māṃ prati na uktaṃ kimiva, uktameva /
GK16andhvc3u:873: yadyataḥ tayā bāṣpaṃ samutsṛjya cakitahariṇova cakitahariṇīnetramiva hāri,
GK16andhvc3u:874: yadvā--cakitahariṇyā hāri yannetraṃ tasya tribhāgaḥ tṛtīyo bhāgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:900: etaddhi vākyaṃ parasparānurāgaṃ paripoṣaprāptaṃ pradarśayatsarvata eva paraṃ rasatattvaṃ prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:905: kṛtakakupitaibāṣpāmbhobhiḥ sadainyavilokitair- vanamapi gatā yasya prītyā dhṛtāpi tathāmbayā /
GK16andhvc3u:906: navajaladharaśyāmāḥ paśyandiśo bhavatīṃ vinā kaṭhinahṛdayo jīvatyeva priye sa tava priyaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:907: atra tathā taistaiḥ prakārairmātrā dhṛtāpītyanurāgaparavaśatvena guruvacanollaṅghanamapi tvayā kṛtamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:908: priye priya iti parasparajīvitasarvasvābhimānātmako ratisthāyibhāva uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:916: tadapi likhitaprakhyairaṅgaiḥ parasparamunmukhā nayananalinīnālānītaṃ pibanti rasaṃ priyāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:921: tadrūpo yo viṣayasya artho yasya tat /
GK16andhvc3u:942: gurupadenārthāntarañja atra hi rūpakeṇa yathoktavyañjakalakṣaṇānugatena prasādhito rasaḥ sutarāmabhivyajyate /
GK16andhvc3u:943: alakṣyakramavyaṅgyaḥ saṅghaṭanāyāṃ bhāsate dhvanirityuktaṃ tatra saṅghaṭanāsvarūpameva tāvannirūpyete---
GK16andhvc3u:950: smara eva navanadīpūraḥ prāvṛṣeṇyapravāhaḥ sarabhasameva pravṛddhatvāt tenoḍhāḥ parasparasāṃmukhyamabuddhipūrvameva nītāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:953: ata ca guravo 'laṅdhyāḥ setavastaiḥ vidhṛtāḥ pratihatecchāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:958: nanu nātra rūpakaṃ nirvayūḍhaṃ haṃsacakravākādirūpeṇa nāyakayugalasyārūpitatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:979: parasparābhilāṣātmakānāṃ parasparābhilāṣaṃ prakāśayantīnāṃ dṛṣṭicchaṭānāṃ yo miśrīkārastasya yuktyā yojanayetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:990: guṇān āśritya tiṣṭhantī mādhuryādīn vyanakti sā /
GK16andhvc3u:993: rasān--- sā saṅghaṭanā rasādīn vyanakti guṇānāśritya tiṣṭhantīti /
GK16andhvc3u:994: atra ca vikalpyaṃ guṇānāṃ saṅghaṭanāyāścaikyaṃ vyatireko vā /
GK16andhvc3u:999: saṅghaṭanā locanam kārikāyāṃ dvitīyārdhasyādyaṃ padam. 'rasāṃstanniyame heturaucityaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:1004: vikalpenedamarthajātaṃ kalpayituṃ vyākhyātuṃ śakyam kiṃ tadityāha--guṇānāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:1005: trayaḥ pakṣā ye sambhāvyante te vyākhyātuṃ śakyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1008: svabhāvasya kalpanayā pratapādanārthaṃ pradarśitabedasya svāśrayavācoyuktirdṛśyate śiśapāśrayaṃ vṛkṣatvamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:1011: dharmāśca dharmyāśritā iti bālapriyā kutroktamityata āha---kārikāyāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:1022: vikalpyamityasya vikalpena kalpyamiti vigraha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1046: yadā tu nānātvapakṣe gumāśrayasaṅghaṭanāpakṣaḥ tadā gumānāśritya tiṣṭhantī gumaparatantrasvabhāvā na tu guṇarūpaivetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1048: abhidhīyate---yadi gumāḥ saṅghaṭānā cetyekaṃ tattvaṃ saṅghaṭanāśrayā vā guṇāḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:1052: mādhuryaprasādau rasabhāvatadābhāsaviṣayāveveti viṣayaniyamo locanam prasiddho mārgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1056: tena rājāśrayaḥ prakṛtivarga ityatra yathā rājāśrayaucityenāmātyādiprakṛtaya ityayamarthaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:1057: evaṃ guṇeṣu paratantrasvabhāvā tadāyattā tanmukhaprekṣiṇī saṅghaṭanetyayamartho labhyataiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1059: prathamapakṣe tādātmyena samānayogakṣematvāditaratra tu dharmatveneti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1103: tathā hi śṛṅgāre 'pi dīrghasamāsā dṛśyate raudrādiṣvasamāsā ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:1109: yathā--'yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti svabhujagurumatadaḥ' ityādau /
GK16andhvc3u:1112: nanu yadi saṅghaṭanā guṇānāṃ nāśrayastatkimālambanā ete parikalpyantām /
GK16andhvc3u:1124: śabdārthālambanatve hi tadalaṅkārebhyaḥ ko viśeṣa ityuktaṃ cirantanairiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1127: bālapriyā sa vighaṭata ityatra tatpadaṃ vyācaṣṭe--yo 'yamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:1138: anavarataṃ yannayanajalalavanipatanaṃ tena parimuṣitā apahṛtā patralekhā yasmiṃstat /
GK16andhvc3u:1160: nanu yadi śabdāśrayā guṇāstatsaṅghaṭanārūpatvaṃ tadāśrayatvaṃ vā teṣāṃ prāptameva /
GK16andhvc3u:1161: na hyasaṅghaṭitāḥ śabdā arthaviśeṣapratipādyarasādyāśritānāṃ guṇānāmavācakatvādāśrayā bhavanti /
GK16andhvc3u:1167: api tu bhavatveṣāmavivekināmabhiprāyeṇāpi śabdadharmatvaṃ śauryādīnāmiva śarīradharmatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:1173: upacāreṇa yadi śabdeṣu guṇāstadedaṃ tātparyam--śṛṅgārādirasābhivyañjakavācyapratipādanasāmarthyameva śabdasya mādhuryam /
GK16andhvc3u:1176: api tu saṅghaṭitā eva bālapriyā aikyaprasaṅgāditi /
GK16andhvc3u:1180: saṃyogarūpakāryasya dvayorutpatyā svasmin yasya saṃyogo jāyate taṃ prati tasyāpekṣāstītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1187: ayaṃ sthitaḥ mama pakṣo neti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:1207: kimayaṃ madhye saṅghaṭanānupraveśa ityāśaṅkya sa eva pūrvapakṣavādyāha---na hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:1208: arthaviśeṣairna tu padāntaranirapekṣaśuddhapadavācyaiḥ sāmānyaiḥ pratipādyā vyaṅgyā
GK16andhvc3u:1214: varṇavyaṅgyo hi yāvadrasa uktastāvadavācakasyāpi padasya śravaṇamātrāvaseyena svasaubhāgyena
GK16andhvc3u:1215: varṇavadeva yadrasābhivyaktihetutvaṃ sphuṭameva lakṣyata iti tadeva mādhuryādīti kiṃ saṅghaṭanayā?
GK16andhvc3u:1216: tathā ca padavyaṅgyo yāvaddhvaniruktastāvacchuddhasyāpi padasya svārthasmārakatvenāpi rasābhivyaktiyogyārthavabhāsakatvameva mādhuryādīti tatrāpi kaḥ saṅghaṭanāyā upayogaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1221: viśiṣṭā yā śabdāntarasaṅghaṭanā tathaiva labhyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1256: abhyupagate vā vākyavyaṅgyatve rasādīnāṃ na niyatā kācitsaṅghaṭanā teṣāmāśrayatvaṃ pratipadyata ityaniyatasaṅghaṭanāḥ śabdā evaṃ guṇānāṃ vyaṅgyaviśeṣānugatā āśrayāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1259: na hyasamāsā saṅghaṭanā kadācidojasa āśrayatāṃ pratapadyate /
GK16andhvc3u:1261: yadi na prasiddhimātragrahadūṣitaṃ cetastadatrāpi na na brūmaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1263: yato raudrādīn hi prakāśayataḥ kāvyasya dīptiroja iti prākpratipādatam /
GK16andhvc3u:1264: taccaujo yadyasamāsāyāmapi saṅghaṭanāyāṃ syāttatko doṣo bhavet /
GK16andhvc3u:1265: na locanam nanu vākyavyaṅgye dhvanau tarhyavaśyamanupraveṣṭavyaṃ saṅghaṭanayā svasaundarya vācyasaundaryaṃ v,
GK16andhvc3u:1271: kiṃ tu mādhuryasya na niyatā saṅghaṭanā āśrayo vā svarūpaṃ vā tayā vinā varṇapadavyaṅgye
GK16andhvc3u:1272: rasādau bhāvrānmādhuryādeḥ vākyavyaṅgye 'pi tādṛśīṃ saṅghaṭanāṃ vihāyāpi vākyasya
GK16andhvc3u:1274: tasmādaupacārikatve 'pi śabdāśrayā eva guṇā ityupasaṃharati--śabdā eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:1288: niyatā saṅghaṭanā māduryasyāśrayo vā svarūpaṃ vā netyanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1312: teṣāṃ tu cakṣurādīnāmiva yathāsvaṃ viṣayaniyamitasya svarūpasya na kadācidyvabhicāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1314: na ca saṅghaṭanāmāśritā guṇā ityekaṃ darśanam /
GK16andhvc3u:1321: kathamacārutvaṃ tādṛśe viṣaye sahṛdayānāṃ nāvabhātīti cet?
GK16andhvc3u:1329: ' locanam vayaṃ tu bramaḥ--varṇapadavyaṅgye 'pyojasi raudrādisvabhāve varṇapadānāmekākināṃ
GK16andhvc3u:1330: svasaundaryamapi na tādṛgunmīlati tādyāvattāni saṅghaṭanāṅkitāni na kṛtānīti sāmānyenaivāyaṃ pūrvapakṣa iti /
GK16andhvc3u:1335: yasmāt 'yoyaḥ śastraṃ' ityādau nācārutvaṃ pratibhāvati tasmādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1338: 'śṛṅgāra eva paramo manaḥprahlādano rasaḥ' ityādinā ca viṣayaniyama ukta eva /
GK16andhvc3u:1360: evamādau ca viṣaye yathaucityātyāgastathā locanam rasābhivyaktāvetadeva sāmarthyaṃ śabdānāṃ yattathā tathā saṅghaṭamānatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1366: uttamadevatāsaṃbhogaparāmarśe ca pitṛsaṃbhoga iva lajjātaṅkādinā kaścamatkārāvakāśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1368: saṃbhogo 'pi hyasau varṇitastathā pratibhānavatā kavinā yathā tatraiva viśrāntaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:1369: hṛdayaṃ paurvāparyaparāmarśaṃ kartuṃ na dadāti yathā nirvyājaparākramasya puruṣasyāviṣaye
GK16andhvc3u:1370: 'pi yudhyamānasya tāvattasminnavasare sādhuvādo vitīryate na tu paurvāparyaparāmarśe
GK16andhvc3u:1381: atassaṅghaṭanārūpā eva guṇā iti bhāvārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1391: tasya varṇanīyasya upayogīni yāni vastūni teṣāṃ paurvāparyeṇa yaḥ parāmarśastatra kauśalaṃ sāmarthyamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1416: nanvevaṃ darśayiṣyata iti vaktavyaṃ na tu darśitamitītyata āha locane-- darśitamevāgre /
GK16andhvc3u:1418: tathā hi śaktirahatena kavinā evaṃvide viṣaye śṛṅgāra upanibadhyamānaḥ sphuṭameva doṣatvena pratabhāsate /
GK16andhvc3u:1419: nanvasmin pakṣe 'yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti' ityādau kimacārutvam?
GK16andhvc3u:1421: tasmādguṇavyatiriktatve guṇarūpatve ca saṅghaṭanāyā anyaḥ kaścinniyamaheturvaktavya ityucyate /
GK16andhvc3u:1435: vyatirekapakṣe hi saṅghaṭanāyā niyamahetureva nāsti aikyapakṣe 'pi na raso niyamaheturityanyo vaktavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1437: kathāṃ nayati svakartavyāṅgabhāvamiti kathānāyako yo nirvahaṇe phalabhāgī /
GK16andhvc3u:1441: dānadharmavīraśāntapradhāno dhīrapraśānta iti catvāro nāyakāḥ krameṇa sātvatyārabhaṭīkaiśikībhāratīlakṣaṇavṛttipradhānāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1447: kārikāvacanasya niṣpannatvāt bhūtanirdeśa upapanna iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1452: saṅghaṭanārūpā eva guṇā iti pakṣa ityarthaḥṛ /
GK16andhvc3u:1459: guṇānāṃ viṣayaniyama evoktaḥ saṅghaṭanāyāṃ niyamahetuḥ ko 'pi nokta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1477: tatra yadā kavirapagatarasabhāvo vaktā tadā racanāyāḥ locanam dhvanyātāmā dhvanisvabhāvo yo rasastasyāṅgaṃ vyañjakamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1478: abhineyo vāgaṅgasatvāhāryairābhimukhyaṃ sākṣātkāraprāyaṃ neyo 'rtho vyaṅgyarūpo dhvanisvabhāvo yasya tadabhineyārthaṃ vācyaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:1481: yadāha muniḥ--'vāgaṅgasattvopetātkāvyārthān bhāvayanti' ityādi tatra tatra /
GK16andhvc3u:1482: rasābhinayanāntarīyakatayā tu tadvibhāvādirūpatayā vācyo 'rtho 'bhinīyata iti vācyamabhineyārthamityeṣaiva yuktarā vācoyuktiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1490: tathāpi tāvati bālapriyā sātvatyādivṛttīnāṃ lakṣaṇānyanyatra draṣṭavyāni /
GK16andhvc3u:1503: kāvyenārthya iti vyutpatyā kāvyārthaśabdo vyaṅgyarasādivācīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1511: tadā vācyamabhineyārthamityatra abhineyaḥ artho yasyeti vigrahe yatpadārthasya vācyasya
GK16andhvc3u:1514: kavinibaddho vaktā rasabhāvarahita ityasyārtha pradarśya tatrānupapattimāśaṅkya pariharati---rasabhāvahīna ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:1521: yadāpi kavinibaddho vaktā rasabhāvarahitastadā sa eva ;
GK16andhvc3u:1522: yadā tu kaviḥ kavinibaddho vā vaktā rasabhāvasamanvito rasaśca pradhānāśritatvāddhvanyātmabhūtastadā niyamenaiva tatrāsamāsāmadhyasamāse eva saṅghaṭane /
GK16andhvc3u:1525: raso yadā prādhānyena pritapādyastadā tatpratītau vyavadhāyakā virodhinaśca sarvātmanaiva parihāryāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1526: evaṃ ca dīrghasamāsāsaṅghaṭanāsamāsānāmanekaprakārasambhāvanayā kadācidrasaptatītiṃ vyavadadhātīti tasyāṃ nātyantamabhiniveśaḥ locanam rasādihīna ityuktam. sa eveti kāmacāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1527: evaṃ śuddhavaktraucityaṃ vicārya vācaucityena saha tadevāha---yadā tviti /
GK16andhvc3u:1529: anyathā 'sa eva vītarāgaścet' iti sthityā nīrasameva kāvyaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:1532: niyamena rasabhāvasanvito vaktā na tu kathañcidapi taṭasthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1533: rasaśca dhvanyātmabhūta eva na tu rasavadalaṅkāraprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1542: tadāsvāde ye vyavadhāyakā asvādavighnarūpāvirodhinaśca tadviparītāsvādamayā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1544: anekaprakāraḥ sambhāvyate saṅghaṭanā tu sambhāvanāyāṃ prayoktrīti bālapriyā bhāvyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1551: yadā tu kavirityādinā kadācidrasabhāvarahitatvaṃ kaverbhavatīti gamyate pūrvamuktañja,
GK16andhvc3u:1555: 'tadā niyamenaiva samāse eva' ityatra niyameneti padamevakāradvayañca yathāyathaṃ yojayaṃstattadvyavacchedyamarthañca darśayanvivṛṇoti---niyamenetyādi
GK16andhvc3u:1571: abhineyārthe kāvye tasthāmatyantamabhiniveśo viśeṣato na śobhate /
GK16andhvc3u:1576: rasāntare punaḥ pratipādye raudrādau madhyamasamāsā saṅghaṭanā kadāciddhīroddhatanāyakasambandhavyāpārāśrayeṇa
GK16andhvc3u:1577: dīrghasamāsāpi vā tadākṣepāvinābhāvirasocitavācyāpekṣayā na viguṇā bhavatīti sāpi
GK16andhvc3u:1579: sarvāsu ca saṅghaṭanāsu prasādākhyo guṇo vyāpī /
GK16andhvc3u:1582: atruṭitena vyaṅgyena tāvatsamāsārthābhinayo na śakyaḥ kartum /
GK16andhvc3u:1584: tatra duṣprayojā bahutarasandehaprasarā ca tatra pratipattirna nāṭye 'nurūpā syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:1590: tasyā dīrghasamāsasaṅghaṭanāyāḥ ya ākṣepastena vinā yo na bhavati vyaṅgyābhivyañjakastādṛśo
GK16andhvc3u:1593: nāyakasyākṣepo vyāpāra iti yadvyākhyātaṃ tanna śliṣyatīvetyalam /
GK16andhvc3u:1596: yathā vācye jhaṭiti bhavati pratītiriti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:1605: kintu vyaṅgyārthatroṭanaṃ kṛtvaiva kartavyo bhavediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1610: tatra bahutarasandehaprasarā pratipattiśca syāt. sā nāṭye na anurūpā ca iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:1620: raudrādaurasāntare punaḥ pratipādye madhyamasamāsāsaṅghaṭanā viguṇā na bhavata kadāciddīrghasamāsāpi vā saṅghaṭanā viguṇā na bhavatīti sambandhaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:1627: prasādātikramaṃ hyasamāsāpi saṅghaṭanā karuṇavipralambhaśṛṅgārau na vyanakti /
GK16andhvc3u:1628: tadaparityāge ca madhyamasamāsāpi na na prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:1630: ata eva ca 'yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti' ityādau yadyojasaḥ sthitiraneṣyate tatprasādākhya eva guṇo na mādhuryam /
GK16andhvc3u:1633: tasmādguṇāvyatiriktatve guṇavyatiriktatve vā saṅghaṭanāyā yathoktādaucityādviṣayaniyamo 'stīti tasyā api rasavyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:1634: tasyāśca rasābhivyaktinimittabhūtāyā yo 'yamanantarokto niyamahetuḥ sa eva guṇānāṃ niyato viṣaya iti guṇāśrayeṇa vyavasthānamapyaviruddham /
GK16andhvc3u:1639: ojomādhuryayorhyanyonyābhāvarūpatvaṃ prāṅnirūpitamiti tayoḥ saṅkaro 'tyantaṃ śrutibāhya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1641: prasādenaiva sa rasaḥ prakāśitaḥ na na prakāśita ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1643: yadi guṇāḥ saṅghaṭanaikarūpāstathāpi guṇāniyama eva saṅghaṭanāyā niyamaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1645: saṅghaṭanāśrayaguṇapakṣe 'pi saṅghaṭanāyā niyāmakatvena yadvaktṛvācyaucityaṃ bālapriyā yo vācyo vyaṅgyābhivyañjako na bhavatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1646: svasvavācakaśabdānāṃ dīrghasamāsasaṅghaṭanāṅkitatve satyeva vācyārthā vyañjakā bhavantīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1666: śṛṅgārādāvojaso raudrādau mādhuryasya ca samāveśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1670: viṣayāśrayam apy anyad aucityaṃ tāṃ niyacchati /
GK16andhvc3u:1671: kāvya-prabhedāśrayataḥ sthitā bhedavatī hi sā // DhvK_3.7 //
GK16andhvc3u:1677: paryāyabandhaḥ parikathā khaṇḍakathā sakalakathe sargabandho 'bhineyārthamākhyāyikākathe ityevamādayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1678: tadāśrayeṇāpi locanam hetutvenoktaṃ tadguṇānāmapi niyamaheturiti pakṣatraye 'pi na kaścidvaplava iti tātparyam // 5// ,6 //
GK16andhvc3u:1681: yathā hi senādyātmakasaṅghātaniveśī purūṣaḥ kātaro 'pi tadaucityādanuguṇatayaivāste tathā kāvyavākyamapi saṅghātaviseṣātmakasandānitakādimadhyaniviṣṭaṃ tadaucityena vartate /
GK16andhvc3u:1682: muktakaṃ tu viṣayaśabdena yaduktaṃ tatsaṅghātābhāvena svātantryamātraṃ pradarśayituṃ svapratiṣṭhitamākāśamiti yathā /
GK16andhvc3u:1684: na tu viṣayaucityena vaktṛvācyaucityaṃ nivāryata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:1687: tena svatantratayā parisamāptanirākāṅkṣārthamapi prabandhamadhyavarti na muktakamityucyate /
GK16andhvc3u:1690: senādyātmako yassaṅghātaḥ samudāyaḥ tatra niveśī niviṣṭaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1699: nanvevaṃ muktakasyaikapadyātmakasya saṅghātarūpatvābhāvāt vṛttau tasya kāvyaprabhedatvena kathanaṃ kimarthamityata āha---muktakantvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:1703: muktakasyāpi rasasyanditvātsaṅghaṭanāniyamane svātantryamastītyetāvanmātraṃ pradarśayituṃ muktakamapi kāvyaprabhedatvenoktamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1706: prativākyamidamākāśaṃ svasminnākāśe pratiṣṭhitamiti brahma brahmaṇīva ākāśamākāśa
GK16andhvc3u:1726: iti kriyāsamāptikṛtā bhedā iti dvandvena nirdiṣṭāḥ avāntarakriyāsamāptāvapi vasantavarṇanādarekarṇanīyoddeśena pravṛttaḥ paryāyabandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1732: mahākāvyarūpaḥ puruṣārthaphalaḥ samastavastuvarṇanāprabandhaḥ sargabandhaḥ saṃskṛta eva /
GK16andhvc3u:1749: sandānitaketyādinā tu vipariṇāmena tatpadaṃ yojyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1750: etena pūrveṣāntu muktakādīnāṃ bhāṣāyāmaniyama iti bakṣyamāṇasya nāsaṅgatiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1771: yathā hyamarukasya kavermuktakāḥ śṛṅgārarasasyandinaḥ prabandhāyamānāḥ prasiddhā eva /
GK16andhvc3u:1775: kadācidarthaucityāśrayeṇa dīrghasamāsāyāmapi saṅghaṭanāyāṃ paruṣā grāmyā ca vṛttiḥ parihartavyā /
GK16andhvc3u:1780: sargabandhetu locanam nanu muktake vibhāvādisaṅghaṭanā kathaṃ yena tadāyatto rasaḥ syādityāśaṅkyāha---muktakeṣviti /
GK16andhvc3u:1782: kathamapi kṛtapratyāpattau priye skhalitottare virahakṛśayā kṛtvā vyājaprakalpitamaśrutam /
GK16andhvc3u:1783: ahanasakhīśrotraprāptiṃ viśaṅkya samambhramaṃ vivalitadṛśā śūnye gehe samucchvasitaṃ tataḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:1786: asamāsāyāṃ hi saṅghaṭanāyāṃ manthararūpā pratītiḥ sākāṅkṣā satī cireṇa kriyāpadaṃ dūravartyanudhāvantī vācyapratītāveva viśrāntā satī na rasatatvacarvaṇāyogyā syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1798: tathāca vācyapratītimāntharyādiparihārāya madhyamasamāsā dīrghasamāsā vā saṅghaṭanā kāryeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1799: prabandhāśrayeṣvatyatra sandānitakādiṣvityasyaivānuṣaṅgo na tu muktakeṣvityasyāpi pūrvoktalakṣaṇasya muktakasya rasatātparye yathārasamaucityamanyathā tu kābhacāraḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:1802: ākhyāyikākathayostu gadyanibandhanabāhulyādgadye ca chandobandhabhinnaprasthānatvādiha niyame heturakṛtapūrvo 'pi manā vikrayate /
GK16andhvc3u:1803: etad yathoktam aucityam eva tasyā niyāmakam /
GK16andhvc3u:1807: yadetadaucatyaṃ vaktṛvācyagataṃ saṅghaṭanāyā niyāmakamuktametadeva gadye chandoniyamavarjite 'pi viṣayāpekṣaṃ niyamahetuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1808: tathā hyatrāpi yadā kaviḥ kavinibaddho vā vaktā rasabhāvarahitastadā kāmacāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1813: pūrvāparanirapekṣeṇāpi hi yena rasacarvaṇā kriyate tadeva muktakam /
GK16andhvc3u:1826: tatra tu rasatātparyaṃ sādhīya iti yaduktaṃ tatkimapekṣayeti neyārthaṃ syāt // 7 //
GK16andhvc3u:1844: racanā viṣayāpekṣaṃ tat tu kiṃcid vibhedavat // DhvK_3.9 //
GK16andhvc3u:1847: athavā padyavadgadyabandhe 'pi rasabandhoktamaucityaṃ sarvatra saṃśritā racanā locanam viṣayāpekṣamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:1855: tarhi viṣayaucityaṃ sarvathaiva tyaktaṃ netyāha---tadena rasaucityaṃ viṣayaṃ sahakāritayāpekṣya
GK16andhvc3u:1856: kiñjidvibhedo 'vantaravaicitryaṃ vidyate yasya sampādyatvena tādṛśaṃ bālapriyā viṣayatveneti /
GK16andhvc3u:1858: 'rasabandhe'ti kārikāyāṃ racanā sarvatra rasabandhoktamaucityaṃ saṃśritā bhātītyanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1859: vṛttau 'athave'ti na vikalpārthaka ityāha---vṛttau ca vāśabda iti /
GK16andhvc3u:1870: yuktyā niṣevitaṃ stryādicatuṣṭayaṃ svārthasya svaprayojanāya bhavata /
GK16andhvc3u:1872: yuktyānyathā vā niṣevitaṃ taccatuṣṭayaṃ kevalaṃ duḥkhasambhārāya duḥkhātiśayāyaiva bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:1874: “viṣapyamṛtaṃ kvacidbhavedabhṛtaṃ vā viṣamīśvarecchaye“ti raghuvaṃśaślokavyākhyāne “vāśabdo vākyārthasya sthitapakṣatāṃ dyotayatī“tyaruṇācalanāthāḥ
GK16andhvc3u:1889: tathā hi gadyavandhe 'pyatidīrghasamāsā racanā na vipralambhaśṛṅgārakaruṇayorākhyāyikāyāmapi śobhate /
GK16andhvc3u:1892: tathā hyākhyāyikāyāṃ nātyantamasamāsā svaviṣaye 'pi nāṭakādau nātidīrghasamāsā ceti saṅghaṭanāyā diganusartavyā /
GK16andhvc3u:1893: idānīmalakṣyakramavyaṅgyo dhvaniḥ prabandhātmā rāmāyaṇamahābhāratādau locanam bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:1898: tathā hi vākyābhinayalakṣaṇe 'cūrṇapādaiḥ prasannaiḥ' ityādi munirabhyadhāt /
GK16andhvc3u:1902: evaṃ saṅghaṭanāyāṃ cālakṣyakramo dīpyata iti nirṇītam /
GK16andhvc3u:1903: prabandhe dīpyata iti tu nirvivādasiddho 'yamartha iti nātra vaktavyaṃ kiñcidasti /
GK16andhvc3u:1904: kevalaṃ kavisahṛdayān vyutpādayituṃ rasavyañjane yetikartavyatā prabandhasya sā nirūpyetyāśayenāha--idānīmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:1906: prathamaṃ dāvaditi prabandhasya vyañjakatve ye prakārāste krameṇauvopayoginaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1956: prabandho 'pi rasādīnāṃ vyañjaka ityuktaṃ tasya vyañjakatve nibandhanam /
GK16andhvc3u:1958: pratipipādayiṣitarasabhāvādyapekṣayā ya ucato vibhāvo bhāvo 'nu bhāvaḥ sañjārī vā
GK16andhvc3u:1964: śṛṅgāravarṇanecchunā tādṛśī kathā saṃśrayaṇīyā yasyāmṛtumālyādervibhāvasya līlāderanubhāvasya bālapriyā śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1983: divyasya utsāhādayaḥ kevalamānuṣāśrayema kevalamānuṣasyotsāhādayaḥ kevaladivyāśrayeṇa vā upanibadhyamānā ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1992: ata eva ca bharate prakhyātavastuviṣayatvaṃ prakhyātodāttanāyakatvaṃ ca nāṭakasyāvaśyakartavyatayopanyastam /
GK16andhvc3u:1995: locanam etaduktaṃ bhavati---yatra vineyānāṃ pratītikhaṇḍanā na jāyate tādṛgvarṇanīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:1996: tatra kevalamānuṣasya ekapade saptārṇavalaṅghanamasambhāvyamānatayānṛtamiti hṛdaye sphuradupadeśyasya caturvargopāyasyāpyalīkatāṃ buddhau niveśayati
GK16andhvc3u:1998: ata eva tasyāpi yadā prabhāvāntaramutprekṣyate tadā tādṛśameva /
GK16andhvc3u:2015: rājñāṃ prabhāvātiśayavarṇanaṃ yaddvayaṃ tadanucitaṃ na brūma iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2030: pūrvā purātanī yā prasiddhiparamparā tayā upacito yaḥ sampratyayo viśvāsaḥ tamupārūḍhamiti hetugarbham /
GK16andhvc3u:2039: yo nāṭakādi utpādyavastu sat kuryāttasya mahān pramādassyāditi yojanāmmanasi kṛtya
GK16andhvc3u:2042: muninā nāṭakādi nanu yadyutsāhādibhāvavarṇane kathañciddivyamānuṣyādyaucityaparīkṣā kriyate tatkriyatām,
GK16andhvc3u:2044: ratirhi bhāratavarṣecitenaiva vyavahārema divyānāmapi varṇanīyeti sthitiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2048: yattu divyamaucityaṃ tattatrānupakārakameveti cet---na vayaṃ divyamaucityaṃ śṛṅgāraniṣayamanyatkiñcidbrūmaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2049: kiṃ tarhi? bhāratavarṣaviṣaye yathottamanāyakeṣu rājādiṣu śṛṅgāropanibandhastathā divyāśrayo 'pi śobhate /
GK16andhvc3u:2050: na ca rājādiṣu prasiddhiṣu prasiddhagrāmyaśṛṅgāropanibandhanaṃ prasiddhaṃ nāṭakādau,
GK16andhvc3u:2052: nāṭakāderamineyārthatvādabhinayasya ca sambhogaśṛṅgāraviṣayasyāsabhyatvāttatra parihāra iti cet- na;
GK16andhvc3u:2054: tasmādabhineyārthe 'nabhineyārthe vā kāvye yaduttamaprakṛte rājāderuttamaprakṛtibhirnāyikābhiḥ saha grāmyasambhogavarṇanaṃ tatpitroḥ sambhogavarṇanamiva sutarāmasabhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2056: locanam nirūpitaṃ munineti na kartavyamiti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2059: bālapriyā utpādyavastu sat na nirūpitamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2068: vyāyogastu vidhijñaiḥ karyaḥ prakhyātanāyakaśarīra ityādivyāyogalakṣaṇañja nāṭyaśāstrādāvuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:2069: nāṭakādītyatra nāṭakamādiḥ yasyeti vyutpattyā nāṭakādipadenātadguṇasaṃvijñānabahuvrīhiṇā prakāraṇaṃ vivakṣitamato na yathāśrutārthānupapattiriti
GK16andhvc3u:2071: na ca sambhogaśṛṅgārasya suratalakṣaṇa evaikaḥ prakāraḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:2076: yattvevaṃvidhe viṣaye mahākavīnāpyasamīkṣyakāritā lakṣye dṛśyate sa doṣa eva /
GK16andhvc3u:2077: sa tu śaktitiraskṛtatvātteṣāṃ na lakṣyata ityuktameva /
GK16andhvc3u:2082: tena muninirūpite nāṭikālakṣaṇe 'prakaraṇanāṭakayogādutpādyaṃ vastu nāyako nṛpatiḥ' ityatra yathāsaṃkhyena prakhyātodāttanṛpatināyaktvaṃ boddhavyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2083: kathaṃ tarhi sambhogaśṛṅgāraḥ kavinā nibadhyatāmityāśaṅkyāha---na ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:2085: munināpa sthāne sthāne prakṛtyaucityameva vibhāvānubhāvādiṣu bahutaraṃ pramāṇīkṛtaṃ 'sthairyeṇottamamadhyamādhamānāṃ nīcānāṃ sambhrameṇa' ityādi vadatā /
GK16andhvc3u:2099: divyaṃ mānaṣyañja tadādi yadaucityaṃ tasya parīkṣā /
GK16andhvc3u:2126: svapratibhāṃ cānusaratā kavināvahatacetasā bhūtvā vibhāvā dyaucityabhraṃśaparityāge
GK16andhvc3u:2128: aucityavataḥ kathāśarīrasya vṛttasyotprekṣitasya vā graho vyañjaka ityanenaitatpratipādayati---yaditihāsādiṣu
GK16andhvc3u:2129: kathāsu rasavatīṣu vividhāsu satīṣvapa yattatra vibhāvādyaucityavatkathāśarīraṃ tadeva grāhyaṃnetarat /
GK16andhvc3u:2130: vṛttādapi ca kathāśarīrādutprekṣite viśeṣataḥ prayatnavatā bhavitavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2146: adṛṣṭaṃ sukṛtaṃ prasādo devatādiprasādaḥ tābhyāmuditā yā svapratibhā tacchālitvamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2148: itihāsādiṣu vividhāsu rasavatīṣu kathāsu satīṣvapi tāḥ kathā anādṛtya tatra tāsāmmadhye yatkathāśarīramaucityavattadeva kavinā grāhyaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:2149: netaradvibhāvādyaucityaśūnyaṃ kathāśarīraṃ rasavadapi na grāhyamiti vṛttyartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2159: tatra iti jātyuttaramapi na sambhavatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2164: kiñca---- santi siddharasaprakhyā ye ca rāmāyaṇādayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2166: teṣu hi kathāśrayeṣu tāvatsvecchaiva na yojya /
GK16andhvc3u:2168: svecchāpi yadi yojyā tadrasavirodhinī na yojyā /
GK16andhvc3u:2170: itivṛttavaśāyātāṃ kathañcidrasānanuguṇāṃ sthitiṃ tyaktvā punarutprekṣyāpyantarābhīṣṭarasocitakathonnayo vidheyaḥ yatā kālidāsaprabandheṣu /
GK16andhvc3u:2171: yathā ca sarvasenaviracite locanam na hi tatretihāsavaśādeva mayā nibaddhamiti jātyuttaramapi sambhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:2175: siddhaḥ āsvādamātraśeṣo na tu bhāvanīyo raso yeṣu /
GK16andhvc3u:2180: kathañcidvā yadi yojyate tattatprasiddharasaviruddhā na yojyā /
GK16andhvc3u:2181: yathā rāmasya dhīralalitatvayojanena nāṭikānāyakatvaṃ kaścitkuryāditi tvatyantāsamañjasam /
GK16andhvc3u:2187: tathārjunacarite 'rjunasya pātālavijayādi bālapriyā sahṛdayāsvāda eva śeṣaḥ śiṣṭāṃśo yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2190: siddharasāḥ prakhyāḥ prakhyātāśca siddharasaprakhyā ye rāmāyaṇādayaḥ kathāśrayāssantīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2193: na tairityādikaṃ vākyadvaye paryavasannamityāśayena teṣvityādi vyākhyātaṃ vṛttau,
GK16andhvc3u:2203: rāmāyaṇaprasiddhastadīyo raso hi vīra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2210: tatretivṛte yadi rasānanuguṇāṃ sthitiṃ paśyettademāṃ bhaṅktvāpi svatantratayā rasānuguṇaṃ kathāntaramutpādayet /
GK16andhvc3u:2214: yatsandhīnāṃ mukhapratimukhagarbhāvamarśanirvahaṇākhyānāṃ tadaṅgānāṃ copakṣepādīnāṃ ghaṭanaṃ locanam varṇitamithāsāprasiddham /
GK16andhvc3u:2217: iha prabhusammitebhyaḥ śrutismṛtiprabhṛtibhyaḥ kartavyamidamityājñāmātraparamārthebhyaḥ śāstrebhyo ye na vyutpannāḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:2218: na cāpyasyedaṃ vṛttamamuṣmātkarmaṇa ityevaṃ yuktiyuktakarmaphalasambandhaprakaṭanakāribhyo mitrrasammitebhya itihāsaśāstrebhyo labdhavyutpattayaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:2219: atha cāvaśyaṃ vyutpādyāḥ prajārthasampādanayogyatākrāntā rājaputraprāyāsteṣāṃ hṛdayānupraveśamukhena caturvargopāyavyutpattirādheyā /
GK16andhvc3u:2224: prītyātmā ca rasastadeva nāṭyaṃ nāṭyameva veda ityasmadupādhyāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2231: abhīṣṭasya rasasya ucitāyāḥ kathāyā unnayaḥ ghaṭanam /
GK16andhvc3u:2245: prajānāmarthapampādane paripālane yā yogyatā rājakulaprasūtatvādirūpā tayā ākrāntā āśritā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2247: caturvargopāyavyutpattiḥ nāntarīyakamānuṣaṅgikaphalaṃ yasya tathāvidho yo vibhāvādisaṃyogaḥ tatprasādopanataḥ tenotpādita ityarthaṃ /
GK16andhvc3u:2256: phalaṃ ca nāma yadadṛṣṭavaśāddavatā prasādādānyato vā jāyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2259: tenopāyakrameṇa pravṛttasya siddhiḥ anupāyadvāreṇa pravṛttasya nāśa ityevaṃ nāyakapratināyakagatatvenārthānarthepāyavyutpattiḥ kāryā /
GK16andhvc3u:2268: kāraṇagatā muninoktaḥ--- saṃsādhye phalayoge tu vyāpāraḥ kāraṇasya yaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2307: tadanurodhe tu svarūpāt kiñciducchūnatāmityasya svarūpamityanenānvayo bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2316: prārambhādīnāmmukhādisandhīnāṃ locanam tasyānupūrvyā virjñayāḥ pañcāvasthāḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2320: evaṃ yā etāḥ kāraṇasyāvasthāstatsampādakaṃ yatkarturitavṛttaṃ pañcadhā vibhaktam /
GK16andhvc3u:2321: ta eva mukhapratimukhagarbhāvamarśanirvahaṇākhyā anvarthanāmānaḥ pañca sandhaya itivṛttakhaṇaḍāḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:2323: teṣāmapi sandhīnāṃ svanirvāhyaṃ prati tathā kramadarśanādavāntarabhinnā ititavṛttabhāgāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2326: tathā hi svāyattasiddherbījaṃ binduḥ kāryamiti tisraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2327: bījena sarvavyāpārāḥ bindunānusandhānaṃ kāryeṇa nirvāhaḥ sandarśanaprārthanāvyavasāyarūpā hyetāstisro 'rthasampādye kartuḥ prakṛtayaḥ svabhāvavaśeṣāḥ
GK16andhvc3u:2328: sacivāyattasiddhitve tu sacivasya tadarthameva vā svārthameva vā svārthamapi vā pravṛtttvena prakīrṇapatākāśabdābhyāmukta iti /
GK16andhvc3u:2329: evaṃ prastutaphalanirvāhaṇāntasyādhikārikasya vṛttasya pañcasandhitvaṃ pūrṇasandhyaṅgatā ca sarvajanavyutpattidāyinī nibandhanīyā /
GK16andhvc3u:2330: prāsaṅgike tvitivṛtte nāyaṃ niyama ityuktam- 'prāsaṅgike parāthatvānna hyeṣa niyamo bhavet' iti muninā /
GK16andhvc3u:2346: tattataprayojanaṃ manasi kṛtya tātsiddhiṃ samprārthya tadartho vyavasāyo bhavatīti sandarśanādijanyatvādbījādayastatsvarūpā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2360: yathā veṇīsaṃhāre vilāsākhyasya pratimukhasandhyaṅgasya prakṛtarasanibandhānanuguṇamapi dvitīye 'ṅke bharatamatānusaraṇamātrecchayā ghaṭanam
GK16andhvc3u:2361: locanam prastāvanopakrame pañcāpi sandhayo 'vasthāpañcakasahitāḥ samucitasandhyaṅgaparipūrṇā arthaprakṛtiyuktā darśitā eva /
GK16andhvc3u:2363: iti 'rājyaṃ nirjitaśatru' iti ca vacobhiḥ 'upabhogasevāvasaro 'yam' ityupakṣepātprabhṛti hi nirūpitam /
GK16andhvc3u:2365: pratyekena tu pradarśyamānaṃ pūrvāparānusandhānavandhyatayā kevalaṃ saṃmohadāyi bhavatīti na vitatam /
GK16andhvc3u:2366: asyārthasya yatnāvadheyatveneṣṭatvātsvakaṇṭhena yo vyatireka ukto 'na tu kevalayā' iti tasyodāharaṇamāha---na tviti /
GK16andhvc3u:2367: kevalaśabdamicchāśabdaṃ ca prayuñcānasyāyamāśayaḥ---bharatamuninā sandhyaṅganāṃ rasāṅgabhūtamitivṛttaprāśastyotpādanameva prayojanamuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:2401: idaṃ cāparaṃ prabandhasya rasavyañjakatve nimittaṃ yaduddīpanapraśamane yathāvasaramantarā locanam iti pratimukhasandhyaṅgavilāsalakṣaṇe /
GK16andhvc3u:2407: yathā---'ayaṃ sa rāā udayaṇo tti' ityādi sāgarikāyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2414: durlabhatvaṃ yato nāryā kāminaḥ sā parā ratiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2416: vīrarasādāvapi yathāvasaramuddīpanapraśamanābhyāṃ vinā jhaṭityevādbhutaphalakalpe sādhye labdhe prakaṭīcikīrṣita upāyopeyabhāvo na pradarśita evala syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:2421: yadvā---rateḥ ratyākhyasthāyinaḥ yo bhujyata iti bhogo viṣayaḥ pramadādiḥ tadarthā tatsambhogārthā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2423: ādhikāriko yo raso varṇyamānaḥ tasya yaḥ sthāyībhāvastadupavyañjako yo vibhāvādiḥ tadupalakṣamārthatvena tadupalakṣakatvenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2428: yathātattvamadhigato jñāto 'rtho munyabhipretārthe yasya tathābhūto na,
GK16andhvc3u:2432: nanu veṇīsaṃhāre ka āghikāriko rasa ityatrāha---prakṛta iti /
GK16andhvc3u:2440: yataśca yacca vinivāryate nāryā sambhoga iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2448: nāyakāditattadyvāpārasya caturvargasya ca hetuhetumadbhāva ityarthaḥ naiveti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:2452: tathāca yatra yatrā ṅgino rasasya vicchedaḥ prāpnuyāttatra rasasya,
GK16andhvc3u:2456: prabandhaviśeṣasya nāṭakāde rasavyaktinimittamidaṃ cāparamavagantavyaṃ yadalaṅkṛtīnāṃ śaktāvapyānurūpyeṇa yojanam /
GK16andhvc3u:2457: śakto hi kaviḥ kadācidalaṅkāranibandhane tadākṣiptatayaivānapekṣitarasabandhaḥ prabandhamārabhate tadupadeśārthamidamuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:2459: locanam na tu sarvarthavopanatā viśrāntirvicchedo yasya sa tathā /
GK16andhvc3u:2463: rājyapratyāpattyā hi sacivanītimahimopanatayā tadaṅgabhūtapajhāvatīlābhānugatayānuprāṇyamānarūpā paramāmabhilaṣaṇīyatamatāṃ prāptā vāsavadattādhigatireva tatra phalam /
GK16andhvc3u:2464: nirvahaṇe hi 'prāptā devī bhūtadhātrī ca bhūyaḥ saṃbandho 'bhūddarśakena' ityevaṃ devīlābhaprādhānyaṃ nirvāhitam /
GK16andhvc3u:2465: iyati cetivṛttavaicitryacitre bhittisthānīyo vāsavadattāpremabandhaḥ prathamamantrārambhātpramṛti pajhāvatīvivāhādau,
GK16andhvc3u:2467: tena sa eva vāsavadattāviṣayaḥ premabandhaḥ kathāvaśādāśaṅkyamānavicchedo 'pyanusaṃhitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2484: dṛṣṭāyūyaṃ nirjitā vidviṣaśca prāptā devī bhūtadhātrī ca bhūyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2485: sambandho 'bhūddarśakenāpi sārdhaṃ kiṃ te duḥkhaṃ yattataśśāntamadya //
GK16andhvc3u:2494: tāvadaṅke sphuṭaṃ sa evopanivaddhaḥ 'tadvakrenduvilokanena divaso nītaḥ pradoṣastathā
GK16andhvc3u:2497: dvitīye 'pi 'dṛṣṭirnāmṛtavarṣiṇī smitamadhuprasyandi vaktraṃ na kim' ityādinā sa eva vicchinno 'pyanusaṃhitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2498: tṛtīye 'pi sarvatra jvaliteṣu veśmasu bhayādālījane vidgute śvāsotkampavihastayā pratipadaṃ devyā patantyā tathā /
GK16andhvc3u:2499: hā nātheti muhuḥ pralāpaparayā dagdhaṃ varākyā tayā śāntenāpi vayaṃ tu tena dahanenādyāpi dahyāmahe //
GK16andhvc3u:2501: caturthe 'pi devīsvīkṛtamānasasya niyataṃ svapnāyamānasya me tadgotragrahaṇādiyaṃ suvadanā yāyātkathaṃ na vyathām /
GK16andhvc3u:2502: itthaṃ yantraṇayā kathaṅkathamapi kṣīṇā niśā jāgrate /
GK16andhvc3u:2503: bālapriyā praṣṭuṃ pravṛttasya me” ityādipadena grāhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2505: tatpadenātra tatpadenātra sarvatra vāsavadattāyāḥ parāmarśaḥ divasaḥ ahasmamayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2509: manmathena kṛtaḥ utpāditaḥ utsāhaḥ yeṣāṃ taiḥ kiṃ kutaḥ baddhotkaṇṭhaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:2516: ādipadena “nordhvārdraṃ hṛdayaṃ na candanarasasparśāni cāṅgāni vā kasmin labdhapadena te kṛtamidaṃ krūreṇa pātāgrinā /
GK16andhvc3u:2523: pūrvārddhena dṛṣṭyādyaṅgeṣu viroghisadbhāvādagneḥ padalābho na bhavatīti darśitamata
GK16andhvc3u:2525: tvaṃ krūreṇāgninā pītā dagdhā iti yadidamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2531: varākyā nirbhāgyayā tayā devyā tathā dagdhamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2539: itthaṃ yantraṇayā evaṃ locanam dākṣiṇyopahatena sā priyatamā svapte 'pi nāsāditā //
GK16andhvc3u:2541: pañcame 'pi samāgamapratyāśayā karuṇe nivṛtte vipralambhe 'ṅkurite tathābhūte tasminmunivacasi jātāgasi mayi prayatnāntargūḍhāṃ ruṣamupagatā me priyatamā /
GK16andhvc3u:2542: prasīdeti proktā na khalu kupitetyuktimadhuraṃ samudbhinā pītairnayanasalilaiḥ sthāsyati punaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2544: ṣaṣṭe 'pi 'tvatsamprāptivilobhitena sacivaiḥ prāṇā mayā dhāritāḥ' ityādinā /
GK16andhvc3u:2548: uddhāṭya sā praviṣṭā hṛdayagṛhaṃ me nṛpatanūjā //
GK16andhvc3u:2550: bālapriyā cintanarūpanidrāpratibandhakena jāgrato me niśā kṣīṇeti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2559: sā priyatamā tathā mama punaḥpaścādapipura itivā pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2565: yukteti yāvat pītaiḥ antaḥstambhitaiḥ samudbhinnaprītiriti pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2566: sādhiṣṭhaḥ samudbhinna prakāśitā prītiḥ yayā setyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2569: ādipadena “tanmatvā tyajataśsarīrakamidaṃ naivāsti nissnehatā āsanno 'vasarastavānugamane jātā dhṛtiḥ kintvayam /
GK16andhvc3u:2570: khedo yacca tavānugaṃ na hṛdayaṃ tasmin kṣaṇe dāruṇa //
GK16andhvc3u:2581: svañtite praveśapratibandhāya suṣṭu mithaḥ sambaddhe pakṣmaṇī eva kavāṭe yasya tat /
GK16andhvc3u:2583: svarūpatāḍena svasyarūpamākṛtiḥ tadeva tāḍaḥ tāḍanakriyā sādhanamudgāḍhanakaraṇamiti yāvat tena /
GK16andhvc3u:2586: atra nayanadvāramityetāvadeva rūpaṇaṃ śṛṅgārānuguṇatayā sundaraṃ na tvanyadapīti bhāvaḥ //14//
GK16andhvc3u:2589: dhvaner asya prabandheṣu bhāsate so 'pi keṣucit // DhvK_3.15 //
GK16andhvc3u:2592: asya vivakṣitānyaparavācyasya dhvaneranuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyo 'pi yaḥ prabheda udāhṛto dviprakāraḥ so 'pi prabandheṣu keṣuciddyotate /
GK16andhvc3u:2594: yathā vā mamaiva kāmadevasya sahacarasamāgame locanam na kevalaṃ prabandhena sākṣādvyaṅgyo yāvatpāramparyeṇāpīti darśayitumupakramate--kiñceti
GK16andhvc3u:2596: yo dhvaneḥ prabheda udāhṛtaḥ saḥ keṣucitprabandheṣu nimittabhūteṣu vyañcakeṣu satsu vyaṅgyatayā sthitaḥ san /
GK16andhvc3u:2599: atha vānusvānopamaḥ prabheda udāhṛto yaḥ prabandheṣu bhāsate asyāpi 'dyotyo 'lakṣyakramaḥ kvacit' ityuttaraślokena kārikāvṛttyoḥ saṅgatiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2600: etaduktaṃ bhavati---prabandhena kadācidanuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyo dhvaniḥ sākṣādvyajyate sa tu rasādidhvanau paryavasyatīti /
GK16andhvc3u:2601: yadi tu spaṣṭameva vyākhyāyate tadā grandhasya pūrvottarasyālakṣyakramaviṣayasya madhye grantho 'yamasaṅgataḥ syāt nīrasatvaṃ ca pāñcajanyoktyādīnāmuktaṃ syādatyalam /
GK16andhvc3u:2606: dhvanerityasya prabheda ityanena sambandha iti darśayati-dhvaneḥ prabheda iti /
GK16andhvc3u:2612: ya udāhṛtaḥ sa keṣucit prabandheṣu bhāsate ityanta anuvādaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2629: saviṇa vi tumammi puṇovanti a atanti paṃmusimmi //
GK16andhvc3u:2633: śmaśānāvatīrṇaṃ putradāhārthamudyoginaṃ janaṃ vipralabdhuṃ gṛdhro divā śavaśarīrabhakṣaṇārthī śīghramevāpasarata yūyamityāha /
GK16andhvc3u:2643: līlayā daṃṣṭrāgreṇa uddhṛtaṃ sakalamahīmaṇḍalaṃ yena varāharūpiṇā tasyetyanena gurutaravastuvahane anāyāsassūcyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2668: kṛt-tad dhita-samāsaiś ca dyotyo 'lakṣya-kramaḥ kvacit // DhvK_3.16 //
GK16andhvc3u:2671: alakṣyakramo dhvanerātmā rasādaḥ subviśeṣaistiṅviśeṣairvacanavaśeṣaiḥ sambandhaviśeṣaiḥ kārakaśaktibhiḥ kṛdviśeṣaistaddhitaviśeṣaiḥ samāsaiśceti
GK16andhvc3u:2677: sa cābhiprāyo vyaktaḥ śāntarasa eva pariniṣṭhatatāṃ prāptaḥ // 15 //
GK16andhvc3u:2678: evamalakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya rasādadhvaneryadyapi varṇebhyaḥ prabhṛti prabandhaparyante vyañjakavarge nirūpite nanirūpaṇīyāntaramavaśiṣyate,
GK16andhvc3u:2679: tathāpi kavisahṛdayānāṃ śibhāṃ dātuṃ punarapi sūkṣmadṛśānvayavyatirekāvāśritya vyañjakavargamāha--suptiṅḍityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2681: subādibhiḥ yo 'nusvānopamo bhāsate vaktrabhiprāyādarūpaḥ asyāpi subādibhirvyaktasyānusvānopamasyālakṣyakramavyaṅgyo dyotyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2684: udāharaṇe sa tvabhivyakto 'bhiprāyo yathāsvaṃ vibhāvādirūpatādvāreṇa rasādīnvyanakti /
GK16andhvc3u:2692: kanakavarṇasya hemakumbhāderābhā kāntirivābhā yasya iti vā tam /
GK16andhvc3u:2699: nirūpite nirūpite sati na avaśiṣyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2702: subityādīnāṃ tṛtīyāntānāṃ pūrvakārikāsthena bhāsata ityanena tatsthasyāsya dhvanerapītyasyātratyena dyotya ityanena ca sambandha iti vyācaṣṭe--subādibhirityādi
GK16andhvc3u:2705: yathā---- nyakkāro hyayameva me yadarayastatrāpyasau tāpasaḥ so 'pyatraiva nihanti rākṣasakulaṃ jīvatyaho rāvaṇaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2706: dhigdhikchakrajitaṃ prabodhitavatā kiṃ kumbhakarṇena vā svargagrāmaṭikāviluṇṭhanavṛthocchūnaiḥ kimebhirbhujaiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2707: locanam etaduktaṃ bhavati--varṇādibhiḥ prabandhāntaiḥ sākṣādvā raso 'bhivyajyate
GK16andhvc3u:2708: vibhāvādipratipādanadvāreṇa yadivā vibhāvādivyañjanadvārema paramparayete tatra bandhasyaitatparamparayā
GK16andhvc3u:2712: vyañjakatvaṃ dṛśyata ityādau ca vākyaśeṣo 'dhyāhāryaḥ vibhāvādivyañjanadvāratayā parāmpartheṇetyervarūpaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2714: mama śatrusadbhāvonocita iti sambandhānaucityaṃ krodhavibhāvaṃ vyanakti asya iti bahuvacanam /
GK16andhvc3u:2715: tapovidyate yasyeti pau ṣakathāhīnatvaṃ taddhitena matvarthīyenābhivyaktam /
GK16andhvc3u:2717: matkartṛkā yadi jīvanakrayā tadā hananakriyā tāvadanucitā /
GK16andhvc3u:2718: tasyāṃ ca sa kartā apiśabdena manuṣyamātrakam /
GK16andhvc3u:2720: vibhāvādipratipādanadvāreṇa sākṣādvā vibhāvādivyañjanadvāreṇa paramparayā vā raso 'bhivyajyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2728: iyaṃ śrīrāmeṇa rākṣasakulakṣaye kriyamāṇe kruddhasya rāvaṇasya svādhikṣepoktiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2735: bahutvena śatrumattā mamānuciteti sambandhānaucityarūpaṃ krodhavibhāvamaraya iti bahuvacanaṃ vyañjayatīti bahuvacanamityasyārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2745: saḥ tāpasaḥ mānuṣamātrakaḥ kutsito manuṣya eva /
GK16andhvc3u:2747: yathā atra hi śloke bhūyasā sarveṣāmapyeṣāṃ sphuṭameva vyañjakatvaṃ dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2749: 'tatrāpyasau tāpasa' ityatra tadvitanipātayoḥ 'so 'pyatraiva nihanti rākṣasakulaṃ jīvatyaho rāvaṇaḥ' ityatra tiṅkārakaśaktīnām /
GK16andhvc3u:2751: evaṃvidhasya vyañcakabhūyastve ca ghaṭamāne kāvyasya sarvātiśāyinī bandhacchāyā samunmīlati /
GK16andhvc3u:2752: yatra hi vyaṅgyāvabhāsinaḥ padasyaikasyaiva tāvadāvirbhāvastatrāpi kāvye kāpi bandhacchāyā kimuta yatra teṣāṃ bahūnāṃ samavāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2754: atra hi rāvama ityasmin pade 'rthāntarasaṃkramitavācyena dhvaniprabhedenālaṅkṛte 'pi punaranantaroktānāṃ vyañjakaprakārāṇāmudbhāsanam /
GK16andhvc3u:2755: dṛśyante ca mahātmanāṃ pratibhāviśeṣabhājāṃ bāhulyenaivaṃvidhā bandhaprakārāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2756: locanam deśo 'dhikaraṇam niḥśeṣema hanyamānatatāyā rākṣasabalaṃ ca karmeti tadidamasaṃbhāvyamānamupanatamiti puruṣakārāsampattirdhvanyate tiṅkārakaśaktipratipādakaiśca śabdaiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2758: dhigdhigiti nipātasya śakraṃ jitavānityākhyāyikeyamiti upapadasamāsena sahakṛtaḥ svargetyādisamāsasya svapauruṣānusmaraṇaṃ prati vyañjakatvam
GK16andhvc3u:2763: tena tilaśastilaśo 'pi vibhajyamāne 'tra śloke sarva evāṃśo vyañjakatvena bhātīti kimanyat /
GK16andhvc3u:2788: 'pṛthivī gatayauvanā' locanam atikrāntaṃ na tu kadācana vartamānatāmavalambamānaṃ sukhaṃ yeṣu te kālā iti,
GK16andhvc3u:2789: sarva eva na tu sukhaṃ prati vartamānaḥ sa ko 'pi kālaleśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2790: pratīpānyupasthitāni vṛttāni pratyāvartamānāni tathā dūrabhāvīnyapi pratyupasthitāni nikaṭatayā vartamānāni bhavanti dāruṇāni duḥkhāni yeṣu te /
GK16andhvc3u:2791: duḥkhaṃ bahuprakārameva prativartamānāḥ sarve kālāṃśā ityanena kālasya tāvannirvedamabhivyañjayataḥ śāntarasavyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:2792: deśasyāpyāha--pṛthivī śvaḥ śvaḥ prātaḥ prātardināddinaṃ pāpīyadivasāḥ pāpānāṃ sambandhinaḥ pāpiṣṭhajanasvāmikā divasā yasyāṃ sā tathoktā /
GK16andhvc3u:2793: svābhāvata eva tāvatkālo duḥkhamayaḥ tatrāpi pāpiṣṭhajanasvāmikapṛthivīlakṣayauvanā
GK16andhvc3u:2794: vṛddhastrīvadasaṃbhāvyamānasaṃbhogā gatayauvanatayā hi yo yo divasa āgacchati bālapriyā
GK16andhvc3u:2814: śvaḥ śva ityasya gatayauvanetyanenāpi sambandha ityāha---śvaḥśva ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2815: gatayauvanetyasya mukhyārthaṃ tasya prakṛte bādhallakṣaṇānimittaṃ tatsārūpyaṃ ca darśayati--vṛddhetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2819: gatayauvaneti pāpīyānityatra hetugarbhaṃ pāpīyapadamarthāntaraparaṃ cetyanyathā vyācaṣṭe---gatetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2823: eṣāṃ ca subādīnāmekaikaśaḥ samuditānāṃ ca vyañjakatvaṃ mahākavīnāṃ prabandheṣu prāyeṇa dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2824: subantasya vyañjakatvaṃ yathā--- tālaiḥ śiñjadvayasubhagaiḥ kāntayā nartito me yāmadhyāste divasavigame nīlakaṇṭhaḥ suhṛdvaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2826: avasara rouṃ cia ṇimmiāiṃ mā puṃsa me haacchīiṃ /
GK16andhvc3u:2827: daṃsaṃṇamettumbhattehiṃ jahi hiaaṃ tuha ṇa ṇāam //
GK16andhvc3u:2828: locanam sa sa pūrvapūrvāpekṣayā pāpīyān nikṛṣṭatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:2829: yadiveyasunanto 'yaṃ śabdo muninaivaṃ prayukto ṇijanto vā /
GK16andhvc3u:2833: samuditatve tūdāharaṇaṃ dattaṃ vyastatve cojyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2835: apasara roditumeva nirmite mā puṃsaya hate akṣiṇī me /
GK16andhvc3u:2836: darśanamātronmattābhyāṃ yābhyāṃ tava hṛdayamevaṃrūpaṃ na jñātam //
GK16andhvc3u:2837: anmatto hi na kiñcijjānātīti na kasyāpyatrāparādhaḥ daivenetthameva nirmāṇaṃ bālapriyā pṛthivyā iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2838: nanu pāpīyānityuktārthaḥ kathaṃ labhyata ityatrāha---itasunanta iti /
GK16andhvc3u:2839: nanvasmin pakṣe pāpīyo divaseti bhāvyamityata āha--muninetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2840: ārṣo 'yaṃ prayoga ityarthaḥ. a6 pakṣāntaramāha---ṇijanto veti /
GK16andhvc3u:2841: muninā prayukta ityanuṣajyate ṇijanteyasunanto munināprayukto vetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2842: lokān pāpīyasaḥ karotītyarthe pāpīyaśśabdāṇṇaci kartaryavi ṭerṇicaśca lopādakārānto 'yaṃ pāpīyaśabda iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2856: rīditumeva nirmite sṛṣṭe me hatākṣiṇī kutsite nayane /
GK16andhvc3u:2867: mā panthaṃ rundhīo avehi bālaa ahosi ahirīo /
GK16andhvc3u:2870: aṇaṇatta vacca bālaa hṇā arnti kiṃ maṃ puloesieam /
GK16andhvc3u:2873: apasara mā vṛthā prayāsaṃ kārṣīḥ daivasya viparivartayitumaśakyatvāditi tiṅanto vyañjakaḥ tadanugṛhītāni padāntarāṇyapīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2874: mā panthānaṃ rudhaḥ apehi bālaka aprauḍha aho asi ahnīkaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2875: vayaṃ paratantrā yataḥ śūnyagṛhaṃ māmakaṃ rakṣaṇīyaṃ vartate //
GK16andhvc3u:2876: ityatrāpehīti tiṅantamidaṃ dhvanati--tvaṃ tāvadaprauḍho lokamadhye yadevaṃ prakāśayasi /
GK16andhvc3u:2878: 'anyatra vraja bālaka' aprauḍha buddhe snāntīṃ māṃ kiṃ prakarṣeṇālokayasyetat /
GK16andhvc3u:2881: atra jāyāto ye bhīravasteṣāmetatsathānamiti durāpetaḥ bālapriyā tiṅantaśabda itṣathaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2891: atra śloke śṛṅgāraḥ sambhogo vyaṅya pūrvaślorake tu vipralambha iti bhedaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2892: vṛttau--'aṇṇatte'ti anyatra vraja bālakasnāntīṃ kiṃ mā pralokayasyetat /
GK16andhvc3u:2895: jalāśaye snāntīṃ kañcidanurāgeṇa paśyantaṃ kañcana gṛhasthaṃ prati taṃ kāmayamānāyāstasyā uktiriyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2899: etattaṭaṃ jāyābhīrukāṇāṃ sambandhi na bhavatyeveti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:2902: tathāvidhānāmatra sthāne vartanarūpaḥ sambandho dūrāpeta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2910: nipātānāṃ vyañjakatvaṃ yathā--- ayamekapade tayā viyogaḥ priyayā copanataḥ suduḥsaho me /
GK16andhvc3u:2914: mukhamaṃsavivarti pakṣmalākṣyāḥ kathamapyunnamitaṃ na cumbitaṃ tu //
GK16andhvc3u:2917: upasargāṇāṃ vyañcakatvaṃ yathā--- nīvārāḥ śukagarbhakoṭaramukhabhraṣṭāstaruṇāmadhaḥ prasnigdhāḥ kvacidiṅgudīphalabhidaḥ sūcyanta evopalāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2918: viśvāsopagabhādabhinnagatayaḥ śabdaṃ sahante mṛgā- stoyādhārapathāśca valkalaśikhāniṣyandalekhāṅkitāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2921: kṛtaḥ kapratyayaprayogo yeṣu kāvyavākyeṣu yathā jāyābhīrukāṇāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:2922: ye hyarasajñā dharmapatnīṣu premaparatantrāstebhyaḥ ko 'nyo jagati kutsitaḥ sthāditi kapratyayo 'vajñātiśayadyotakaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2926: dvau caśabdāvevamāhatuḥ kākatālīyanyāyena gaṇḍasyopari sphoṭa itivattadviyogaśca varṣasamayaśca samamupanatau etadalaṃ prāṇaharaṇāya /
GK16andhvc3u:2929: paścāttāpasūcakassan tāvanmātraparicumbanalābhenāpi kṛtakṛtyatā syaditi dhvanatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2942: ityādau dvitrāṇāṃ copasargāṇāmekatra pade yaḥ prayogaḥ so 'pi rasavyaktyanuguṇatayaiva nirdeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2945: locanam vaiyākaraṇādigṛheṣu hi prākprayogasvātantryaprayogābhāvātṣaṣṭhyādyaśravaṇālliṅgasaṃkhyāvarahācca vācakavailakṣaṇyena dyotakā nipātā ityuddhoṣyata eveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2946: prakarṣeṇa snigdhā iti praśabdaḥ prakarṣaṃ dyotayanniṅgudīphalānāṃ sarasatvamācakṣāṇa āśramasya saundaryātiśayandhvanati /
GK16andhvc3u:2953: samyagbhūtamupāṃśukṛtvā ā samantāccarantamityanena lokānujighṛkṣātiśayastattadācarataḥ parameśvarasya dhvanitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2960: prākprayogaśca svātantrayeṇa prayogābhāvaśca tasmāt prākprayogāditi vyastatayā pāṭhaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:2961: sādhīyān upasargasaṃjñāviśiṣṭānāṃ prasākṣādityādīnāṃ nipātānāṃ dhātoḥ prāgeva prayogādivaivamādīnāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:2964: yathā candrasya candreṇa vā sadṛśaṃ mukhamityādau ṣaṣṭhyādikaṃ śrūyate,
GK16andhvc3u:2965: tathā candra ivetyādau ṣaṣṭhyādikaṃ na śrūyate yatastasmādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2976: ye prītyā vapuṣi na mānti sma,
GK16andhvc3u:2977: ye prasyandipramadāśravaḥ pulakitāḥ santaḥ pranṛtyanti smetyādyanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2981: ye svavapuṣīti pāṭhe tu jīvantītyādau nipātānāmapi tathaiva /
GK16andhvc3u:2983: yathā vā--- ye jīvanti na mānti ye sma vapuṣi prītyā pranṛtyanti ca prasyandipramadāśravaḥ pulakitā dṛṣṭe guṇinyūrjite /
GK16andhvc3u:2984: hā dhikkaṣṭamaho kva yāmi śaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ janānāṃ kṛte nītānāṃ pralayaṃ śaṭhena vidhinā sādhudviṣaḥ puṣyatā //
GK16andhvc3u:2987: yathā--- yadvañjanāhitamatirbahucāṭugarbhaṃ kāryonmukhaḥ khalajanaḥ kṛtakaṃ bravīti /
GK16andhvc3u:2988: tatsādhavo nana vidanta vidanti kintu kartu vṛthāprāṇayamasya na pārayanti //
GK16andhvc3u:2992: ślāghātiśayo nirvedātiśayaśca aho bateti hā dhigiti ca dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2996: ta eva hi sarvaṃ vidanti sutarāmiti dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2997: vākyapaunaruktyaṃ yathā---'paśya dvīpādanyasmādapi' iti vacanānantaraṃ 'kaḥ saṃdehaḥ dvīpādanyasmādapa' ityanenepsitaprāptiravidhnitaiva dhvanyate
GK16andhvc3u:2998: 'kiṃ kim? svassthā bhavanti mayi jīvati' ityanenāmarṣātiśayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3015: airā hohinti pahā maṇorahāṇaṃ pi dullaṅghā //
GK16andhvc3u:3018: iti chāyā) atra hyacirādbhaviṣyanti panthāna ityatra bhaviṣyantītyasmin pade pratyayaḥ kālaviśeṣābhidhāyī rasaparipoṣahetuḥ prakāśate /
GK16andhvc3u:3019: ayaṃ hi gāthārthaḥ pravāsavipralambhaśṛṅgāravibhāvatayā vibhāvyamāno rasavān /
GK16andhvc3u:3021: yathā---tadgehaṃ natamiti mandiramidaṃ labdhāvagāhaṃ divaḥ sā dhenurjaratī caranti kariṇāmetā dhanābhā dhaṭāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3022: sa kṣudo musaladhvaniḥ kalamidaṃ saṅgītakaṃ yoṣitā- māścaryaṃ divasaurdvijo 'yamiyatīṃ bhūmiṃ samāropitaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:3024: tiṅantapadānupravaṣṭasyāpyarthakalāpasya kārakakālasaṃkhyopagraharūpasya madhye 'nvayavyatarekābhyāṃ sūkṣmadṛśā bhāgagatamapi vyañjakatvaṃ vicāryamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3026: utprekṣyamāṇo varṣāsamayaḥ kampakārī kimuta vartamāna iti dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3037: samaviṣamāḥ samāḥ viṣamāśca deśāḥ nirviśeṣāḥ jalapravāhanimagnatayā ekarūpāḥ yeṣu te /
GK16andhvc3u:3049: atra śloke divasairityasmin pade prakṛtyaṃśo 'pi dyotakaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3051: atra ca sarvanāmnāmeva vyañjakatvaṃ hṛdi vyavasthāpya kavinā kvetyādiśabdaprayogo na kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3052: anayā diśā locanam divasārthe hyatrātyantāsambhāvyamānatāmasyārthasya dhvani /
GK16andhvc3u:3055: tena prakṛtyaṃśena sambhūta sarvanāmavyañjakaṃ dṛśyata ityuktaṃ bhavatīti na paunaruktyam /
GK16andhvc3u:3056: tathā hi taditi padaṃ natabhittītyetatprakṛtyaṃśasahāyaṃ samastāmaṅgalanidhānabhūtāṃ mūṣakādyākīrṇatāṃ dhvanati /
GK16andhvc3u:3058: na ca natabhittiśabdenāpyete daurbhāgyāyatanatvasūcakā viśeṣā uktāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3063: tadidaṃśabdādyabhāve tu sarvamasaṅgataṃ syaditi tadidamaṃśayoreva prāṇatvaṃ yojyam /
GK16andhvc3u:3064: etacca dviśaḥ sāmastyaṃ triśaḥ sāmastyamiti vyañjakamityupalakṣaṇaparam /
GK16andhvc3u:3069: nanu prakṛtyaṃśo dyotaka ityukatyaiva sarvanāmnāmapi vyañjakatve prāpte punastadvacanaṃ punaruktamityata āha---prakṛtyaṃśasya ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:3086: te locane ityatra pūrvamuktaṃ smārayati---evaṃvidha ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3100: dvayoḥ sambhūya tathā trayāṇāṃ sambhūya vyañjakatvamityetadupalakṣaṇamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3104: etacca sarvaṃ padavākyaracanādyotanoktyaiva gatārthamapi vaicitryeṇa vyutpattaye punaruktam /
GK16andhvc3u:3108: kiñjārthaviśeṣākṣepyatve 'pi rasādīnāṃ teṣāmarthaviśeṣāṇāṃ vyañjakaśabdāvinābhāvitvādyathāpradarśitaṃ vyañjakasvarūpaparijñānaṃ vibhajyopayujyata eva /
GK16andhvc3u:3109: śabdaviśeṣāṇāṃ cānyatra ca cārutvaṃ yadvibhāgenopadarśitaṃ tadapi teṣāṃ vyañjakatvenaivāvasthitamityavagantavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:3110: yatrāpi tatsamprati na pratibhāsate tatrāpi vyañjake racanāntare yaddṛṣṭaṃ sauṣṭhavaṃ teṣāṃ pravāhapatitānāṃ tadevābhyāsādapoddhṛtānāmapyavabhāsata ityavasātavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:3118: na vācakatvaṃ dhvanivyavahāropayogi yenāvācakasya vyañjakatvaṃ na syāt iti prāgevoktam /
GK16andhvc3u:3119: nanu na gītādivadrasābhivyañjakatve 'pi śabdasya tatra vyāpāro 'styeva ;
GK16andhvc3u:3126: srakcandanādayaḥ śabdāḥ śṛṅgāre cāravo bībhatse tvacārava iti rasakṛta eva vibhāgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3127: rasaṃ prati ca śabdasya vyañjakatvamevetyuktaṃ prāk /
GK16andhvc3u:3129: srakcandanādiśabdānāṃ tadānīṃ śṛṅgārādivyañjakatvābhāve 'pi vyañjakatvaśakterbhūyasā bālapriyā atropaṣṭambhakamāha - yadvattyatyanye 'pīti /
GK16andhvc3u:3133: vṛttāvanupadaṃ vakṣyamāṇasyādhikāṃśasya bodhanārthaṃ cākṣepaḥ kṛta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3145: ko 'nyathā tulye vācakatve śabdānāṃ cārutvaviṣayo viśeṣaḥ syat /
GK16andhvc3u:3146: anya evāsau sahṛdayasaṃvedya iti cet kimidaṃ sahṛdayatvaṃ nāma?
GK16andhvc3u:3149: pūrvasmin pakṣe tathāvidhasahṛdayavyavasthāpitānāṃ śabdaviśeṣāṇāṃ cārutvaniyamo na syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3152: tathāvidhaiḥ sahṛdayaiḥ saṃvedyo rasādisamarpaṇasāmarthyameva naisargikaṃ śabdānāṃ viśeṣa iti vyañjakatvāśrayyeva teṣāṃ mukhyaṃ cārutvam /
GK16andhvc3u:3154: tathāhi-'taṭī tāraṃ tāmyati' ityatra taṭaśabdasya puṇṭaśabdasya puṃstvanapuṃsakatve anādṛtya strītvamevāśritaṃ sahṛdayaiḥ 'strīti nāmāpi madhuraṃ' iti kṛtvā /
GK16andhvc3u:3155: yathā vāsmadupādhyāyasya vidvatkavisahṛdayacakravartino bhaṭṭendurājasya--- indīvaradyuti yadā bibhṛyānna lakṣma syurvismayaikasuhṛdo 'sya yadā vilāsāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3169: tathāpi kapolatalakomalakāntiḥ kiṃ kiṃ syānnāmeti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3177: candraṃ vilokya madhyasthasya kasyacidrasikasya vacana ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3181: evaṃ rasādīnāṃ vyañjakasvarūpamabhidhāya teṣāmeva virodhirūpaṃ lakṣayitumidamupakramyate---
GK16andhvc3u:3182: prabandhe muktake vāpi rasādīn bandhum icchatā /
GK16andhvc3u:3183: yatnaḥ kāryaḥ sumatinā parihāre virodhinām // DhvK_3.17 //
GK16andhvc3u:3186: prabandhe muktake vāpi rasabhāvanibandhanaṃ pratyādṛtamanāḥ kavirvirodhipahihāre paraṃ yatnamādadhīta /
GK16andhvc3u:3187: anyathā tvasya rasamayaḥ śloka eko 'pi samyaṅna samapdyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3188: locanam aniyantrītapuruṣecchāyatto hi samayaḥ kathaṃ niyataḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3194: śabdāntareṇa saha yā racanā tadapekṣo 'sau viśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3196: ata eva racanayā prasādena cārutvena copabṛṃhitā eva śabdāḥ kāvye yojyā iti tātparyam // 15// ,16 //
GK16andhvc3u:3197: rasādīnāṃ yadvyañjakaṃ varṇapadādiprabandhāntaṃ tasya svarūpamabhidhāyeti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3199: virodhināmapi lakṣaṇakaraṇe prayojanamucyate śakyahānatvaṃ nāma anayā kārikayā /
GK16andhvc3u:3201: nanu 'vibhāvabhāvānubhāvasañcāryaucityacāruṇaḥ' iti yaduktaṃ tata eva vyatirekamukhenaitadapyavagaṃsyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3202: maivam ;vyatirekeṇa hi tadabhāvamātraṃ pratīyate na tu tadviruddham /
GK16andhvc3u:3203: tadabhāvamātraṃ ca na tathā dūṣakaṃ yathā tadviruddham /
GK16andhvc3u:3204: pathyānupayogo hi na tathā vyādhiṃ bālapriyā śabdagato viśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3210: śakyahānatvaṃ nāma prayojanamanayā kārakayā ucyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3211: virodhināṃ lakṣaṇe jñāte teṣāṃ parihāraḥ śakya iti tadeva prayojanamityarthaḥ // 17 //
GK16andhvc3u:3215: vibhāvādyaucityaśālinaḥ kathāśarīrasya vidhirityādinā tadaucityavirahiṇo vidhirna kārya ityādyathamātramityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3218: vṛttau 'śāntā'dīti kāni punastāni virodhīni yāni yatnataḥ kaveḥ parihartavyānītyucyate--
GK16andhvc3u:3221: akāṇḍa eva vicchittir akāṇḍe ca prakāśanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3223: rasasya syād virodhāya vṛtty-anaucityam eva ca // DhvK_3.19 //
GK16andhvc3u:3229: prastutarasāpekṣayā virodhī yo rasastasya sambandhināṃ vibhāvabhāvānubhāvānāṃ parigraho rasavirodhahetukaḥ sambhavanīyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3230: tatra virodhirasavibhāvaparigraho yathā śāntarasavibhāveṣu tadvibhāvatayaiva nirūpiteṣvanantarameva śṛṅgārādivibhāvavarṇane /
GK16andhvc3u:3231: virodhirasabhāvaparigraho yathā priyaṃ prati praṇayakalahakupitāsu kāminīṣu vairāgyakathābhiranunaye /
GK16andhvc3u:3232: virodhirasānubhāvaparigraho yathā praṇayakupitāyāṃ priyāyāmaprasīdantyāṃ nāyakasya kopāveśavivaśasya raudrānubhāvavarṇane /
GK16andhvc3u:3238: 'alaṅkṛtīnām' ityanena yaduktaṃ tadviruddhamanyadapi ca viruddhaṃ vṛtyanaucityamityanena /
GK16andhvc3u:3242: virodhinī rasasya yo bhāvo vyabhicārī tasya parigrahaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:3243: virodhinastu yaḥ sthāyī sthāyitayā bālapriyā 'śṛṅgārādī'ci ca nirdeśe bījamāha---hāsyaśṛṅgārayārityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3248: pratipattaryekasmin śame udbuddhe tadavyavadhānena rāgodbodhāsambhavāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3249: ataḥ śāntavibhāve varṇite tadanantarameva śṛṅgārādivibhāvavarṇanaṃ na kāyam /
GK16andhvc3u:3250: virodhirasasyetyādigranthaṃ ayaṃ cānyo rasabhaṅgaheturyatprastutarasāpekṣayā vastuno 'nyasya kathañcidanvitasyāpi vistareṇa kathanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3251: yathā vipralambhaśṛṅgāre nāyakasya kasyacadvarṇayitumupakrānte kaveryamakādyalaṅkāranibandhanarasikatayā mahatā prabandhena parvatādivarṇane
GK16andhvc3u:3252: ayaṃ cāparo rasabhaṅgaheturavagantavyo yadakāṇḍa locanam tatparigraho 'sambhavanīya eva tadanutthānaprasaṅgāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3255: vairāgyakathāmirita vairāgyaśabdena nirvedaḥ śāntasya yaḥ sthāyī sa uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3256: yathā---'prasāde vartasva prakaṭaya mudaṃ santyaja ruṣam' ityādyupakramyārthāntaranyāso 'na mugdhe pratyetuṃ prabhavati gataḥ kālahariṇaḥ' iti
GK16andhvc3u:3259: na hi jñātaśuktikārajatatattvastadupādeyadhiyaṃ bhajate ṛte saṃvṛtimātrāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3260: kathābhiriti bahuvacanaṃ śāntarasasya vyabhicāriṇo dhṛtiṃ matiprabhṛtīn saṅgṛhṇāta /
GK16andhvc3u:3262: kimuta vistarata ityāha---kathañjidanvitasyeti bālapriyā vivṛṇoti---virodhina ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3267: svata eva vyabhicāriṇaḥ vyabhicāratvena sthāyinaśca bodhanāya bhāva iti sāmānyata uktamityathaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3271: nidhānaṃ saukhyānāṃ kṣaṇamabhimukhaṃ sthāpaya mukham' iti dvitīyatṛtīyapādau /
GK16andhvc3u:3273: gataḥ kāla eva hariṇaḥ asthiratvāt pratyetuṃ pratyāgantum na prabhavati sa punarnāgacchatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3274: atra śāntasya vibhāvaḥ kālānityatvalakṣaṇo nibandhaḥ tatprakāśito nirvedo vyabhicārī
GK16andhvc3u:3275: cetyato 'tra virodhirasavibhāvabhāvayoḥ parigrahaḥ sa ca prakṛtarasapratikūla ityāha---manāgapītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3280: jñātaṃ viṣayāṇāṃ satatvaṃ duḥkhamiśritatvapariṇāmavirasatvādinā heyatvarūpaṃ tattvaṃ yena saḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3295: eva vicchittiḥ rasasyākāṇḍa eva ca prakāśanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3296: tatrānavasare virāmo rasasya yathā nāyakasya kasyacitspṛhaṇīyasamāgamayā nāyikayā
GK16andhvc3u:3297: kayācitparāṃ paripoṣapadarvī prāpte śṛṅgāre vidite ca paramparānurāge samāgamopāyacintocitaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:3299: anavasare ca prakāśanaṃ rasasya yathā pravṛtte pravṛttavividhavīrasaṅkṣaye kalpasaṅkṣayakalpe
GK16andhvc3u:3302: na caivaṃvidhe viṣaye daivavyāmohitatvaṃ kathāpuruṣasya parihāro yato rasabandha eva kaveḥ prādhānyena pravṛttinibandhanaṃ yuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:3303: itivṛttavarṇanaṃ tadupāya evetyuktaṃ prāk 'ālokārthī yathā dīpaśikhāyāṃ yatnavāñjanaḥ' ityādinā /
GK16andhvc3u:3304: ata eva cetivṛttamātravarṇanaprādhānye 'ṅgāṅgibhāvarahitarasabhāvanibandhena ca kavīnāmevaṃvidhāni skhalitāni bhavantīti rasādirūpavyaṅgyatātparyamevaiṣāṃ locanam vyāpārāntareti /
GK16andhvc3u:3306: api tāvaditi śabdābhyāṃ duryodhanādestadvarṇanaṃ dūrāpāstamiti veṇīsaṃhāre dvitīyāṅkamevodāharaṇatvena dhvanati /
GK16andhvc3u:3311: yato rasabandha eva mukhyaḥ kavivyāpāraviṣayaḥ itivṛttamātravarṇanaprādhānye bālapriyā rāmadevaprāyasyāpi tāvadityatratyābhyāṃ tāmyāmityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:3331: vṛttau prādhānye sati yadibandhanaṃ tasminniti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3333: punaścāyamanyo rasabhaṅgaheturavadhāraṇīyo yatparipoṣaṃ gatasyāpi rasasya paunaḥ--punyena dīpanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3334: ubhayukto hi rasaḥ svasāmagrīlabdhaparipoṣaḥ punaḥ punaḥ parāmṛśyamāṇaḥ parimlānakusumakalpaḥ kalpate /
GK16andhvc3u:3336: yathā nāyakaṃ prati nāyikāyāḥ kasyāściducitāṃ bhaṅgimantareṇa svayaṃ sambhogābhilāṣakathane /
GK16andhvc3u:3337: yadi vā vṛttīnāṃ bharataprasiddhānāṃ kaiśikyādīnāṃ kāvyālaṅkārāntaraprasiddhānāmupanāgarikādyānāṃ vā yadanaucityamaviṣaye nibandhanaṃ tadapi rasabhaṅgahetuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3338: evameṣāṃ rasavirodhināmanyeṣāṃ cānayā diśā svayamutprekṣitānāṃ parihāre satkavibhiravahitairbhavitavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:3341: nīrasastu prabandho yaḥ so 'paśabdo mahān kaveḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3343: locanam sati yadaṅgāṅgibhāvarahitānāmavicāritaguṇapradhānabhāvānāṃ rasabhāvānāṃ nibandhanaṃ tannimittāni skhalitāni sarve doṣā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3345: vyaṅgyo 'rtho bhavatu mā vā bhūt kastatrābhiniveśaḥ?
GK16andhvc3u:3347: vṛttyanaucityameva cetibahudā vyācaṣṭe tadapītyanena caśabdaṃ kārikāgataṃ vyācaṣṭe /
GK16andhvc3u:3351: nāyakasya hi dhīrodāttādibhedabhinnasya sarvathā vīrarasānuvedhena bhavitavyamiti taṃ prati kātarapuruṣocitamadhairyayojanaṃ duṣṭameva /
GK16andhvc3u:3355: nanu kālidāsaḥ bālapriyā cakārau vākyālaṅkāre ityāśayena vyācaṣṭe---itivṛttetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3360: nāyakaṃ prati nāyakayā svayaṃ sambhogābhilāṣasya kathane nibaddhe nāyakasyādhairyayojanamāpatati,
GK16andhvc3u:3366: vṛttau 'ucitāṃ bhaṅgimantareṇe' pūrve viśṛṅkhalagiraḥ kavayaḥ prāptakīrtayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3372: bādhyānām aṅga-bhāvaṃ vā prāptānām uktir acchalā // DhvK_3.20 //
GK16andhvc3u:3375: svasāmagnyā labdhaparipoṣe tu vivakṣite rase virodhināṃ virodhirasāṅgānāṃ bādhyānāmaṅgabhāvaṃ vā prāptanāṃ satāmuktiradoṣā /
GK16andhvc3u:3376: bādhyatvaṃ hi virodhināṃ śakyābhibhavatve sati nānyathā /
GK16andhvc3u:3378: aṅgabhāvaṃ prāptānāṃ ca teṣāṃ virodhitvameva nivartate /
GK16andhvc3u:3380: tatra yeṣāṃ naisargikī teṣāṃ tāvaduktāvavirodha eva /
GK16andhvc3u:3381: yathā vipralambhaśṛṅgāre tadaṅgānāṃ locanam paripoṣaṃ gatasyāpi karuṇasya rativilāseṣu paunaḥpunyena dīpanamakārṣīt,
GK16andhvc3u:3383: na hi vasiṣṭhādibhiḥ kathañcidyadi smṛtimārgastyaktastadvayamapi tathā tyajāmaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3386: evaṃ virodhināṃ parihāre sāmānyenokte pratiprasavaṃ viyataviṣayamāha---vivakṣita itī /
GK16andhvc3u:3392: bālapriyā tyenena bhaṅgyā tatkathanaṃ duṣyantādernāyakasyeva nāyikāyā api na doṣa iti darśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:3407: tadaṅgatve ca sambhavatyapi maraṇasyopanyāso na jyāyān /
GK16andhvc3u:3409: karuṇasaya tu tathāvide viṣaye paripoṣo bhaviṣyatīti cet-na;
GK16andhvc3u:3414: rasabandhapradhānena kavinā locanam tatra prathamaṃ svābhāvikaprakāraṃ nirūpayati---tadaṅgānāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:3415: nirapekṣabhāvatayā sāpekṣabhāvavapralambhaśṛṅgāravirodhinyapi karuṇe ye vyādhyādayassarvathāṅgatvena dṛṣṭāḥ teṣāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:3416: te hi karuṇe bhavantyeva ta eva ca bhavantīti /
GK16andhvc3u:3417: śṛṅgāre tu bhavantyeva nāpi ta eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:3427: nanvevaṃ sarva eva vyabhicāriṇa iti vighaṭitamityāśaṅkyāha---śṛṅgāre veti /
