GK16andhvc3u:3428: adīrghakāle yatramaraṇe viśrāntipadabandha eva notpadyate tatrāsya vyabhicāritvam /
GK16andhvc3u:3430: yadi tādṛśīṃ bhaṅgiṃ ghaṭayituṃ sukaveḥ kauśalaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:3436: karuṇe bhavantyeva te eva bhavantīti dvedhā niyama ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3440: ālasyaugnyajugupsāvarjāssarvaṃ eva vyabhicāriṇa iti muninā uktatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3447: maraṇādūrdhvamadīrgho yaḥ kālastasmiṃstena vā pratyāpattiḥ nāyakayoḥ samāgamastatsambhave satītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3452: kāvyānuśāsane 'pyevamuktam--“śṛṅgāre tu maraṇādhyavasāyo tatra labdhapratiṣṭhe tu
GK16andhvc3u:3453: vivakṣite rase virodhirasāṅgānāṃ bādhyatvenoktāvadoṣo yathā--- kvākāryaṃ śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:3454: kva ca kulaṃ bhūyo 'pi dṛśyeta sā doṣāṇāṃ praśamāya me śrutamaho kope 'pi kāntaṃ mukham /
GK16andhvc3u:3455: kiṃ vakṣyantyapakalmaṣāḥ kṛtadhiyaḥ svapne 'pi sā durlabhā cetaḥ svāsthyamupaihi kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ pāsyati //
GK16andhvc3u:3456: locanam pūrvākārādhikacaturayā saṅgataḥ kāntayāsau līlāgāreṣvaramata punarnandanābhyantareṣu //
GK16andhvc3u:3458: ata eva sukavinā maraṇe padabandhamātraṃ na kṛtam,
GK16andhvc3u:3460: padabandhaniveśe tu sarvathā śokodaya evātiparimitakālapratyāpattilābhe 'pi atha dūraparāmarśakasahṛdayasāmājikābhiprāyeṇa maraṇasyādīrghakālapratyāpatteraṅgatocyate,
GK16andhvc3u:3461: hanta tāpasavatsarāje 'pi yaugandharāyaṇādinītimārgākarṇanasaṃskṛtamatīnāṃ vāsavadattāmaraṇabuddherevābhāvātkaruṇasya nāmāpi na syādityalamavāntareṇa bahunā /
GK16andhvc3u:3467: bālapriyā maraṇādūrdhvaṃ jhaṭiti punaryogo vā nibadhyata'iti /
GK16andhvc3u:3476: prapūrvaślokena saṅgamāśāyā varṇitatvādatra maraṇasya vipralambhāṅgatvaṃ sphuṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3481: atiparimito 'lyalpaḥ kālastena pratyāpatteḥ saṅgamasya lābhaḥ sambhavaḥ pratītirvā tasminnapītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3488: ayuktakathanahetuko viṣādo vismayo vā hantetyanena prakāśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3500: yathā vā puṇḍarīkasya mahāśvetāṃ prati pravṛttanirbharānurāgasya dvitīyamunikumāropadeśavarṇane /
GK16andhvc3u:3501: svābhāvikyāmaṅgabhāvaprāptāvadoṣo yathā--- bhramimaratimalasahṛdayatāṃ pralayaṃ mūrcchāṃ tamaḥ śarīrasādam /
GK16andhvc3u:3502: maraṇaṃ ca jaladabhujagajaṃ prasahya kurute viṣaṃ viyoginīnām //
GK16andhvc3u:3506: iyaṃ locanam vitarka autsukyena matiḥ smṛtyā śaṅkā dainyena dhṛtiścintayā ca bādhyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3512: pāṇḍukṣāmaṃ vaktraṃ hadayaṃ sarasaṃ tavālasaṃ ca vapuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3514: atra karuṇocito vyādhiḥ śleṣabhaṅgyā sthāpitaḥ kopāditi badhveti hanyata iti ca raudrānubhāvanāṃ rūpakabalādāropitānāṃ tadanirvāhādevāṅgatvam
GK16andhvc3u:3530: atra karuṇocatavyādheranubhāvānāṃ bhramyādīnāṃ vipralambhe 'pi sambhavānnaisargikī aṅgatā /
GK16andhvc3u:3538: kṣetriyo rogaḥ kṣayaroga iti kecit tam /
GK16andhvc3u:3541: atra karuṇocitavyādheḥ vipralambhe samāropādaṅgatetyāha locane - atretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3552: vṛttau aṅgabhāvagamanaṃ yadiyaṃ cāṅgabhāvaprāptiranyā yadādhikārikatvātpradhāna ekasminvākyārthe rasayorbhāvayorvā parasparavirodhinordvayoraṅgabhāvagamanaṃ tasyāmapi na doṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3556: anyaparatve 'pi virodhinoḥ kathaṃ virodhanivṛttiriti cet, ucyate--
GK16andhvc3u:3568: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ---sāmagrīviśeṣapatitatvena bhāvānāṃ virodhāvirodhau na svabhāvamātranibandhanau śītoṣṇayorapi virodhābhāvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3570: tadeva kuru mā kārṣīriti bālapriyā cānyā aṅgabhāvaprāptiriti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3587: ayamarthaḥ---padārthānāṃ madhye kasyacitkenacitsaha virodhaścāvirodhaśca svabhāvamātrakṛtau na,
GK16andhvc3u:3589: atra tadvirodho nāma tadasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tadutpattipratibandhaśca ghaṭatvādīnāṃ paṭatvādibhiśśītasparśadīnāmuṇṇasparśādibhiśca sahāsāmānādhikaraṇyarūpo virodhaḥ svabhāvakṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3590: evaṃ teṣāṃ dravyatvādibhiḥ rūpādiguṇaiśca saha sāmānādhikaraṇyarūpāvirodhaśca bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3593: vithisthale pravṛttisāmagrīṃ niṣedhasthale nivṛttisāmagrīṃ cādāya tadanupraveśena virodhāvirodhau grāhyāviti /
GK16andhvc3u:3608: ata evātirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇantīti viruddhavidhirvikalpaparyavasāyīti vākyavidaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3611: bālapriyā ata eva viruddhāyorekatraikadā prādhānyasya duṣṭatvādeva /
GK16andhvc3u:3613: atirātre atirātrayāge ṣoḍaśinaṃ somapātraviśeṣam gṛhṇanti yathā---- ehi gaccha patottiṣṭha vada maunaṃ samācara /
GK16andhvc3u:3616: atra hi vidhipratiṣedhayoranūdyamānatvena samāveśe na virodhastathehāpi bhaviṣyati /
GK16andhvc3u:3619: locanam krīḍāṅgatve na hyatra viruddhānāmarthānāmabhidhānamiti rājanikaṭavyavasthitātatāyidvayanyāyena viruddhānāmapyanyamukhaprekṣitāparatantrīkṛtānāṃ yena virodhaḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3620: kevalaṃ viruddhatvādaruṇādhikaraṇasthityā bālapriyā gṛhṇīyuḥ iti ṣoḍaśigrahaṇaṃ vihitam /
GK16andhvc3u:3621: punaśca “nātirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇātī“tyanena tanniṣiddhañceti yadyapi grahaṇāgrahaṇayorviruddhayorvidhiḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:3622: tathāpi sa vidhiḥ ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇīyānna gṛhṇīyādvā iti vikalpe paryavasyatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3630: atra ehīti krīḍanti gaccheti krīḍantītyādirītyā bhāvābhāvarūpayorapi gamanāgamanādyoḥ
GK16andhvc3u:3639: rājanikaṭavyavasthitau rājāśrayatvena sthitau yāvātatāthinau mitho vaireṇa vadhodyatau puruṣau tayordveyaṃ tannyāyenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3642: autena krameṇa ehi gacchetyādiśrutikramema yaḥ svātmanāṃ parāmarśaḥ pratītaḥ tasmin satyapi /
GK16andhvc3u:3647: parasparasya yadrūpaṃ svabhāvaḥ taccintāyāṃ kā kathā taccintā nodetyevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3653: paścāt parasparānvayaḥ--- na ca raseṣu vidhyanuvādavyavahāro nāstīti śakyaṃ vaktum,
GK16andhvc3u:3655: vākyārthasya vācyasya ca yau vidhyanuvādau tau locanam yo vākyīya eṣāṃ pāścātyaḥ sambandhaḥ sambhāvyate sa vighaṭatām /
GK16andhvc3u:3658: na ca rasasya vācyatvaṃ tvayaiva soḍhamityāśaṅkamānaḥ pariharati---na ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:3660: tau ca vyaṅgyatāyāmapi bhavata eveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3661: mukhyatayā ca rasa eva kāvyavākyārtha ityuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:3696: dṛśyate viruddhobhayasahakāriṇaḥ kāraṇātkāryaviśeṣotpattiḥ viruddhaphalotpādanahetutvaṃ hi yugapadekasya kāraṇasya viruddhaṃ na tu viruddhobhayasahakāritvam
GK16andhvc3u:3697: locanam yadi vā mā bhūdanūdyamānatayā viruddhayo rasayoḥ samāveśaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:3698: sahakāritayā tu bhaviṣyatīti sarvathāviruddhayoryuktiyukto 'ṅgāṅgibhāvo nātra prayāsaḥ kaściditi darśayati--yaivati /
GK16andhvc3u:3700: kāvyārtho vibhāvādirnimittaṃ yeṣāṃ rasādīnāṃ te tathā teṣāṃ bhāvastattā /
GK16andhvc3u:3701: anūdyamānā ye hastakṣepādayo rasāṅgabhūtā vibhāvādayastannimittaṃ yadubhayaṃ karuṇavipralambhātmakaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:3704: viruddhaṃ yadubhayaṃ vāritejogataṃ śītoṣṇaṃ tatsahakāri yasya taṇḍulādeḥ kāraṇasya tasmātkāryaviśeṣasya komalabhaktakaraṇalakṣaṇasyotpattirdṛśyate
GK16andhvc3u:3708: nanvabhineyārthe kāvye yadīdṛśaṃ vākyaṃ bhavettadā bālapriyā anvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3712: anūdyamānāṅgetyādikaṃ kṣipta ityādiśloke yojayan vyācaṣṭe---anūdyamānā ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3713: hastakṣepādayo vibhāvādaya ityatra yathāsaṃkhyenānvayo na vivakṣitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3733: yaḥ karuṇo rasaḥ sa parīkṣakāṇāṃ na vaiklavyamādadhāti locanam yadi samastābhinayaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:3734: kriyate tadā viruddhārthaviṣayaḥ kathaṃ yugapadabhinayaḥ kartuṃ śakya ityāśayenāśaṅkamāna āha--evamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:3736: anūdyamānamevaṃvidhaṃ viruddhākāraṃ vācyaṃ yatra tādṛśo yo viṣayaḥ 'ehi gaccha patottiṣṭha' ityādistatra yā vārtā sātrāpīti /
GK16andhvc3u:3737: etaduktaṃ bhavati---'kṣipto hastāvalagna' ityādau prādhānyena bhītaviplutādidṛṣṭyupapādanakrameṇa prākariṇakastāvadarthaḥ pradarśayitavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3738: yadyapyatra karuṇo 'pi parāṅgameva tathāpi vipralambhāpekṣayā tasya tāvannikaṭaṃ prākaraṇikatvaṃ maheśvaraprabhāvaṃ prati sopayogatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3740: evaṃ ca sāsranetrotpalābhiratyantaṃ prādhānyena karuṇopayogābhinayakrameṇa leśatastu vipralambhasya karuṇena sādṛśyātsūcanāṃ kṛtvā /
GK16andhvc3u:3741: kāmīvetyatra yadyapi praṇayakopocito 'bhinayaḥ kṛtastathāpi tataḥ pratīyamāno 'pyasau
GK16andhvc3u:3742: vipralambhaḥ samanantarābhinīyamāne sa dahatu duritamityādau sāṭopābhinayasamarpito
GK16andhvc3u:3749: kintu vīrasya yo 'sau krodho vyabhicāratāṃ pratipadyate tatphalarūpo 'sau karuṇarasaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3769: vaiklavyamityasya pratyuta prītyatiśayanimittatāṃ pratipadyata ityatastasya kuṇṭhaśaktikatvāttadvirodhavidhāyino na kaściddoṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3770: tasmādvākyārthībhūtasya rasasya bhāvasya vā virodhī rasavirodhīti vaktuṃ nyāyyaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:3772: locanam yathoktam--'raudrasya caiva yatkarma sa jñeyaḥ karuṇo rasaḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:3774: atrodāharaṇam--- kurabaka kucāghātakrīḍāsukhena viyujyase bakulaviṭapin smartavyaṃ te mukhāsavasevanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3775: caraṇaghaṭanāśūnyo yāsyasyaśoka saśokatā- miti nijapuratyāge yasya dviṣāṃ jagaduḥ strayaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:3777: tasmin rase sthāyinaḥ pradhānabhūtasya vyabhicāriṇo vā yathā vipralambhaśṛṅgāra autsukyasya /
GK16andhvc3u:3781: sa pādāghātādaśokastilakakuravakau vīkṣaṇālaṅganābhyām strīṇāṃ sparśātpriyaṅgurvikasati bakulaśśīdhugaṇḍūṣasekāt //
GK16andhvc3u:3803: aṅgabhūtasya kasyacidrasasya bhāvasya vā virodhī rasavirodhīti vaktuṃ na nyāyya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3804: tathācāṅgabhūtasya kasyacidvirodhī yo lasaḥ tatsambandhiparigraho na doṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3806: bhāvasya vetyatra bhāvapadena sthāyī vyabhicārī ca vivakṣita ityāha locane---tasminnityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3809: athavā vākyārthībhūtasyāpi kasyacitkaruṇarasaviṣayasya tādṛśena śṛṅgāravastunā bhaṅgiviśeṣāśrayeṇa saṃyojanaṃ rasaparipoṣāyaiva jāyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3810: yataḥ prakṛtimadhurāḥ padārthāḥ śocaniyatāṃ prāptāḥ pragavasthābhāvibhiḥ saṃsmaryamāṇairvilāsairadhikataraṃ śokāveśamupajanayanti /
GK16andhvc3u:3811: yathā--- locanam adhunā pūrvasminneva śloke kṣipta ityādau prakārāntareṇa virodhaṃ pariharati---athaveti /
GK16andhvc3u:3813: adhunā tu sa vipralambhaḥ karuṇasyaivāṅgatāṃ pratipannaḥ kathaṃ virodhīti vyavasthāpyate---tathā hi karuṇo raso nāmeṣṭajanavinipātādervibhāvādityuktam
GK16andhvc3u:3816: śāṃbhavaśaravahniceṣṭitāvalokane prāktanapraṇayakalahavṛttāntaḥ smaryamāṇa idānīṃ vidhvastatayā śokavibhāvatāṃ pratipadyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3819: atha veti ityasya sthāne athavetyādinā doṣābhāva ityanteneti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3823: apiśabdaḥ anantaroktanītyā rasaparapoṣaṇe āpātato virodhaṃ dyotayati 'kasyacidi'ti /
GK16andhvc3u:3835: adhunā tu ityasya iti vyavasthāpyata ityanena sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3854: naṣṭatayetyarthaḥ śokavibhāvatāmityasyānantaraṃ prakṛṣṭāmiti ca kvacit pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3856: tathācātra viśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyanyāyena vipralambhopaskṛtaḥ karuṇaḥ tripuraripuprabhāvātiśayaṃ ayaṃ sa raśanotkarṣī pīnastanavimardanaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3859: tadatra tripurayuvatīnāṃ śāmbhavaḥ śarāgnirārdrāparādhaḥ kāmī yathā vyavaharati sama tathā vyavahṛtavānityanenāpi prakāreṇāstyeva nirvirodhatvam
GK16andhvc3u:3860: tasmādyathā yathā nirūpyate tatā tathātra doṣābhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3861: ityaṃ ca---- krāmantyaḥ kṣayakomalāṅgulivaladraktaiḥ sadarbhāḥ sthalīḥ pādaiḥ pātitayāvakairiva patadbāṣpāmbudhautānanāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3862: bhītā bhartṛkarāvalambitakarāstvadvairinārthādhunā dāvāgniṃ parito bhramanti punarapyudyadvivāhā iva //
GK16andhvc3u:3865: idānīṃ teṣāmekaprabandhaviniveśane nyāyyo yaḥ kramastaṃ pratipādayitumucyate--
GK16andhvc3u:3868: atra bhūriśravasaḥ samarabhuvi nipatitaṃ bāhuṃ dṛṣṭvā tatkāntānāmetadanuśocanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3869: raśanāṃ mekhalāṃ sambhogā vasareṣūrdhvaṃ karṣatīti rasanotkarṣī /
GK16andhvc3u:3870: amunā virodhoddharaṇaprakāreṇa bahutaraṃ lakṣyamupapāditaṃ bhavatītyabhiprāyeṇāha--itthaṃ ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:3877: bālapriyā tadālambitaṃ itibhāvaṃ vā upaskarotīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3891: eko raso 'ṅgīkartavyas teṣām utkarṣam icchatā // DhvK_3.21 //
GK16andhvc3u:3894: prabandheṣu mahākāvyādiṣu nāṭakādiṣu vā viprakīrṇatayāṅgāṅgibhāvena bahavo rasā upanibadhyanta
GK16andhvc3u:3895: ityatra prasiddhau satyāmapi yaḥ prabandhānāṃ chāyātiśayayogamicchati tena teṣāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:3896: rasānāmanyatamaḥ kaścidvivakṣito raso 'ṅgitvena viniveśayitavya ityayaṃ yuktataro mārgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3897: nanu rasāntareṣu bahuṣu prāptaparipoṣeṣu satsu kathamekasyāṅgitā na virudhyata ityāśaṅkyedamucyate--
GK16andhvc3u:3902: prabandheṣu prathamataraṃ prastutaḥ san punaḥ punaranusandhīyamānatvena sthāyī yo rasastasya sakalabandhavyāpino rasāntarairantarālavartibhiḥ samāveśo yaḥ locanam prasiddhe 'piti /
GK16andhvc3u:3912: yadyapi ramavakārādau paryāyabandhādau ca naikasyāṅgitvaṃ tathāpi nāyuktatā tasyāpyevaṃvidho
GK16andhvc3u:3913: yaḥ prabandhaḥ tadyathā nāṭakaṃ mahākāvyaṃ vā tadutkṛṣṭataramiti taraśabdasyārthaḥ // 21 //
GK16andhvc3u:3916: alabdhaparipoṣatve vā kathaṃ rasatvamiti rasatvamaṅgatvaṃ cānyonyaviruddhaṃ teṣāṃ cāṅgatvāyoge kathamekasyāṅgitvamuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3918: prastutasya samastetivṛttavyāpinastata eva vitatavyāptikatvenāṅgibhāvocitasya bālapriyā krama ityenena teṣāmityasya sambandha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3922: tathāpi ca tasyāpi nāyuktatā iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3933: kāryam ekaṃ yathā vyāpi prabandhasya vidhīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3934: tathā rasasyāpi vidhau virodho naiva vidyate // DhvK_3.23 //
GK16andhvc3u:3936: tathā rasasyāpi vidhau virodho naiva vidyate // 23 //
GK16andhvc3u:3937: locanam rasasya rasāntarairitivṛttavaśāyātatvena parimitakathāśakalavyāpibhiryaḥ samāveśaḥ samupabṛṃhaṇaṃ sa tasya sthāyitvenetivṛttavyāpitayā bhāsamānasya nāṅgitāmupahanti,
GK16andhvc3u:3939: etaduktaṃ bhavati---aṅgabhūtānyapi rasāntarāṇi svavibhāvādisāmagnyā svāvasthāyāṃ yadyapi labdhaparipoṣāṇi camatkāragocaratāṃ pratipadyante,
GK16andhvc3u:3940: tathāpi sa camatkārastāvatyeva na parituṣya viśrāmyati kiṃ tu camatkārāntaramanudhāvati /
GK16andhvc3u:3942: yathāha tatrabhavān--- guṇaḥ kṛtātmasaṃskāraḥ pradhānaṃ pratipadyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3953: tathaiva tenaiva prakāreṇa kāryāṅgāṅgibhāvarūpeṇa rasānāmapi balādevāsāvāpatatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3956: 'svalpamātraṃ samutsṛṣṭaṃ bahudhā yadvisarpati' iti lakṣitaṃ bījam /
GK16andhvc3u:3958: 'kathamekasyāṅgitā na' ityasya sthāne ekasyāṅgiteti pāṭhaśca dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3964: anyena kṛtātmasaṃskāraḥ san tathā kṛtātmasaṃskāraḥ guṇaḥ pradhānasya aṅginaḥ bhūyasi upakāre vartate bhūyase upakārāya bhavati hi /
GK16andhvc3u:3980: sandhyādimayasya prabandhaśarīrasya yathā kāryamekamanuyāyi vyāpakaṃ kalpyate na ca tatkāryāntarairna saṅkīryate,
GK16andhvc3u:3981: na ca taiḥ saṅkīryamāṇasyāpi tasya prādhānyamapacīyate,
GK16andhvc3u:3982: tathaiva rasasyāpyekasya sanniveśe kriyamāṇe virodho na kaścit /
GK16andhvc3u:3983: pratyuta pratyuditavivekānāmanusandhānavatāṃ sacetasāṃ tathāvidhe viṣaye prahlādātiśayaḥ pravartate /
GK16andhvc3u:3984: nanu yeṣāṃ rasānāṃ parasparāvirodhaḥ yathā---vīraśṛṅgārayoḥ śṛṅgārahāsyayo locanam
GK16andhvc3u:3985: bājātprabhṛti prayojanānāṃ vicchede yadavicchedakāraṇaṃ yāvatsamāptibandhaṃ sa tu
GK16andhvc3u:3986: binduḥ' iti bindurūpayārthaprakṛtyā nirvahaṇaparyantaṃ vyāpnoti tadāha---anuyāyīti /
GK16andhvc3u:3990: kāryaṃ yāni ca tato 'pyūnavyāptitayā prakarīlakṣaṇāni kāryāṇi tairityevaṃ pañcānāmarthaprakṛtīnāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:3994: evamanena ślokenāṅgāṅgitāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntanirūpaṇamitivṛttabalāpatitatvaṃ ca rasāṅgāṅgibhāvasyeti dvayaṃ nirūpitam /
GK16andhvc3u:4018: aṅgāṅgitāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntanirūpaṇaṃ rasāṅgāṅgibhāvasya itivṛttabalāpatitatvaṃ ceti dvayamanena ślokena nirūpitamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4025: teṣāṃ tu sa kathaṃ bhavedyeṣāṃ parasparaṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4030: yathāha muniḥ--'vīrasya caiva yatkarma so 'dbhutaḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:4032: raudrakaruṇayorapi muninaivoktaḥ---- 'raudrasyaiva ca yatkarma sa jñeyaḥ karuṇo rasaḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:4037: ca ratiruttiṣṭhati tataḥ palāyamānarūpatayā jugupseti samānāśrayatvena tayoranyonyasaṃskāronmūlanatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:4039: śāntasyāpi tattvajñānasamutthitasamastasaṃsāraviṣayanirvedaprāṇatvena sarvato nirīhasvabhāvasya viṣayāsaktijīvitābhyāṃ ratikrodhābhyāṃ virodha eva // 23 //
GK16andhvc3u:4075: paripoṣaṃ na netavyas tathā syād avirodhitā // DhvK_3.24 //
GK16andhvc3u:4078: aṅgini rasāntare śṛṅgārādau prabandhavyaṅgye sati avirodhī virodhī vā rasaḥ paripoṣaṃna netavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4079: tatrāvirodhino rasasyāṅgirasāpekṣayātyantamādhikyaṃ na kartavyamityayaṃ prathamaḥ paripoṣaparihāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4082: vāgrahaṇasyāyamabhiprāyaḥ---aṅgirasāpekṣayā yasya rasāntarasyotkarṣo nibadhyate tadā tadaviruddho 'pi raso nibaddhaścodyāvahaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4083: atha tu yuktyā ṅgini raso 'ṅgabhāvatānayenopapattirghaṭate tadviruddho 'pi raso vakṣyamāṇena viṣayabhedādiyojanenopanibadhyamāno na doṣāvaha iti virodhāvirodhāvakiñcitkarau /
GK16andhvc3u:4086: aṅginaṃ rasaviśeṣamanādṛtya paripoṣaparihāre trīn prakārānāha--tatretyādinā tṛtīya ityantena /
GK16andhvc3u:4087: nanu nyūnatvaṃ kartavyamiti vācye ādhikyasya kā sambhāvanā yenoktamādhikyaṃna kartavyamityāśaṅkyāha--utkarṣasāmya iti /
GK16andhvc3u:4089: snehena raṇarasena ca bhaṭasya dolāyitaṃ hṛdayam //
GK16andhvc3u:4107: tatrāvirodhino rasasyāṅgirasāpekṣayā nyūnatvaṃ kartavyamiti vaktavye satītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4119: tasyāṃ yā abhyasūyā tayā hetunā hasitaḥ paśupattiḥ sandhyāṃ sevamānaḥ parameśvaro yayā sā /
GK16andhvc3u:4124: ṇeheṇa raṇaraseṇa a bhaḍassa dolāiaṃ hiaam //
GK16andhvc3u:4125: yathā vā-- kaṇṭhācchittvākṣamālāvalayamiva kare hāramāvartayantī kṛtvā paryaṅkabandhaṃ viṣadharapatinā mekhalāyā guṇena /
GK16andhvc3u:4134: etacca muktakaviṣayameva bhavati na tu prabandhaviṣayamiti kecidāhustaccāsat ;
GK16andhvc3u:4136: tathāhi---ratnāvalyāṃ sacivāyattasiddhitvābhiprāyeṇa pṛthivīrājyalābha ādhikārikaṃ phalaṃ kanyāratnalābhaḥ prāsaṅgikaṃ phalaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:4137: nāyakabhiprāyeṇa tu viparyaya iti sthite mantribuddhau nāyakabuddhau ca svāmyamātyabuddhyekatvātphalamiti nītyā ekīkriyamāṇāyāṃ samaprādhānyameva paryavasyati /
GK16andhvc3u:4148: atra prakṛto raso vīraḥ bhaṭasyetyuktabalādgamyaḥ samaprādhānyena varṇitastadavirodhī śṛṅgāraḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:4149: kaṇṭhādityādau tu prakṛto raso vipralambhaḥ tadavirodhīhāsyassamaprādhānyena darśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4155: trivargarūpaṃ yat phalaṃ tasya samaprādhānyaṃ yattasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4161: aṅgatvena punaḥ punaḥ pratyavekṣā paripoṣaṃ nīyamānasyāpyaṅgabhūtasya rasasyeti tṛtīyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4164: yathā śānte 'ṅgini śṛṅgārasya śṛṅgāre vā śāntasya /
GK16andhvc3u:4166: aṅgino hi rasasya locanam rasa iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4167: nanvevaṃ nāsau parituṣṭo bhavedityāśaṅkya matāntaramāha--niveśane veti /
GK16andhvc3u:4168: ata eva vāgrahaṇamuttarapakṣadārḍhyaṃ sūcayati na vikalpam /
GK16andhvc3u:4172: yathā---'kopātkomalalola' iti śloke 'ṅgibhūtāyāṃ ratāvaṅgatvena yaḥ krodha upanibaddhastatra
GK16andhvc3u:4173: baddhvā dṛḍhaṃ ityamarṣasya niveśitasya kṣiprameva rudatyeti hasanniti ca ratyuciterṣyautsukyaharṣānusandhānam /
GK16andhvc3u:4175: atra ca tāpasavatsarāje vatsarājasya pajhavatīviṣayaḥ sambhogaśṛṅgāra udāharaṇokartavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4177: vibhāvānubhāvānāṃ cāpi utkarṣo na kartavyo 'ṅgirasavirodhināṃ niveśanameva vā na kāryam,
GK16andhvc3u:4179: paripoṣitā api viruddharasavibhāvānubhāvā aṅgatvaṃ pratijāgarayitavyā ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:4181: evaṃ virodhyavirodhisādhāraṇaṃ prakāramabhidhāya virodhiviṣayā sādhāraṇadoṣaparihāraprakāragatatvenaiva viśeṣāntaramapyāha---virodhina bālapriyā ratāvaṅgatveneti /
GK16andhvc3u:4196: aṅgirasasya ye vibhāvānu bhāvāḥ tadekarūpaṃ sat tadekarūpatāṃ sampādyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4198: aṅgatvaṃ pratijāgarayitavyāḥ aṅgatāṃ netavyāḥ virodhyavirodhisādhāraṇaṃ prakāramiti /
GK16andhvc3u:4201: virodhiviṣayaḥ asādhāraṇaśca yo doṣaparihāraprakāraḥ tadgatatvena tatsambandhitvenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4205: bahuraseṣu prabandheṣvekasya rasasya āpekṣikametatprakarṣa yogitvamaśakyapratikṣepamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4212: prakāreṇāvirodhināṃ virodhināṃ ca rasānāmaṅgāṅgibhāvena samāveśeprabandheṣu syādavirodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4213: etacca sarvaṃ yeṣāṃ raso rasāntarasa vyabhicārībhavati iti darśanaṃ locanam iti /
GK16andhvc3u:4219: tadabhāve ca kathamaṅgāṅgitetyapi yeṣāṃ mataṃ tairapi kasyacidrasasya prakṛṣṭatvaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:4222: bhūyaḥ prabandhavyāpakasya ca rasasya rasāntarairyadi na kācitsaṅgatistaditivṛttasyāpi na syātsaṅgatiścedayamevopakāryopakārakabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4223: na ca catmakāraviśrāntervirodhaḥ kaściditi samanantaramevoktaṃ tadāha--anabhyupagacchatāpīti /
GK16andhvc3u:4226: anyastu vyācaṣṭe--etaccāpekṣikamityādigrantho dvitīyamatamabhipretya yatra rasānāmupakāryopakārakatā nāsti,
GK16andhvc3u:4228: etaccāsat; evaṃ hi etacca sarvamiti sarvaśabdena ya upasaṃhāra ekapakṣaviṣayaḥ bālapriyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4269: etatpakṣaviṣaya locanam matāntare 'pītyādinā ca yo dvitīyapakṣopakramaḥ so 'tīva duḥśliṣṭa ityalaṃ pūrvavaṃśyaiḥ saha bahunā saṃlāpena /
GK16andhvc3u:4271: bhāvādhyāyasamāptāvasti ślokaḥ--- bahūnāṃ samavetānāṃ rūpaṃ yasya bhavedbahu /
GK16andhvc3u:4272: sa mantavyo rasasthāyī śeṣāḥ sañcāriṇo matāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:4275: tu vyabhicāritayeti rasyamānatāsamaye sthāyivyabhicāribhāvasya na kaścidvirodha iti kecidvyācacakṣire /
GK16andhvc3u:4277: anye tu sthāyitayā paṭhitasyāpi rasasya rasāntare vyabhicāritvamasti,
GK16andhvc3u:4278: yathā krodhasya vīre vyabhicāritayā paṭhitasyāpi sthāyitvameva rasāntare,
GK16andhvc3u:4280: vyabhicāriṇo vā sata eva vyabhicāryantarāpekṣyā sthāyitvameva,
GK16andhvc3u:4281: yathā vikramorvaśyāmunmādasya caturthe 'ṅke itīyantamarthamavabodhayitumayaṃ ślokaḥ bahunāṃ cittavṛttirūpāṇāṃ bhāvānāṃ madhye yasya bahulaṃ rūpaṃ yathopalabhyate sa sthāyī bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:4285: ata evānye rasasthāyīti ṣaṣṭhyā saptamyā dvitīyayā vāśritādiṣu bālapriyā iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4295: saḥ sthāyī raso mantavya iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:4299: tatroktakrameṇa tasmin śloke ukto yaḥ kramastena /
GK16andhvc3u:4313: saḥ sthāyī rasaśca mantavya iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:4323: rasasya rase rasaṃ sthāyīti vigraha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4325: matāntare tu rasānāṃ sthāyino bhāvā upacārādrasaśabdenoktāsteṣāmaṅgatvaṃ nirvirodhameva /
GK16andhvc3u:4326: evamavirodhināṃ virodhināṃ ca prabandhasthenāṅginā rasena samāveśe sādhāraṇamavirodhopāyaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ virodhiviṣayameva taṃ pratipādayitumidamucyate
GK16andhvc3u:4327: viruddhaikāśrayo yas tu virodhī sthāyino bhavet /
GK16andhvc3u:4328: sa vibhinnāśrayaḥ kāryas tasya poṣe 'py adoṣatā // DhvK_3.25 //
GK16andhvc3u:4332: tatra prabandhasthena sthāyināṅginā rasenaucityāpekṣayā viruddhaikāśrayo yo virodhī yathā vīreṇa bhayānakaḥ sa vibhinnāśrayaḥ kāryaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4333: tasya vīrasya ya āśrayaḥ kathānāyakastadvipakṣaviṣaye sanniveśayitavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4334: tathā sati ca tasya virodhino 'pi yaḥ paripoṣaḥ sa nirdeṣaḥ vipakṣaviṣaye hi bhayātiśayavarṇane locanam gamigāmyādīnāmiti samāsaṃ paṭhanti /
GK16andhvc3u:4342: yastu sthāyīṃ sthāyyantareṇāsaṃbhāvyamānaikāśrayatvādvirodhī bhavedyathotsāhena bhayaṃ sa vibhinnāśrayatvena nāyakavipakṣādigāmitvena kāryaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:4344: tasya virodhino 'pi tathākṛtasya tathānibaddhasya bālapriyā āśritādiṣu gamyādīnāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:4364: evamaikādhikaraṇyavirodhinaḥ prabandhasthena sathāyinā rasenāṅgabhāvagamane nirvirodhitvaṃ yathā tathā taddarśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:4370: yaḥ punarekādhikaraṇatve nirvirodho nairantarye tu virodhī sa rasāntakhyavadhānena locanam paripuṣṭatāyāḥ pratyuta nirdeṣatā nāyakotkarṣādhānāt
GK16andhvc3u:4376: ekāśrayatve 'pi sambhavati kaścinni rantaratvena nirvyavadhānatvena virodhī,
GK16andhvc3u:4379: 'samutthite dhanurdhvanau bhayāvahe kirīṭino mahānuplavo 'bhavatpure purandaradviṣām' ityādinā // 25 //
GK16andhvc3u:4405: locanam nimittena yo nirdeṣaḥ na virodhī kiṃ tu nirantaratvena nimittena virodhameti
GK16andhvc3u:4406: sa tathāvidhaviruddharasadvayāvaruddhena rasāntareṇa madhye niveśitena yuktaḥ kārya iti kārikārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4411: tatra hi--'rāgasyāspadamityavaimi na hi me dhvaṃsīti na pratyayaḥ' ityādinopakṣepātprabhṛti
GK16andhvc3u:4426: parārthaṃ yaccharīravitaraṇaṃ tadātmakaṃ yannirvahaṇaṃ tatparyanta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4431: krameṇa yaḥ prasaraḥ ratirūpaśṛṅgārasya nāyake prasaraṇaṃ tasya sambhāvanārūpo ya abhaprāyastenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4434: nirdeṣadarśanāḥ kanyakā ityuktyā vaktari ratyanāvirbhāvaprakāśanāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4437: yadvā cittavṛttīnāṃ prasaro yeṣu viṣayeṣu teṣu yatprasaṃkhyānaṃ doṣadarśanaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:4442: nimittaṃ dharmādinaimittikaṃ dharmādikāraṇaṃ sthūladehādi tayoḥ prasaṅgena sambandhena /
GK16andhvc3u:4444: 'naṭavadvyavatiṣṭhate' yathā naṭo vividhaṃ rūpaṅgṛhītvā vyavaharati tathā devādiśarīraṃ gṛhītvā vyavaharati /
GK16andhvc3u:4450: śāntaśca tṛṣṇākṣayasuravasya yaḥ paripoṣastallakṣaṇo rasaḥ pratīyata eva /
GK16andhvc3u:4451: tathā coktam--- yacca kāmasukhaṃ loke yacca divyaṃ mahatsukham /
GK16andhvc3u:4453: locanam mitrāvasoḥ praviṣṭasya malayavatīnirgamanakāriṇaḥ 'saṃsarpadbhiḥ samantāt' ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:4455: nanu nāstyeva śānto rasaḥ tasya tu sthāyyeva nopadiṣṭo muninetyāśaṅkyāha--śāntaśceti /
GK16andhvc3u:4456: tṛṣṇānāṃ viṣayābhilāṣāṇāṃ yaḥ kṣayaḥ sarvato nivṛttirūpo nirvedaḥ tadeva sukhaṃ tasya sthāyibhūtasya yaḥ paripoṣo rasyamānatākṛtastadeva lakṣaṇaṃ yasya sa śānto rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4459: anye tu sarvacittavṛttipraśama evāsya sthāyīti manyante /
GK16andhvc3u:4462: bālapriyā kāmāditattatpuruṣārthalābhaḥ krameṇaiva bhavatītyaṃśe upaṣṭambhakamidaṃ vacanamiti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:4476: nivṛttaḥ bhojanādyaśeṣaviṣayāyā icchāyāḥ prasaro yataḥ puruṣāttasya bhāvastatvaṃ tasya kāle prasarakāle iti vā pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4481: sarvāsāṃ cittavṛttīnāṃ ratyādirūpāṇāṃ praśamaḥ prakarṣeṇa śama ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4485: sarvacittavṛttipraśama ityanena sarvāsāṃ cittavṛttīnāmabhāvasya vivakṣaṇedoṣaṃ darśayannāha--tṛṣṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:4486: tṛṣṇānāṃ sarvāsāṃ cittavṛttīnāṃ sadbhāvasya prasarasya yaḥ prasajyapratiṣedho 'tyantābhāvastadrūpatve /
GK16andhvc3u:4496: tathā tṛṣṇākṣayapadasya sarvañcittavṛttipraśamapadasya vā sarvacittavṛttivirodhī locanam anye tu--- svaṃ svaṃ nimittamāsādya śāntādbhāvaḥ pravartate
GK16andhvc3u:4498: iti bharatavākyaṃ dṛṣṭavantaḥ sarvarasasāmānyasvābhāvaṃ śāntamācakṣaṇā anupajātaviśeṣāntaracittavṛttirūpaṃ śāntasya sthāyibhāvaṃ manyante /
GK16andhvc3u:4506: na ca tadīyā paryantāvasthā varṇanīyā yena sarvaceṣṭoparamādanubhāvābhāvenāpratīyamānatā syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:4508: tacchidreṣu pratyayāntarāṇa saṃskārebhyaḥ' bālapriyā cittavṛttiviśeṣo yadi vivakṣitastadeti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:4513: asmātpūrvo 'yaṃ ślokaḥ--- bhāvā vikārā ratyādyāḥ śāntastu prakṛtarmataḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4522: anupajātaviśeṣā bāhyavanitādiviṣayaviśeṣānāśrayā āntarī ātmaviṣayikā ca yā cittavṛttiḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:4529: pakṣasyāsya sarvacittavṛtitiprāgabhāve paryavasānamasmatpakṣasya tu sarvacittavṛttipradhvaṃsābhāva iti viśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4538: janmanaḥ adarśanāt yato janma na bhavati,
GK16andhvc3u:4545: ceṣṭoparamādayo hi śāntasyānubhāvā vaktavyāste ca na prayogayogyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4556: pūrvabhūmau tu śāntasyāpi janakādeśceṣṭā dṛṣṭeveti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4557: cittasya kṣiptādyā locanam ita sūtradvayanītyā citrākārā yamaniyamādiceṣṭā rājyadhurodvahanādalakṣaṇā
GK16andhvc3u:4559: nanu na pratīyate nāsya vibhāvāḥ santīta cet--na;
GK16andhvc3u:4566: nanu pratīyate sarvasya ślāghāspadaṃ na bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:4567: tarhi vītarāgāṇaṃ śṛṅgāro na bālapriyā nānāvasthāḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:4572: atrādyasyeyaṃ bhojavṛttiḥ-- “tasya cetasaḥ uktānnirodhasaṃskārāt praśāntavāhitā bhavati parihṛtavikṣepatayā sadṛśapravāhapariṇāma cittaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ” iti /
GK16andhvc3u:4575: asyāpīyaṃ bhojavṛttiḥ---“tasmin samādhau sthitasya chidrevyantarāleṣu yāni pratyayāntarāṇi vyutthānarūpāṇi jñānāni tāni,
GK16andhvc3u:4576: prāgbhūtebhyo vyutthānānubhavajebhyaḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ ahaṃ mametyevaṃrūpāṇi kṣīyamāṇebhyo 'pi bhavanti” iti /
GK16andhvc3u:4581: atra samādhikāle yamādiceṣṭā vyatthānakāle rājyadhurodvahanādiceṣṭeti vibhāgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4586: yamaniyamādīnāṃ yogāṅgānāṃ madhye antare sambhāvyamānāḥ bhūyāṃsaśca ye vyabhicāriṇaḥ matidhṛtismṛtyādayaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:4598: prāktanānāṃ kuśalānāṃ satkarmaṇāṃ paripākaḥ tathā parameśvarānugrahaḥ tathādhyātmarahasyaśāstreṣu vedāntādiṣu bītarāgeṣu ca pariśīlanaṃ tadādibhirityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:4615: asau dharmapradhāno yadi nāma sarvajanānabhavagocaratā tasya nāsti naitāvatāsāvalokasāmānyamahānubhāvacittavṛttiviśeṣaḥ pratikṣeptuṃ śakya-
GK16andhvc3u:4616: na ca vīre tasyāntarbhāvaḥ kartaṃ yukta- /
GK16andhvc3u:4619: tayoścaivaṃvidhaviśeṣasadbhāve 'pi yadyaikyaṃ locanam ślādhya iti so 'pi rasatvāccyavatāmiti tadāha--yada nāmeti /
GK16andhvc3u:4620: nanu dharmapradhāno 'sau vīra eveti sambhāvayamāna āha--na ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:4630: nanvevaṃ dayāvīro dharmavīro dānavīro vā nāsau kaścit,
GK16andhvc3u:4632: tathā hi muniḥ-- dānavīraṃ dharmavīraṃ yuddhavīraṃ tathaiva ca /
GK16andhvc3u:4640: 'tasya' śāntasya na ca yukta iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4647: evaṃvidha ityādi sarvaṃ sādhayituṃ śaknomītyādi buddhireva prāṇā jīvitaṃ yasya sa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4673: itarathā tu vīraprabhedatvamiti vyavasthāpyamāne na kaścidvirodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4675: tasya cāviruddharasavyavadhāne prabandhe virodhirasasamāveśe satyapi nirvirodhatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:4680: sā tvasya vyabhicāriṇī bhavati na tu sthāyitāmeti,
GK16andhvc3u:4682: ādhikārikatvena tu śānto raso na nibaddhavyaiti candrikākāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4693: 'dayāvīrādīnāṃ ce' tītyasyānantaraṃ viṣayetyādeḥ pūrvamādigrahaṇeneti pāṭhaḥ sarveṣu dṛṣṭagrantheṣu dṛśyate,
GK16andhvc3u:4694: tasya ca viṣayetyādinā sambandho na ghaṭate cāto 'tra dharmavīradānavīrayorgrahaṇamiti pūraṇīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:4695: yadi vā tathā granthe paṭhanīyamiti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:4720: vahutaraṃ yathā tathā kṛtanirṇayau kṛtavicārau pūrvapakṣasiddhāntau yasya saḥ // 26 //
GK16andhvc3u:4723: nivartate hi rasayoḥ samāveśe virodhitā // DhvK_3.27 //
GK16andhvc3u:4761: śṛṅgāra iti tayoḥ kathamekālambanakatmarūpaikāśrayatvamiti śaṅkāṃ pariharannāha--svetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:4765: atra hi śṛṅgārabībhatsayostadaṅgayorvā vīrarasavyavadhānena samāveśo na virodhī /
GK16andhvc3u:4767: viśeṣatas tu śṛṅgāre sukumāratamā hy asau // DhvK_3.28 //
GK16andhvc3u:4770: yathoktalakṣaṇānusāreṇa virodhāvirodhau sarveṣu raseṣu prabandhe 'nyatra ca nirūpayetsahṛdayaḥ;
GK16andhvc3u:4772: sa hi ratapāripoṣātmakatvādrateśca locanam anyathā vibhinnaviṣayatvātko virodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4773: nanu vīra evātra raso na śṛṅgāro na bībhatsaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:4774: kintu ratijugupase hi vīraṃ prati vyabhicārībhūte /
GK16andhvc3u:4780: 'vīrāḥ svadehān' ityādinā tadīyotsāhādyavagatyā kartṛkarmaṇoḥ samastavākyārthānuyāyitayā pratītiriti madhyapāṭhābhāve 'pi sutarāṃ vīrasya vyavadhāyakateti bhāvaḥ // 27 //
GK16andhvc3u:4786: tathā ca svarlalanāgatasya śṛṅgārasya bībhatsasya ca dehadvayaikyābhimānī vīra eka eva viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4789: sāhasena raṇamadhyanipātanādyanubhāvenākṣepalabhyagarvādisañcāriṇā ca vīrarasa eva pratīyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4799: atra vākyaṃ padasamudāyaḥ bhūroṇvityādivākyārthānvayitayā karmaṇaḥ na vetyādivākyārthānvayitayā kartuśca pratītirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4803: na vetyādiviśeṣaṇārthabodhe śṛṅgārastadviśeṣyārthabodhe vīraścāsvādyata iti rītyā vīrasya madhye madhye āsvādaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4805: yojana yā bodhe tvādau śṛṅgāra iti // 27 //
GK16andhvc3u:4807: 'sukumāratamo hi svalpenāpi nimittena bhaṅgasambhavātsukumāratamaḥ sarvebhyo rasebhyo manāgapi virodhisamāveśaṃ na sahate /
GK16andhvc3u:4809: bhavet tasmin pramādo hi jhaṭity evopalakṣyate // DhvK_3.29 //
GK16andhvc3u:4812: tatraiva ca rase sarvebhyo 'pi rasemyaḥ saukumāryātiśayayogini kaviravadhānavān prayatnavānsyāt /
GK16andhvc3u:4813: tatra hi pramādyatastasya sahṛdayamadhye kṣipramevāvajñānaviṣayatā bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:4814: śṛṅgāraraso hi saṃsāriṇāṃ niyamenānubhavaviṣayatvātsarvarasebhyaḥ kamanīyatayā pradhānabhūtaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4820: locanam tato 'pi karuṇastato 'pi śṛṅgāra iti tamapratyayaḥ // 28-29 //
GK16andhvc3u:4824: śṛṅgārasya viruddhā ye śāntādayasteṣvapi tadaṅgānāṃ śṛṅgārāṅgānāṃ sambandhī sparśo na duṣṭaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4825: tayā bhaṅgyā rasāntaragatā api vibhāvānubhāvādyā varṇanīyā yayā śṛṅgārāṅgabhāvamupāgaman /
GK16andhvc3u:4826: yathā mamaiva stotre--- tvāṃ candracūḍaṃ sahasā spṛśantī prāṇaiśvaraṃ gāḍhaviyogataptā /
GK16andhvc3u:4828: bālapriyā sa' iti kārikāpāṭhābhiprāyeṇa vyācaṣṭe---sa hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:4838: yayā bhaṅgyā varṇanayā śṛṅgāravibhāvāditvaṃ prāpnuvanto bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4840: gāḍhaviyogena gāḍhaṃ gāḍhena vā tvadasparśena taptā saṃsāratāpamanubhavantī /
GK16andhvc3u:4841: sā viṣayāntarasañcāriṇī me saṃvit antaḥkaraṇaṃ tadvṛttirvātvāṃ spṛśantī kiñcidviṣayīkurvāṇā
GK16andhvc3u:4843: śṛṅgārāṅgānāṃ yaḥ sa na kevalamavirodhalakṣaṇayoge sati na duṣyati yāvadvineyānunmukhīkartuṃ
GK16andhvc3u:4844: kāvyaśobhārthameva vā kriyamāṇo na duṣyati yāvadvineyānunmukhīkartuṃ kāvyaśobhārthameva
GK16andhvc3u:4846: śṛṅgārarasāṅgairunmukhīkṛtāḥ santo hi vineyāḥ sukhaṃ vinayopadeśān gṛhṇanti /
GK16andhvc3u:4847: sadācāropadeśarūpā hi nāṭakādigoṣṭhī locanam ityatra śāntavibhāvānubhāvānāmapi śṛṅgārabhaṅgyā nirūpaṇam /
GK16andhvc3u:4848: vineyānunmukhīkartuṃ yā kāvyaśobhā tadarthaṃ naiva duṣyatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4853: vineyānunmukhīkartuṃ yā kāvyaśobhā tadarthamapi vā viruddhasamāveśaḥ na kevalaṃ pūrvoktaiḥ prakāraiḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:4858: nanu kāvyaṃ krīḍārūpaṃ kva ca vedādigocarā upadeśakathā ityāśaṅkyāha--sadācāreti /
GK16andhvc3u:4863: yadvā--vilīyāpi vilīyate dravībhūyāpi atyantaṃ drutā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4864: bhaktānāṃ cittadrutiḥ prasiddhā putrikāpakṣe tu candrakarasparśena kiñcidārdrībhūya punassarvāvayavāvacchedenārdrībhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4889: anyavyākhyānañca vineyānunmukhīkartuṃ vā kāvyaśobhārthaṃ veti vikalpaparaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:4892: kiṃ ca śṛṅgārasya sakalajanamanoharābhirāmatvāttadaṅgasamāveśaḥ kāvyeśobhātiśayaṃ puṣyatītyanenāpi prakāreṇa virodhini rase śṛṅgārāṅgasamāveśo na virodhī /
GK16andhvc3u:4893: tataśca satyaṃ manoramā rāmāḥ satyaṃ ramyā vibhūtayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4897: etacca prabhumitrasammitebhyaḥ śāstretihāsebhyaḥ prītapūrvakaṃ jāyāsammitatvena nāṭyakāvyagataṃ vyutpattikāratvaṃ pūrvameva nirūpitamasmābhiriti na punaruktabhayādiha likhitam /
GK16andhvc3u:4905: atra hi śāntavibhāve sarvasyānityatve varṇyamāne na kasyacidvibhāvasya śṛṅgārabhaṅgyā nibandhaḥ kṛtaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:4906: kiṃ tu satyamiti bālapriyā tatra sukhamityetadvyācaṣṭe--rañjaneti /
GK16andhvc3u:4917: śobhāyā atiśayo yeneti vyutpattimabhipretya prakṛtānuguṇaṃ vyācaṣṭe--alaṅkāretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:4920: 'rāmāḥ' ramaṇyaḥ kāmā iti ca pāṭhaḥ 'vibhūtayaḥ' aiśvaryāṇi /
GK16andhvc3u:4922: mattā yauvanādimadayuktāyā aṅganā praśastāṅgā nārī tasyāḥ apāṅgabhaṅgaḥ kaṭākṣa- sa iva lolamasthiram /
GK16andhvc3u:4924: rāmādīnāṃ manoramatve 'pi satyeva jāvite janaiḥ svopabhoghāyopādeyāstāḥ jīvitaṃ cāsthiramiti kiḍkṛtaṃ tāsāmupādeyatvamato ramyatve 'pi tāssarvā niṣphalā eveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4934: viṣayaṃ sukaviḥ kāvyaṃ kurvan muhyati na kvacit // DhvK_3.31 //
GK16andhvc3u:4936: viṣayaṃ sukaviḥ kāvyaṃ kurvanmuhyati na kvacit // 31 //
GK16andhvc3u:4937: itthamanenānantaroktena prakāreṇa rasādīnāṃ rasabhāvatadābhāsānāṃ parasparaṃ virodhasyāvirodhasya
GK16andhvc3u:4938: ca viṣayaṃ vijñāya sukaviḥ kāvyaviṣaye pratibhātiśayayuktaḥ kāvyaṃ kurvatra kvacinmuhmati /
GK16andhvc3u:4939: evaṃ rasādiṣu virodhāvirodhanirūpaṇasyopayogitvaṃ pratipādya vyañjakavācyavācakanirūpaṇasyāpi tadviṣayasya tatpratipādyate--
GK16andhvc3u:4940: vācyānāṃ vācakānāṃ ca yad aucityena yojanam /
GK16andhvc3u:4946: api tu yasya kṛte sarvamabhyarthyate tadevedaṃ calamiti;
GK16andhvc3u:4948: lolatāyāmupamānatoktati priyatamākaṭākṣo hi sarvasyābhilaṣaṇīya iti ca tatprītyā
GK16andhvc3u:4949: pravṛttimān guḍajihvikayā prasaktānuprasaktavastutattvasaṃvedanena vairāgye paryavasyati vineyaḥ // 3.0 //
GK16andhvc3u:4951: rasādiṣu rasādiviṣaye vyañjakāni yāni vācyāni vibhāvādīni vācakāni ca suptiṅādīni teṣāṃ yannirūpaṇaṃ tasyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:4965: sambhāvyamānena nāyakavibhāvatvena nāyikānubhāvatvena ca hetunā śṛṅgārāṅgasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4971: tathā ca yayā kayāpi vidhayā śṛṅgārāṅgayojanaṃ kāvyaśobhākaramiti bhāvaḥ // 3.0 //
GK16andhvc3u:4974: 'vyañjakavācye'tyādigranthaṃ vācyānāmitivṛttaviśeṣāṇāṃ vācakānāṃ ca tadviṣayāṇāṃ rasādiviṣayeṇaucityena yadyojanametanmahākaverbhukhyaṃ karma
GK16andhvc3u:4975: ayameva hi mahākavermukhyo vyāpāro yadrasādīneva mukhyatayā kāvyārthīkṛtya tadyvaktyanuguṇatvena śabdānāmarthānāṃ copanibandhanam /
GK16andhvc3u:4976: etacca rasāditātparyeṇa kāvyanibandhanaṃ bharatādāvapi suprasiddhameveti pratipādayitumāha--
GK16andhvc3u:4978: aucityavānyastā etā vṛttayo dvividhāḥ sthitāḥ // DhvK_3.33 //
GK16andhvc3u:4982: tatra rasānuguṇa aucityavānvācyāśrayo yo vyavahārastā etāḥ kaiśikyādyā vṛttayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4984: vṛttayo hi rasāditātparyeṇa saṃniveśitāḥ kāmapināṭyasya kāvyasya ca cchāyāmāvahanti /
GK16andhvc3u:5003: 'vṛttayaḥ kāvyamātṛkāḥ' iti bruvāṇena muninā rasocitetivṛttasamāśrayaṇopadeśena rasasyaivajīvitatvamuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:5008: ālokārthītyādikārikayā prathamodyote yaduktaṃ tadevānayā kārikayā upasaṃhṛtamityarthaḥ // 3.2 //
GK16andhvc3u:5011: rasādimayaṃ hi vācyaṃ pratibhāsate na tu rasādibhiḥ pṛthagbhūtam' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:5012: atrocyate--yadi rasādimayameva vāyyaṃ yathā gauratvamayaṃ śarīram /
GK16andhvc3u:5013: evaṃ sati yathā śarīre pratibhāsamāne niyamenaiva gauratvaṃ pratibhāsate sarvasya tathā vācyena sahaiva rasādayo 'pi sahṛdayasyāsahṛdayasya ca pratibhāseran /
GK16andhvc3u:5015: locanam ityādinā rasopayogajīvitaḥ śabdavṛttilakṣaṇo vyavahāra uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5025: bālapriyā kārikāyāmarthaśabdayoḥ rasādyanuguṇatvena aucityavān vyavahāro yaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:5028: rasopayoga eva jīvitaṃ yasya sa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5033: atra guṇasthānīyo rasādiḥ guṇisthānīya itivṛttādirūpo vācyārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5048: yadi rasādimayo vācyārthastarhi sa niyamato rasādibhiḥ sahaiva sarvaiḥ pratīyamānassyādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5053: ratnānāmiva jātyatvaṃ pratipattṛviśeṣataḥ saṃvedyaṃ vācyanāṃ rasādirūpatvamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:5054: naivam; yato yathā jātyatvena pratibhāsamāne ratne ratnasvarūpānatiriktatvameva tasya lakṣyate tathā rasādīnāmapi vibhāvānubhāvādirūpavācyāvyatiriktatvameva lakṣyeta /
GK16andhvc3u:5055: na caivam; locanam nanu yadyasya dharmarūpaṃ tattatpratibhāne sarvasya niyamena bhātītyanaikāntikametat /
GK16andhvc3u:5056: māṇikyadharmo hi jātyatvalakṣaṇo viśeṣo na tatpratibhāse 'pi sarvasya niyamena bhātītyāśaṅkate---syāditi /
GK16andhvc3u:5058: etaduktaṃ bhavati---atyantonmagnasvabhāvatve sati taddharmatvāditi viśeṣaṇamasmābhiḥ kṛtam /
GK16andhvc3u:5071: tatpratibhāne śarīrādipratibhāse ityetaditi sambandhaḥ iti niyama ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5072: yatra yatra yaddharmatvaṃ tatra pratyakṣīyatadviṣayitāvyāpakaviṣayitākatvamiti vyāptiriti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:5078: tathā ca māṇikyadharme jātyatve vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5091: yata ityādi na caivamityantasya parihāragranthasya bhāvamāha locane--etaduktamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5100: yatra yatra taddharmatvabhityatra atyantonmagnasvabhāvatve satītyapi niviṣṭamastītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5102: unmagnarūpatā yathārūpasya gauratvāderasti tathā jātyatvasya netyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5107: na hi vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāriṇa eva rasā iti kasyācidavagamaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5108: ata eva ca vibhāvādipratītyavinābhāvinī rasādīnāṃ pratītiriti tatpratītyoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena vyavasthānātkramo 'vaśyambhāvī /
GK16andhvc3u:5109: sa tu lāghavānna prakāśyate 'ityalakṣyakramā eva santo vyaṅgyā rasādayaḥ' ityuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:5110: locanam vācyānāṃ dharmāstathāsati dvau pakṣau rūpādisadṛśā vā syurmāṇikyagatajātyatvasadṛśā vā /
GK16andhvc3u:5115: eṣa ca heturādye 'pi pakṣe saṅgacchata eva /
GK16andhvc3u:5120: yataśca tatpratītau vācyapratītiḥ sarvathānupayoginī tata eva hetoḥ krameṇāvaśyaṃ bhāvyaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:5122: sa tu sahṛdayabhāvanābhyāsānna lakṣyate anyathā tu lakṣyetāpītyuktaṃ prāk /
GK16andhvc3u:5125: nanu bhavantu vācyādatiriktā rasādayastatrāpi kramo na lakṣyata iti tāvattvayaivoktam /
GK16andhvc3u:5137: vṛttāvata evetyeko hetuḥ vyavasthānādityaparaścetyāśayena vyācaṣṭe--yato netyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5162: nanu śabda eva prakāraṇādyavacchinno vācyavyaṅgyayoḥ samameva pratītimupajanayatīti kiṃ tatra kramakalpanayā /
GK16andhvc3u:5163: na ha śabdasya vācyapratītiparāmarśa eva vyañjakatve nibandhanam /
GK16andhvc3u:5167: kiṃ tu tadyvañjakatvaṃ teṣāṃ kadācitsvarūpaviśeṣanibandhanaṃ kadācidvācakaśaktinibandhanam /
GK16andhvc3u:5168: tatra yeṣāṃ vācakaśaktinibandhanaṃ teṣāṃ yadi vācyapratītimantareṇaiva svarūpapratītyā niṣpannaṃ tadbhavenna tarhi vācakaśaktinibandhanam /
GK16andhvc3u:5170: tataścaikayaiva sāmagnyā sahaiva vācyaṃ vyaṅgyābhimataṃ ca rasādi bhātīti vacanavyañjanavyāpāradvayena na kiñcinditi tadāha--nanviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5171: yatrāpi gītaśabdānāmartho 'sti tatrāpi tatpratītiranupayoginī grāmarāgānusāreṇāpahastitavācyānusāratayā rasodayadarśanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:5172: na cāpi sā sarvatra bhavantī dṛśyate,
GK16andhvc3u:5189: apahastitaḥ anādṛtaḥ vācyānusāraḥ vācyarthapratītyanusaraṇaṃ yena rasodayena tasya bhāvastattā tayā /
GK16andhvc3u:5200: vācakaśaktirabhidhā saiva nibandhanaṃ prayojakaṃ yasya tat /
GK16andhvc3u:5209: na caivaṃ evaṃ na bhavati ca /
GK16andhvc3u:5214: sa tu kramo yadi lāghavānna lakṣyate tatkiṃ kriyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5220: astu śabdādeva tatpratītistathāpi tena svavācakaśaktistasyāṃ kartavyāyāṃ sahakāritayāvaśyāpekṣaṇīyetyāyātaṃ vācyapratīteḥ pūrvabhāvitvamiti
GK16andhvc3u:5222: yattukvacacchrute 'pi kāvyerasapratītirna bhavati tatrocitaḥ prakaraṇāvagamādiḥ sahakārī nāstītyāśaṅkyāha--yadi ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:5256: nanvevaṃ yatra śabdaḥ śruto 'rtho nādhigataśca tatra rasapratītiḥ syādityata āha--yattvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5270: vākyāntaraṃ sahāyaḥ sahakāri yasya tattvaṃ sahakāri vāntaramityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5274: yeṣāmapi svarūpaviśeṣapratītinimittaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ yathā gītādiśabdānāṃ teṣāmapi svarūpapratītervyaṅgyapratīteśca niyamabhāvī locanam svayamiti
GK16andhvc3u:5276: na cānvayavyatirekavatīṃ vācyapratītimapahnutyādṛṣṭasadbhāvābhāvau śaraṇatvenāśritau mātsaryādadhikaṃ kiñcitpuṣṇīta ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5279: evaṃ hyupayoga iti anupakārake sañjñākaraṇamātraṃ vastuśūnyaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5281: taddṛṣṭāntenaiva vayaṃ vācyapratīterapi pūrvabhāvitāṃ samarthayiṣyāma iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5296: nanu vākyena rasādipratītau kartavyāyāmadṛṣṭaviśeṣo 'pi sahakārī tadabhāvādeva vācyapratītivirahakāle rasāderapratītiriti śaṅkāṃ pariharati--na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5324: tattu śabdasya kriyāpaurvāparyamananyasādhyatatphalaghaṭanāsvāśubhāvanīṣu vācyenāvirodhinyabhidheyāntaravilakṣaṇe rasādau na pratīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5325: locanam nanu saṃścetkramaḥ kiṃ na lakṣyata ityāśaṅkyāha--tattviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5327: kriye vācyavyaṅgyapratīti yadi vābhidhāvyāpāro vyañjanāparaparyāyo dhvananavyāpāraśceti kriye tayoḥ paurvāparyaṃ na pratīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5332: kuto na lakṣyate iti nimittasaptamīnirdiṣṭaṃ hetvantaragarbhaṃ hetumāha--āśubhāvinīṣviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5333: ananyasādhyatatphalaghaṭanāsu ghaṭanāḥ pūrvaṃ mādhuryādilakṣaṇāḥ pratipāditā guṇānirūpaṇāvasare tāśca tatphalāḥ rasādipratītiḥ phalaṃ yāsām,
GK16andhvc3u:5336: etaduktaṃ bhavati---yato guṇavati kāvye 'saṅkīrṇaviṣayatayā saṅghaṭanā prayuktā tataḥ kramo na lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5338: kramastu kiṃ na lakṣyate ata āha--āśubhāvinīṣu vācyapratītikālapratīkṣaṇena vinaiva jhaṭityeva tā rasādīn bhāvayanti bālapriyā śabdajanyakriyetyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:5368: ojoghaṭanayā karuṇādipratītirna hi sādhyetyanvayaḥ kintu vīrādipratītireveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5376: eva yata āsūtrito rasāsvādastena vācyapratītyuttarakālabhavena parisphuṭāsvādayukto
GK16andhvc3u:5378: abhyaste hi viṣaye 'vinābhāvapratītikrama itthameva na lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5379: abhyāso hyayameva yatpraṇidhānādināpi vinaiva saṃskārasya balavattvātsadaiva prabubhutsutayā
GK16andhvc3u:5382: jhaṭityutpannehi dhūmajñāne tadvyāptismṛtyupakṛte tadvijātīyapraṇidhānānusaraṇādipratītyantarānupraveśavirahādāśubhāvinyāmagnipratītau bālapriyā ghaṭanā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5384: tattvityādigranthena labdhaṃ kramastu kinna lakṣyata iti codyasyottaraṃ vivṛṇoti---etadityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5393: vācyapratītyuttarakāle yo bhavaḥ jananaṃ tena hetunā yaḥ parisphuṭāsvādaḥ tena yukto 'pi viśiṣṭo 'pi;
GK16andhvc3u:5410: abhyasta ityādinā samānyata uktaṃ viśiṣya darśayati--evamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5425: tābhyāṃ dhūmajñānavyāptismṛtibhyāṃ vijātīyaṃ yat praṇidhānānukaraṇādinā praṇidhānakaraṇādinā pratītyantaramālocanarūpaṃ kvacittu lakṣyata eva
GK16andhvc3u:5432: tathāvidhe ca viṣaye vācyavyaṅgyeyoratyantavilakṣaṇatvādyaiva ekasya pratītiḥ saivetarasyeti na śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvc3u:5433: śabdaśaktimūlānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgye tu dhvanau--- gāvo vaḥ pāvanānāṃ paramaparimitāṃ prītimutpādayantu locanam kramo na lakṣyate tadvadihāpi /
GK16andhvc3u:5434: yadi tu vācyāvirodhī raso na syāducitā ca ghaṭanā na bhavettallakṣyetaiva krama iti /
GK16andhvc3u:5435: candrikākārastu paṭhitamanupaṭhatīti nyāyena gajanimīlikayā vyācacakṣe--tasya śabdasya
GK16andhvc3u:5436: phalaṃ tadvā phalaṃ vācyavyaṅgyapratītyātmakaṃ tasya ghaṭanā niṣpādanā yato 'nanyasādhyā
GK16andhvc3u:5438: na cātrārthasatattvaṃ vyākhyāne kiñcidutpaśmāma ityalaṃ pūrvavaṃśyaiḥ saha vivādena bahunā /
GK16andhvc3u:5439: yatra tu saṅghaṭanāvyaṅgyatve nāsti tatra lakṣyata evetyāha--kvacittviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5444: iti hi pūrvaṃ varṇasaṅghaṭanādikaṃ nāsya vyañjakatvenoktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5458: iti hi pūrvamuktaṃ varṇasaṅghaṭanādikamasya vyañjakatvena noktamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5476: kūpa iti ca ahamiti cobhayasamānādhikaraṇatayā saṃvalanam /
GK16andhvc3u:5489: abhidheyasya vyaṅgyālaṅkārasya ca ye pratītī tayorityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5508: abhidheyaṃ ca tatsāmarthyākṣiptālaṅkāraśca tāveva tanmātre iti ca vṛttyartho bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5512: ārthyapi ca pratipattisyathāvide viṣaye ubhayārthasambandhayogyaśabdasāmarthyaprasāviteti śabdaśaktimūlā kalpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5514: tatrāvivakṣitavācyatvādeva vācyeva saha vyaṅgyasya kramapratītivicāro na kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5515: tasmādabhidhānābhidheyapratītyoriva locanam nanvevamārthatvaṃ śabdaśaktimūlatvaṃ ceti viruddhamityāśaṅkyāha---ārthyapīti /
GK16andhvc3u:5517: etacca vitatya pūrvameva nirṇītamiti na punarucyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5526: tatprasaṅgena rasādīnāṃ vācyātiriktatvaṃ samarthayituṃ kramo vicārita ityetadupasaṃharati--tasmāditi /
GK16andhvc3u:5534: evaṃ vivakṣitānyaparavācye vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ kramaṃ pratipādya sarvatrāpi vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ kramo 'stīti darśayitumāha--vṛttau 'avivakṣite'tyādi
GK16andhvc3u:5546: krameṇa yā pratītiḥ tadvicāraḥ vācyārthavyaṅgyārthapratītyoḥkramasya vicāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5551: nanu rasādeḥ vṛttijīvitatvamupakrāntaṃ vācyavyaṅgyapratītikramaśca tasmādityādinā upasaṃhṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5560: tadevaṃ vyañjakamukhena dhvaniprakāreṣu nirūpiteṣu kaścidbrūyāt---kimidaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ nāma vyaṅgyārthaprakāśanam,
GK16andhvc3u:5561: na hi vyañjakatvaṃ vyaṅgyatvaṃ cārthasya vyañjakasidydhadhīnaṃ vyaṅgyatvam,
GK16andhvc3u:5563: nanu vācyavyatiriktasya vyaṅgyasya locanam śabdarūpasya pūrvaṃ pratītistato 'bhidheyasya /
GK16andhvc3u:5564: yadāha tatra bhavān--- 'viṣayatvamanāpannaiḥ śabdairnārthaḥ prakāśyate' ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5566: udyotārambhe yaduktaṃ vyañjanamukhena dhvaneḥ svarūpaṃ pratipādyata iti tadidānīmupasaṃharanvyañjakabhāvaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:5567: prathamodyote samarthitamapi śiṣyāṇāmekapraghaṭṭakena hṛdi niveśayituṃ pūrvapakṣamāha--tadevamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:5572: bālapriyā vṛttyuktānumāne dṛṣṭāntasya sādhanavaikalyaśaṅkāṃ parihartuṃ vyācaṣṭe--abhidhānasyetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5579: ityādītyādipadena sūciteṣu kiñcit padyārddhamapi darśayati---ata ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5593: kaścidityādinā vyañjakatvanirūpaṇaṃ punaruktaṃ cetyatastatphalaṃ darśayannavatārayati---udyotārambha ityādinā /
GK16andhvc3u:5604: śabdasya siddhiḥ prāgeva pratipāditā tatsadydhadhīnā ca vyañjakasiddhiriti kaḥ paryanuyogāvasaraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5615: tasya yadi vyaṅya iti nāma kṛtam,
GK16andhvc3u:5617: vyaṅgya iti vā vācyābhimatasyāpi kasmānna kriyate?
GK16andhvc3u:5619: abhidhā bālapriyā vyañjakatvamarthasya vyaṅgyatvaṃ ca 'na hi'svato na bhavati hi /
GK16andhvc3u:5631: tathā ca yato 'rthasya vyaṅgyatvamato vyañjakatvaṃ śabdasyaiva tacca vyaṅgyārthaprakāśanaṃ na hīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5633: vyañjakatvasiddhyadhīnamityasyānantaraṃ vyaṅgyatvamiti pāṭhābhāve tvevaṃ yojanā--vyañjakatvaṃ vyaṅgyārthaprakāśanaṃ na hi /
GK16andhvc3u:5636: vismaraṇamāśaṅkya tatratyaṃ prāgiti padaṃ vyācaṣṭe locane---prathametyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5643: 'satyam' ityādinā siddhāntyuktamanūdya pūrvapakṣī 'sa tvi'tyādinā dūṣaṇamabhihitavāṃstaṃ granthaṃ vyācaṣṭe--astvasāvityādinā /
GK16andhvc3u:5644: sa tvartha ityasya vyākhyānam--asau dvitīyo 'rtha iti /
GK16andhvc3u:5659: yo 'rthaḥ paryanto yasyāḥ tatra vācyatayaivāsau vyapadeṣṭuṃ yuktaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:5664: yā tvantarā tathāvidhe viṣaye vācyāntarapratītiḥ sā tatpratīterupāyamātraṃ padārthapratītiriva vākyārthapratīteḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5666: tatparyantatā ca pradhānībhūte tasminnartha iti mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ dhvaneryadrūpaṃ nirūpitaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:5671: upāyamātramityanena sādhāraṇyoktyā bhāṭṭaṃ prābhākaraṃ vaiyākaraṇaṃ ca pūrvapakṣaṃ sūcayati /
GK16andhvc3u:5672: bhāṭṭamate hi--- vākyārthamitaye teṣāṃ pravṛttau nāntarīyakam /
GK16andhvc3u:5678: tatparyantatā tāmabhidhāṃ prati paryantatā avadhitā tātparyaviṣayateti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:5702: teṣāṃ padānāṃ vākyajananadvāreṇa vākyārthamitaye eva pravṛttiḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:5704: yathānnapākārthaṃ atrocyate---yatra śabdaḥ svārthamabhidadhāno 'rthāntaramavagamayati tatra yattasya svārthābhidhāyitvaṃ yacca tadarthāntarāvagamahetutvaṃ tayoraviśeṣo viśeṣo vā /
GK16andhvc3u:5706: yasmāttau dvau vyāpārau bhinnaviṣayau bhinnarūpau ca pratīyete eva /
GK16andhvc3u:5707: tathāhi vācakatvalakṣaṇo vyāpāraḥ śabdasya svārthaviṣayaḥ gamakatvalakṣaṇastvarthāntaraviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5708: locanam iti śabdāvagataiḥ padārthaistātparyeṇa yo 'rtha utthāpyate sa eva vākyārthaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:5713: etaccāsmābhiḥ prathamoddyota eva vitatya nirṇītamiti na punarāyasyate granthayojanaiva tu kriyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5717: vācakatvaṃ gamakatvaṃ ceti svarūpato bhedaḥ svārthe 'rthāntare ca krameṇeti viṣayataḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5719: no cetsa tasya na kaściditi ko viṣayārthaṃ bālapriyā pravṛttānāṃ kāṣṭhānāṃ jvalanam /
GK16andhvc3u:5720: ataḥ padānāṃ vākyārthamitiparyanta evābhidhāvyāpāro yathā kāṣṭhavyāpāraḥ pākānta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5731: vākyārthasya naimittikatvoktyaiva padārthānāṃ nimittatve siddhe 'pi vaiyākaraṇamatādviśeṣaṃ darśayitumāha--padārthānāntviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5733: pratītistu prathamaṃ vākyārthasya prābhākaramate kāryānvitābhidhānāditi bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:5743: samayāpekṣatvātsvārthe abhidhā tadanapekṣatvādanyatrārthe avagamanavyāpāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5748: nanu na gamyate tasmācchabdātkintu tatsambandhivaśādityata āha--no cedityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5753: yadi ca svasambandhitvaṃ sākṣāttasya syāttadārthāntararatvavyavahāra eva na syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:5763: yāvatā na sākṣātsambandhitvaṃ tena yukta evārthāntaravyavahāra iti viṣayabheda uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5764: nanu bhinne 'pi viṣaye akṣaśabdāderbahvarthasya eka evābhidhālakṣaṇo vyāpāra ityāśaṅkya rūpabhedamupapādayati--rūpabhedo 'pīti /
GK16andhvc3u:5767: yadeva vācakatvaṃ tadeva gamakatvaṃ yadi syādavācakasya gamakatvamapi na syāt,
GK16andhvc3u:5769: na caitadubhayamapi gītaśabde śabdavyatirikte cādhovaktratvakucakampanabāṣpāveśādau bālapriyā tasya arthāntarasya /
GK16andhvc3u:5788: āvṛttyapekṣatve 'pi tatra tatrārthe abhidhaiva vyāpāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5789: svarūpabhede prasiddhiṃ hetumuktvā punarhetvantaroktau bījaṃ darśayati--vipratipannaṃ pratīti /
GK16andhvc3u:5790: vipratipannaṃ vācakatvameva gamakatvaṃ nānyadanubhūyata iti vadantam /
GK16andhvc3u:5793: gamakatve sati vācakatvamapi naiva na syāditi yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:5798: tasmādbhinnaviṣayatvādbhinnarūpatvācca svārthābhidhāyitvamarthāntarāvagamahetutvaṃ ca śabdasya yattayoḥ spaṣṭa eva bhedaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5807: nanu gītādau mā bhūdvācakatvamiha tvarthāntare 'pa śabdasya vācakatvamevocyate,
GK16andhvc3u:5832: vyañjanāvyāpāraviṣayatāyā asmanmatasiddhāyāssādhanāt siddhasādhanaṃ nāma doṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5847: tatra ca tasyārthāntarasya pratīteḥ śabdāntareṇa svārthābhidhāyinā yadviṣayīkaraṇaṃ tatra prakāśanoktireva yuktā /
GK16andhvc3u:5849: yataḥ padārthapratītirasatyaiveti locanam yadviṣayīkaraṇaṃ tatra prakāśanoktireva yuktā na vācakatvoktiḥ śabdasya,
GK16andhvc3u:5854: vācyatvaṃ hi samayabalena nirvyavadhānaṃ pratipādyatvaṃ yathā tasyaivārthasya śabdāntaraṃ prati padāha--prasiddheti /
GK16andhvc3u:5855: prasiddhena vācakatayābhidhānāntareṇa yaḥ sambandho vācyatvaṃ tadeva tatra vā yadyogyatvaṃ tenopalakṣitasya /
GK16andhvc3u:5857: nāpi taṃ śabdaṃ prati tasyārthasyoktarūpaṃ vācyatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:5859: atha ca pratīyate so 'rtho na ca vācyavācakatvavyāpāremeti vilakṣaṇa evāsau vyāpāra iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:5864: na vācakatvoktiryuktetyatra hetutvena svārthābhidhāyineti padaṃ vācakatvanirvacanapūrvakamavatārayati---vācakatvaṃ hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5894: yathāhi ghaṭe niṣpanne tadupādānakāraṇānāṃ na pṛthagupalambhastathaiva vākye tadarthe vā pratīte padatadarthānāṃ teṣāṃ tadā vibhaktatayopalambhe vākyārthabuddhireva dūrībhavet /
GK16andhvc3u:5902: saugatakāpilamate tu yadyapyupādātavya ghaṭakāle upādānānāṃ na sattā ekatra kṣaṇakṣayitvena paratra tirobhūtatvena tathāpi pṛthaktayā nāstyupalambha itīyatyaṃśe dṛṣṭantaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5906: arthāntarapratītyanukūlā vākyasya yā śaktissā tātparyaśaktireva na tvadabhimateti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5908: yathā padārthe pratīte tātparyaśaktyā vākyārtho gamyate,
GK16andhvc3u:5923: nanu yairapīti sāmānyenoktirnaṃ ghaṭate sautagakāpilamatayorupādeyakāle upādānābhāvāditi śaṅkate--saugatetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5937: vākye pratīte tasmātpadānāṃ vākyārthe pratīte tasmātpadārthanāñca pṛthaktayā upalambho nāstītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5944: atra gamyaṃ hetuṃ darśayati locane--arthaikatvasyābhāvāditi padārthavākyārthapratītyoḥ vācyāvabhāsāvinābhāvena tasya prakāśanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:5946: yathaiva hi pradīpadvārema ghaṭapratītāvutpannāyāṃ na pradīpaprakāśo nivartate tadvadyvaṅgyapratītau vācyāvabhāsaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5948: nanvevaṃ yugapadarthadvayayogitvaṃ vākyasya prāptaṃ tadbhāve ca tasya vākyataiva vighaṭate,
GK16andhvc3u:5952: vyaṅgyasya hi kvacitprādhānyaṃ vācyasyopasarjanabhāvaḥ locanam evaṃ padārthavākyārthanyāyaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:5953: tātparyaśaktisādhakaṃ prakṛte viṣaye nirākṛtyābhimatāṃ prakāśaśakti sādhayituṃ taducitaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:5955: yato 'sau padārthavākyāthanyāyo neha yuktastasmāt prakṛtaṃ nyāyaṃ vyākaramapūrvakaṃ dārṣṭāntike yojayati--yathaiva hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:5956: nanu pūrvamuktam--- yathā padārthadvāreṇa vākyārthaḥ sa pratīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5958: iti tatkathaṃ sa eva nyāya iha yatnena nirākṛta ityāśaṅkyāha--yattviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5966: dūrībhāvaśca neṣṛ ityatastayoḥ pṛthagupalambhonābhyupeya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5977: ekaḥ artho yasya tasya bhāvaḥ aikārthyam /
GK16andhvc3u:5979: nanvekārthatvaṃ na lakṣaṇaṃ śleṣālaṅkāraviṣayasyānekārthasyāpi vākyatvāditi śaṅkāmabhiprāyapradarśanena pariharati--sakṛdityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5983: tasmātsthitametat--vyaṅgyaparatve 'pi kāvyasya na vyaṅgyasyāvideyatvamapi tu vyaṅgyatvameva /
GK16andhvc3u:5986: yatrāpi tasya prādhānyaṃ tatrāpi kimiti tasya svarūpamapahnūyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5987: locanam śruto hi śabdo yatraiva samayasmṛtiṃ karoti sa cedanenaivāgamitaḥ tadviramyavyāpārābhāvātsamayasmaraṇānāṃ bahūnāṃ yugapadayogātko 'rthabhedasyāvasaraḥ
GK16andhvc3u:5988: punaḥ śrutastu smṛto vāpi nāsāviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5995: nanu yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti vyaṅgyasya prāghānye vācyatvameva nyāyyam,
GK16andhvc3u:5996: tarhyaprādhānye kiṃ yuktaṃ vyaṅgyatvamiti cetsiddho naḥ pakṣaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:6007: tarhi tānyapi bahūni bhavantityāśaṅkāyāṃ tāni krameṇa yugapadveti vikalpādyaṃ nirākaroti--viramyavyāpārābhāvāditi /
GK16andhvc3u:6009: nanu śleṣaviṣaye vahvarthatvaṃ dṛśyata ityata āha--punarityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6010: śrutastu smṛto vāpītyubhayatra śabda iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6011: yadvā śrutaḥ anusaṃhitaḥ śabda iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6015: tathāca śleṣasthale āvṛtyā bodhādvākyatadartho bhinnau payorekatvañcaupacārikamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6019: tathāca vācyopasarjanako vyaṅgyo vyaṅgyopasarjanakavācyo vaika evārtho vākye na pratipādyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6022: tahyaprādhānye kiṃ yuktamiti siddhāntī pṛṣṭvā pūrvapakṣiṇa uttaramanuvadannāha--vyaṅgyatvamiti cedityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6028: itaśca vācakatvādyvañjakatvasyānyatvaṃ yadvācakatvaṃ śabdaikāśrayamitarattu śabdāśrayamarthāśrayaṃ ca śabdārthayordvayorapi vyañjakatvasya pratipāditatvāt
GK16andhvc3u:6030: kintu tato 'pi vyañjakatvaṃ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhidyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6032: tacca prādhānye 'pi vidyata iti svarūpamaheyameveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6038: etacca vitatya dhvanilakṣaṇe 'yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā' iti vāgrahaṇaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:6039: 'vyaṅktaḥ' iti dvirvacanaṃ ca vyācakṣāṇairasmābhiḥ prathamoddyota eva darśitamiti punarna vistāryate /
GK16andhvc3u:6044: bālapriyā śabdasya sambandhī vācyo lakṣyo vārthaḥ tatsambandhitvamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6057: vṛttāvita ityanena yadityādivakṣyamāṇaḥ āśrayabhedarūpo hetuḥ parāmṛśyata ityakṣipretya vyācaṣṭe--anenetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6063: arthasya vayañjakatvāśrayatvaṃ śabdāyattameveti yadyapi śabda eva vācakatvasyeva vyañjakatvasyāpi mukhya āśraya iti kāraṇaikyamasti,
GK16andhvc3u:6067: evaṃ mukhyādvācakatvādabhedaṃ pratipādya amukhyādapi pratipādayitumāheti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6077: na hyarthādyvaṅgyatrayapratītiryā tasyā amukhyatvaṃ manāgapi lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6084: vyañjakatvamārge tu yadārtho 'rthāntaraṃ dyotayati tadā svarūpaṃ prakāśayannevāsāvanyasya prakāśakaḥ pratīyate pradīpavat /
GK16andhvc3u:6086: yadi ca yatrātiraskṛtasvapratītirartho 'rthāntaraṃ lakṣayati tatra lakṣaṇāvyavahāraḥ kriyate,
GK16andhvc3u:6087: tadevaṃ sati lakṣaṇaiva mukhyaḥ śabdavyāpāra iti prāptam /
GK16andhvc3u:6089: locanam upacāralakṣaṇayoḥ prathamoddyota eva vibhajya nirṇītaṃ svarūpamiti na punarlikhyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6100: bālapriyā ca yā guṇavṛttiḥ sā ubhayāśrayāpīti vṛttau yojaneti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6102: mukhyatayaivetyatra mukhyatevaṃ prakṛtānurodhena vyācaṣṭe--askhalavadgatitveneti vācakatvameva guṇavṛttirityetadvivaṇoti--tatrāpītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6121: tadanyasthale nanu tvatpakṣe 'pi yadārtho vyaṅgyatrayaṃ prakāśayati tadā śabdasya kīdṛśo vyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6125: yato vyañjakatvasya rasādayo 'laṅkāraviśeṣā vyaṅgyarūpāvacchinnaṃ vastu ceti trayaṃ viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6126: tatra rasādipratītirguṇavṛttiriti locanam kīdṛśa iti mukhyo vā na vā prakārāntarābhāvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:6128: guṇonimittaṃ sādṛśyādi taddvārikā vṛttiḥ śabdasya vyāpāro guṇavṛttiriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6129: mukhya evāsau vyāpāraḥ sāmagrobhedācca vācakatvādyvatiricyata ityabhiprayeṇāha--ucyata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:6131: samayānupayogātpṛthagābhāsamānatvācceti tribhiḥ prakāraiḥ prakāśakatvasyaitadviparītarūpatrayāyāśca guṇavṛtteḥ svarūpabhedaṃ vyākhyāya viṣayabhedamapyāha--viṣayabhedo 'pīti /
GK16andhvc3u:6133: bālapriyā tu syādityāśaṅkya pariharati--'yadi ce' tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6143: tasminsati kiṃ syādityataḥ krameṇa dūṣaṇamāha--mukhyatva ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6152: guṇavṛttivyañjakatvayoḥ svarūpabhedahetūn bahugranthoktān sugrahatvāyaikagranthena vṛtyabhiprāyatayā upasaṃharannuttaragranthaṃ tātparyoktyāvatārayati--evamityādi
GK16andhvc3u:6165: na kenaciducyate na ca śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvc3u:6168: tacca na sarvaṃ guṇavṛtterviṣayaḥ prasidydhanuroghābhyāmapi gauṇānāṃ śabdānāṃ prayogadarśanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:6172: locanam vyañjakatvasya yo viṣayaḥ sa guṇavṛtterna viṣayaḥ anyaśca tasyā viṣayabhedo yojyaḥ tatra prathamaṃ prakāramāha--tatreti /
GK16andhvc3u:6177: vastuno yatpūrvaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tadyvācaṣṭe--cārutvapratītaya iti /
GK16andhvc3u:6186: na sarvamiti yathāsmābhirvyākhyātaṃ tathā sphuṭayati--yadapi ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:6189: paryāyeṇa vācakatvādguṇavṛtteśca bālapriyā vastumātraṃ bhavatu guṇavṛtterviṣayaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:6196: na ca śakyate vaktumityatra gamyaṃ hetumāha--lakṣaṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6229: tadubhayāśrayatvapratipādanāyaiva ca dhvaneḥ prathamataraṃ dvau prabhedāvupanyastau /
GK16andhvc3u:6230: tadubhayāśritatvācca tadekarūpatvaṃ tasya na śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvc3u:6233: na ca lakṣaṇaikarūpamevānyatra locanam dvitayādapi bhinnaṃ vyañjakatvamityupapādayati--vācakatveti /
GK16andhvc3u:6235: apiśabdo 'pi na kevalaṃ pūrvokto hetukalāpo yāvattadubhayāśrayatvena mukhyopacārāśrayatvena yadvyavasthānaṃ tadapi vācakaguṇavṛttivilakṣaṇasyaiveti vyāptighaṭanam /
GK16andhvc3u:6282: na ca teṣāṃ vācakatvaṃ lakṣaṇā vā kathañcillakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6284: yadi ca vācakatvalakṣaṇādīnāṃ śabdaprakārāṇāṃ prasiddhaprakāravilakṣaṇatve 'pi vyañjakatvasya darśanādvācakatvādiśabdadharmaprakāratvamayuktaṃ vaktum /
GK16andhvc3u:6285: yadi ca vācakatvalakṣaṇādīnāṃ śabdaprakārāṇāṃ prasiddhaprakāravilakṣaṇatve 'pi vyañjakatvaṃ prakāratvena parikalpyate tacchabdasyaiva prakāratvena kasmānna parikalpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6322: parikalpanaṃ tadevaṃ śābde vyavahāre trayaḥ prakārāḥ---vācakatvaṃ guṇavṛttirvyañjakatvaṃ ca /
GK16andhvc3u:6323: tatra vyañjakatve yadā vyaṅgyaprādhānyaṃ tadā dhvaniḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:6324: tasya cāvivakṣitavācyo vivakṣitānyaparavācyaśceti dvau prabhedāvanukrāntau prathamataraṃ tau savistaraṃ nirṇītau /
GK16andhvc3u:6325: anyo brūyāt--nanu vivakṣitānyaparavācye dhvanau guṇavṛttitā locanam vyañjakatvaṃ vācakatvāmiti yadi paryāyau kalpyete tarhi vyañjakatvaṃ śabda ityapa paryāyatā kasmānna kalpyate,
GK16andhvc3u:6327: vyañjakatvasya tu viviktaṃ svarūpaṃ darśitaṃ tadviṣayāntare kathaṃ viparyastatām /
GK16andhvc3u:6328: evaṃ hi parvatagato dhūmo 'nagnijo 'pi syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6333: yadyapi ca tasya tadubhayāśrayatvena vyavasthānāditi brūvatā nirṇītacaramevaitat,
GK16andhvc3u:6334: tathāpi guṇavṛtteravivakṣitavācyasya ca durnirūpaṃ vailakṣaṇyaṃ yaḥ paśyati taṃ pratyāśaṅkānivāraṇārtho 'yamupakramaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6352: vācakāśrayaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ vācakatvādimūlaṃ na cetparvatagato dhūmo 'nagnijaśca syādato viparyāso na yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6362: la avivakṣitavācyasyeti dhvaneśeṣa ritiḥ yo vailakṣaṇyaṃ durnirūpaṃ paśyati,
GK16andhvc3u:6368: na hi guṇavṛttau yadā nimittena kenacidviṣayāntare śabda āropyate atyantatiraskṛtasvārthaḥ yathā--'agnirmāṇavakaḥ' ityādau,
GK16andhvc3u:6372: guṇavṛttivyavahārābhāve hetuṃ darśayituṃ tasyā eva guṇavṛttestāvadvṛttāntaṃ darśayati--na hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:6373: guṇatayā vṛttirvyāpāro guṇavṛttiḥ guṇena nimittena sādṛśyādinā ca vṛttiḥ arthāntaraviṣaye 'pi śabdasya sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti gaumaṃ darśayati
GK16andhvc3u:6374: yadā vā svārthamiti bālapriyā ayamupakramaḥ vṛttikāropakramaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6397: ata eva ca vivakṣitānyaparavācye dhvanau vācyavācakayodvayorapi svarūpapratītirarthāvagamanaṃ dṛśyata iti vyañjakatvavyavahāro yuktyanurodhī
GK16andhvc3u:6399: tathāvidhe viṣaye vācakatvasyaiva vyañjakatvamiti guṇavṛttivyavahāro niyamenaiva na śakyate kartum /
GK16andhvc3u:6402: ata eva atyantatiraskṛtasvārthaśabdena viṣayāntaramākrāmati cetyanena śabdena tadeva bhedadvayaṃ darśayati--ata eva ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:6403: yata eva na tatroktatahetubalādguṇavṛttavyavahāro nyāyyastata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6408: uktaguṇavṛttiśabdārthābhiprāyeṇa 'yadā nimittene' tyādigranthena gauṇīṃ 'yadā vā svārthami' tyādagranthena lakṣaṇāñca darśayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6409: nanu guṇavṛtterbahurūpatve 'pi kimitīdaṃ bhedadvayaṃ sodāharaṇaṃ darśitamityata āha--anenetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6415: vivakṣitavācyatvaṃ tadā na hyupapadyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6418: gaṅgādiśabdo hi gaṅgātīratvādinā kevalatīratvādinā vā gaṅgāyāstīrameva lakṣayatītyatoṃ'śena svārthāparityāgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6439: tasya prabhedadvaye guṇavṛttiprabhedadvayarūpatā lakṣyata eva yataḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6440: ayamapi na doṣaḥ. yasmādavivakṣitavācyo dhvanirgumavṛttimārgāśrayo 'pi bhavati na tu guṇavṛttirūpa eva /
GK16andhvc3u:6442: vyañjakatvaṃ ca yathoktacārutvahetuṃ locanam evamabhyupagamaṃ pradarśakṣepaṃ darśayati---avivakṣiteti /
GK16andhvc3u:6445: avivakṣitavācyasya yatprabhedadvayaṃ tasmin gaumalākṣaṇikatvātmakaṃ prakāradvayaṃ lakṣyate nirbhāsyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6447: gumavṛtteryomārgaḥ prabhedadvayaṃ sa āśrayo nimittatayā prākkakṣyāniveśī yasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6452: yataḥ pūrvamevoktam-- mukhyāṃ vṛttiṃ parityajya guṇavṛttyārthadarśanam /
GK16andhvc3u:6453: yaduddiśya phalaṃ tatra śabdo naiva skhaladgatiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:6455: na hi prayojanaśūnya upacāraḥ prayojanāṃśaniveśī ca vyañjanavyāpāra iti bhavadbhirevābhyādhāyītyāśaṅkyābhimataṃ
GK16andhvc3u:6467: nanu guṇavṛttirhi vyañjakatvaśūnyāpi dṛśyata ityanenaivāvivikṣitavācyasya guṇavṛttirūpatvābhāve
GK16andhvc3u:6481: sā abedopacārarūpā yathetyādyanvayo yāpītyādivākye vācyetyādervyaṅgyetyādeścānuṣaṅgaśca bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6482: tatra vācyadharmāśrayeṇetyetatprakṛtānuguṇaṃ vivṛṇoti locane---vācyaviṣayo yo dharma iti /
GK16andhvc3u:6487: yathā ca 'priye jane nāsti punaruktam' ityādau /
GK16andhvc3u:6488: yāpi lakṣaṇarūpā guṇavṛttiḥ sāpyupalakṣaṇīyārthasaṃbandhamātrāśrayeṇa cārurūpavyaṅgyapratītiṃ vināpi sambhavatyeva,
GK16andhvc3u:6503: yathā pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkta ityādau śrutasya pīnatvāde rupapādakatayā rātribhojanādikaṃ kalpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6504: kalpitasya tasyārthāntarasya pīnatvādyupapādana eva paryavasānañca tathā guṇavṛttisthale
GK16andhvc3u:6508: priya iti tīkṣṇatvādatyādivadguṇarūpahetukathanaṃ punaruktapadenānupādeyatvaṃ lakṣyata iti pūrvamevoktam /
GK16andhvc3u:6512: upalaṇīyo lakṣyo yo 'rtho mañjasthabālakādistena saha yassambandha ādhārādheyabhāvādirmañcādapadamukhyārthasya tanmātrāśrayeṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6515: atra mañcasthabālakānāṃ bahutvādakaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ tadapi na cārutvakāri /
GK16andhvc3u:6517: nanu vināpi cāruvyaṅgyapratītiṃ vyañjanāvyāpāro bhavatvityata āha--tadabhāva ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6523: kṣaṇa eva dṛṣṭo naṣṭaśca divyavibhavo yasya saḥ tathāvidho yaḥ prākṛto daridraḥ puruṣaḥ tadvat /
GK16andhvc3u:6524: tasya yathā pratyāvṛtya prākṛtavibhāva eva tathā vyañjanāvyāpārasya yatra tu sā cārurūpavyaṅgyapratītihetustatrāpi vyañjakatvānupraveśenaiva vācakatvavat /
GK16andhvc3u:6526: yathā---'suvarṇapuṣpāṃ pṛthivīm' ityādau tatra cārurūpavyaṅgyapratītireva prayojiketi
GK16andhvc3u:6527: tathāvidhe 'pi locanam nanu yatra vyaṅgye 'rthe viśrāntistatra kiṃ kartavyamityāśaṅkyāha--yatra tviti /
GK16andhvc3u:6530: vācakatve hi tvayaivāṅgīkṛto vyañjanavyāpāraḥ prathamaṃ dhvaniprabhedamapratyācakṣaṇeneti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6531: kiñca vastvantare mukhye sambhavati sambhavadeva vastvantaraṃ mukhyamevāropyate viṣayāntaramātratastvāropavyavahāra iti jīvitamupacārasya,
GK16andhvc3u:6532: suvarṇapuṣpāṇāṃ tu mūlata evāsambhavāttaduccayanasya tatra ka āropavyavahāraḥ;
GK16andhvc3u:6538: vyaṅgyameva hi prayojanarūpaṃ pratītiviśrāmasthāmāropite tvasambhavati pratitiviśrāntirāśaṅkanīyāpi na bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:6556: nanu tayorubhayossatve kuta āropavyavahāra ityata āha---viṣayāntaramātrata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:6567: nanu tarhi suvarṇapuṣpāṃ pṛthivīmiti prayogaḥ kathamupapadyata ityata āha--suvarṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6568: ityāropassyāddhīti sambandhaḥ. tadāropaṃ vinā tasya mahākaviprayogasyānirvāhāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6576: nanvasambhavadapi viṣaye guṇavṛttau satyāmapi dhvanivyavahāra eva yuktyanurodhī /
GK16andhvc3u:6578: tu tadekarūpā sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādinī pratīyamānā pratītihetutvādviyaṣāntare locanam satyāmapīti /
GK16andhvc3u:6580: vyañjakatvalakṣaṇo yo viśeṣastenāviśiṣṭā avidyamānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ viśeṣo bhedanaṃ yasyāḥ vyañjakatvaṃ na tasyā bheda ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6581: yadi vā vyañjakatvalakṣaṇena vyāpāraviśeṣemāviśiṣṭā nyakkṛtasvābhāvā āsamantādvyāptā /
GK16andhvc3u:6583: tena vyañjakatvalakṣaṇena sahaikaṃ rūpaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathāvidhā na bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:6585: na hi guṇavṛtteścārupratītihetutvamastīti bālapriyā vyaṅgyamātrānvitamāropitameva pratītiviśrāntisthānamastu,
GK16andhvc3u:6601: yadvā viśiṣṭaṃ viśeṣaḥ ādaraḥ avidyamānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ yasyāsseti vyatpattimabhipretyāha--nyakkṛtasvabhāveti /
GK16andhvc3u:6608: yato guṇavṛttiḥ sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādinī pratīyamānā ca na bhavatyato na tadekarūpeti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6609: vyaṅgyagataṃ sahṛdayahṛdayāhṇādakatvaṃ pratīyamānatvañca vyañjakatve samāropya guṇavṛttestanniṣedhapūrvaktaṃ tadekarūpatvaṃ niṣiddhamiti bodhyam
GK16andhvc3u:6623: api ca vyañjakatvalakṣaṇo yaḥ śabdārthayorgharmaḥ sa prasiddhasambandhānurodhīti na kasyācidvimativiṣayatāmarbahati /
GK16andhvc3u:6624: śabdārtharyorhi prasiddho yaḥ sambandho vācyavācakabhāvākhyāstamanurundhāna eva vyañjakatvalakṣaṇo vyāpāraḥ sāmagrantarasambandhādaupādhikaḥ pravartate /
GK16andhvc3u:6625: ata eva vācakatvāttasya viśeṣaḥ vācakatvaṃ hi śabdaviśeṣasya niyata ātmā vyutpattikālādārabhya tadavinābhāvena tasya prasiddhatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:6631: niyatasvabhāvācca vācyavācakatvādaupādhikatvenāniyataṃ vyañjakatvaṃ kathaṃ na bhinnanimittamiti darśayati--api ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:6636: athāpi cetyādigrantho 'bhāvavādinaḥ prati sthūṇānikhanananyāyena vyañjakatvasādhaka ityabhiprāyeṇāvatārayati--niyatetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6647: nanu sāmagryantarasambandhajanitatve 'pyayaṃ vyāpāro vācakavyāpāratvādabhidhaivāstvityata āha--ata evetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6670: tathaivedaṃ yathā darśitaṃ locanam saphuṭayati--ata eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:6707: yasya yaraya vyaṅgyo 'rtho vidyate tasya tasya vyañjakatvamityevamarthaviṣaye niyatatvaṃ vyañjakatvasyāstyevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6721: śabdātmanyaniyatatvādeva ca tasya vācakatvaprakāratā na śakyā kalpayitum /
GK16andhvc3u:6722: yadi hi vācakatvaprakāratā tasya bhavettacchabdātmani niyatatāpi syādvācakatvavat /
GK16andhvc3u:6723: sa ca tathāvidha aupādhiko dharmaḥ śabdānāmautpattikaśabdārthasambanthavādinā vākyatattvavidā pauruṣāpauruṣeyayorvākyayorviśeṣamabhidadhatā
GK16andhvc3u:6724: tadanabhyupagame hi tasya śabdārthasambandhanityatve satyapyapauruṣeyapauruṣeyayorvākyayorarthapratipādane locanam svasminviṣaye ca gṛhīte trairūpyādau na vyabhicarati /
GK16andhvc3u:6728: janmanā dvitīyo bhāvavikāraḥ sattārūpaḥ sāmīpyāllaṇāto vānutpattiḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:6733: pakṣadharmatājijñāsādīnāmanumitiṃ prati prayojakatvaṃ prācīnābhyupagataṃ tadvārā ca liṅgatvasya tadadhīnatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:6741: tatra trairūpyasya liṅge abādhitatvādessādhye ca grahaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6742: na vyabhicaratīti jñāpakatvaṃ svaviṣaye na vyabhicaratītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6743: svaviṣayāvyabhicārīti vṛttestu jñāpakatvasya viṣaye jñāpye vahnyādau na vyabhicaratītyevārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6748: nanvevaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ na kasya cidvimativiṣayatāmarhantītyuktamayuktaṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvalakṣaṇasya
GK16andhvc3u:6753: 'autpattikastu śabdasyārthena sambandha' ityādijaiminīyaṃ sūtraṃ manasi kṛtyoktam
GK16andhvc3u:6754: 'autpattikastu śabdasyārthena sambandha' ityādijaiminīyaṃ sūtraṃ manasi kṛtyoktam 'autpattike'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6757: jāyate asti vardhate vipariṇamate apakṣīyate naśyatīti ṣaṅvikārā bhāvānāmuktāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6758: tatra dvitīyassattārūpo vikāraḥ utpattipadārthena janmanā sāmīpyānnimittāllakṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6761: tadabhyupagame tu pauruṣeyāṇāṃ vākyānāṃ puruṣecchānuvidhānasamāropitaupādhikavyāpārāntarāṇāṃ satyapi svābhidheyasambandhāparityāge mithyārthatāpi bhavet /
GK16andhvc3u:6762: locanam rūḍhyā vā autpattikaśabdo nityaparyāyaḥ tena nityaṃ yaḥ śabdārthayoḥ śaktilakṣaṇaṃ saṃbandhamicchati jaimineyastenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6764: tataśca puruṣadoṣānupraveśasyākiñcitkaratvāttannibandhaṃ pauruṣeyeṣu vākyeṣu yadaprāmāṇyaṃ tanna sidhyet /
GK16andhvc3u:6765: pratipattureva hi yaditathā pratipattistarhi vākyasya na kaścidaparādha iti kathamaprāmāṇyam /
GK16andhvc3u:6767: bālapriyā ityanuṣaṅgaḥ virodharūpasambandhena nimittena janmanā tpattirlakṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6786: nirviśeṣatvaṃ syādityatreṣṭāpattiṃ parihartuṃ nirviśeṣatve doṣaṃ darśayati--tataścetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6788: puruṣe vaktari yaḥ kādācitko doṣasya bhramāderanupraveśaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:6793: pauruṣeyeṣu laukikeṣu vākyeṣu ayathārthavākyeṣu aprāmāṇyam yathārthatvanimittakamaprāmāṇyam /
GK16andhvc3u:6804: puruṣecchāyāḥ vaktṛpuruṣābhiprāyasyānuvidhānāddhetoḥ samāropitaṃ kalpitamata evaupādhikañca yadvyāpārāntaraṃ yeṣu teṣāmityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6806: tathā hi--himamayūkhaprabhṛtīnāṃ nirvāpitasakalajīvalokaṃ śītalatvamudvahatāmeva priyāvirahadahanadahyamānamānasairjanairālokyamānānāṃ satāṃ santāpakāritvaṃ prasiddhameva /
GK16andhvc3u:6807: tasmātpauruṣeyāṇāṃ vākyānāṃ satyapi naisargike 'rthasambandhe mithyārthatvaṃ samarthayitumicchatā vācakatvavyatiriktaṃ kiñcadrūpamaupādhikaṃ vyaktamevābhidhānīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:6810: pauruṣeyāṇi ca vākyāni prādhānyena puruṣābhiprāyameva prakāśayanti /
GK16andhvc3u:6811: sa ca vyaṅgya eva locanam nanu dharmāntarābhyupagame 'pi kathaṃ mithyārthatā,
GK16andhvc3u:6812: na hi prakāśakatvalakṣaṇaṃ svadharmaṃ jahāti śabda ityāśaṅkyāha--duśyata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:6814: yadāha--“evamayaṃ puruṣā vedeti bhavati pratyayaḥ na tvevamayamartha” iti /
GK16andhvc3u:6816: na tu bālapriyā uktārthasyānubhavasiddhatvamuktaṃ dṛśyata ityādinā tadvacanaṃ kimarthamityatastadganthamavatārayati--nanvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6825: sāmagnyantarasampātena sampāditamata evaupādhikaṃ dharmāntaraṃ yeṣu teṣām /
GK16andhvc3u:6829: tathāvidhaṃ śītalatvamudvahatāmityanenāparityaktasvabhāvatvaṃ priyāvirahetyādanā sāmagryantaretyādyuktaṃ santāpakāritvamityanena viruddhakriyatvañca darśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:6832: pauruṣeyāṇi vākyāni prādhānyena puruṣābhiprāyameva prakāśayantītyatra jaiminisūtrabhāṣyakṛdvacanaṃ pramāṇayati--yadāheti /
GK16andhvc3u:6845: nanvaneva nyāyena sarveṣāmeva laukikānāṃ vākyānāṃ dhvanivyavahāraḥ prasaktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6848: kiṃ tu vakrabhiprāyuprakāśanena yadvyañjakatvaṃ tatsarveṣāmeva laukikānāṃ vākyānāmaviśiṣṭam /
GK16andhvc3u:6849: tattu vācakatvānna bhidyate vyaṅgyaṃ hi tatra nāntarīyakatayā vyavasthitam /
GK16andhvc3u:6854: bālapriyā nanvastu puruṣābhiprāyo vyaṅgyaḥ vyāpārāntarañca vyañjakatvaṃ vākyasya,
GK16andhvc3u:6856: tathā abhiprāyavyañjakatvena prakāreṇa atra pauruṣeyavākye viṣaye /
GK16andhvc3u:6869: tathāvoktarūpasya śabdārthasambandhasya nityatve 'pi pauruṣeyavākyānāṃ puruṣābhiprāyānuvidhāyitvāttadabhipretaṃ yadvākyārthasyāsatyatvaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:6871: apauruṣeyāṇāṃ vākyānāntu vakturabhāvena teṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva prāmāṇyañceti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:6876: anena śabdasya vyaṅgyena saha yassambandhastasya vācyavācakabhāvatvaṃ nāstīti darśitaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:6887: yadvyajakatvaṃ tattu vācakatvānna bhidyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6892: yasya tu vivakṣitatvena vyaṅgyasya sthitiḥ tadyvañjakatvaṃ dhvanivyavahārasya prayojakam /
GK16andhvc3u:6893: locanam gāmānayeti śrute 'pyabhiprāye vyakte tadabhiprāyaviśiṣṭo 'rtha evābhipretānayanādakriyāyogyo na tvabhiprāyamātreṇa kiñcitkṛtyamiti bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:6901: nanvevamabhiprāyasyaiva vyaṅgyatvāttrividhaṃ vyaṅgyamiti yaduktaṃ tatkathamityāha--- bālapriyā 'nāntarīyakataye'ti /
GK16andhvc3u:6908: gokarmakānayanādikriyārūpārthaṃ vinā abhiprāyāsiddhirataśca na vācakatvātpṛthagvyañjakatvaṃ vācyādyvaṅgyamiveti ca bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6913: nanu dhvanyudāharaṇeṣvapi laukikavākyeṣviva vivakṣitatvāparaparyāyaṃ prādhānyaṃ vācyasya vidyata ityāśaṅkyāyāmabhiprāyamāha---kāvyavācakyebhya ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6926: tanmūlakatvāditi kathaṃ vyaṅgyasya prādhānyamityata āha--sā cetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6931: ataśca vācyasya na vivakṣitatvalakṣaṇaṃ prādhānyaṃ kāvyavākyeṣviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6933: vṛttāvabhiprāyaviśeṣarūpaṃ yadyvaṅgyantu tātparyeṇa prakāśyamānaṃ sacchaśabdārthābhyāṃ prakāśyate tadvivakṣitaṃ bhavatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6943: yattvabhiprāyaviśeṣarūpaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ śabdārthābhyāṃ prakāśate tadbhavati vivakṣitaṃ tātparyeṇa prakāśyamānaṃ sat /
GK16andhvc3u:6944: kintu tadeva kevalamaparimitaviṣayasya ghvanivyavahārasya na prayojakamavyāpakatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:6946: ca sarvameva dhvanivyavahārasya prayojakamiti yathoktavyañjakatvaviśeṣa dhavnilakṣaṇe
GK16andhvc3u:6948: tasmādvākyatattvavidhāṃ matena tāvadyvañjakatvalakṣaṇaḥ śābdo vyāpāro na virodhī pratyutānuguṇa eva lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6950: iti locanam evaṃ mīmāṃsakānāṃ nātra vimatiryukteti pradarśya vaiyākaraṇānāṃ naivātra
GK16andhvc3u:6952: paritaḥ niścitaṃ pramāṇena sthāpitaṃ nirapabhraṃśaṃ galitabhedaprapañcatayā avidyāsaṃskārarahitaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:6962: gokarmakānayanādikriyārūpārthaṃ vinā abhiprāyāsiddhirataśca na vācakatvātpṛthagvyañjakatvaṃ vācyādvyaṅgyamiveti ca bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6967: nanu dhvanyudāharaṇeṣvapi laukikavākyeṣviva vivakṣitatvāparaparyāyaṃ prādhānyaṃ vācyasya vidyata ityāśaṅkāyāmabhiprāyamāha--kāvyavākyebhya ityādi
GK16andhvc3u:6980: tanmūlakatvāditi kathaṃ vyaṅgyasya prādhānyamityata āha--sā cetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6985: ataśca vācyasya na vivakṣitatvalakṣaṇaṃ prādhānyaṃ kāvyavākyeṣviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6987: vṛttāvabhiprāyaviśeṣarūpaṃ yadyvaṅgyantu tātparyeṇa prakāśyamānaṃ sacchaśabdārthābhyāṃ prakāśyate tadvivakṣitaṃ bhavatīti śambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6996: guṇībhūtvayaṅgyasthale 'bhiprāyarūpavyaṅgyasya yattvabhiprāyaviśeṣarūpaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ śabdārthābhyāṃ prakāśate tadbhavati vivakṣitaṃ tātparyeṇa prakāśyamānaṃ sat /
GK16andhvc3u:6997: kintu tadeva kevalamaparimitaviṣayasya dhvanivyavahārasya ya prayojakamavyāpakatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:6999: ca sarvameva dhvanivyavahārasya prayojakamiti yathoktavyañjakatvaviśeṣe dhvanilakṣaṇe
GK16andhvc3u:7001: tasmādvākyattvavidāṃ matena tāvadyvañjakatvalakṣaṇaḥ śābdo vyāpāro na virodhī pratyutānuguṇa eva lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:7003: iti locanam evaṃ mīmāṃsakānāṃ nātra vimatiryukteti pradarśya vaiyākaraṇānāṃ naivātra
GK16andhvc3u:7005: paritaḥ niścitaṃ pramāṇena sthāpitaṃ nirapabhraṃśaṃ galitabhedaprapañcatayā avidyāsaṃskārarahitaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7016: paritaḥ bahumukhānvādinaḥ prati doṣaviśeṣavācināpabhraṃśaśabdenātra sarvadoṣaheturavidyāsaṃskāro lakṣyata ityāśayena vyācaṣṭe--galitetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7021: śabda ityartha iti cākhyā yasya tat /
GK16andhvc3u:7028: viśeṣāṇāṃ vyaṣṭirūpāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ śaktibhirnirbharatāpūrṇatā tayā cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7032: viseṣāṇāṃ vyaṣṭirūpāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ śaktibhirnirbharatāpūrṇatā tayā cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7037: viśvasya yāni nirmāṇāni tadviṣayā yāḥ śaktayaḥ taiḥ saha kiṃ virodhāvirodhau cintyete /
GK16andhvc3u:7038: kṛtrimaśabdārthasambandhavādināṃ tu yuktividāmanubhavasiddha evāyaṃ vyañjakabhāvaḥ śabdānāmarthāntarāṇāmivāvirodhaśceti na pratikṣepyapadavīmavatarati
GK16andhvc3u:7039: locanam etaduktaṃ bhavati--vaiyākaraṇāstāvadbrahmapadenānyatkiñcidicchanti tatra kā kathā vācakatvavyañjakatvayoḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7042: evaṃ vākyavidāṃ padavidāṃ cāvimativiṣayatvaṃ pradarśya māṇatattvavidāṃ tārkikāṇāmapi na yuktātra vimatiriti darśayitumāha--kṛtrimeti /
GK16andhvc3u:7043: kṛtrimaḥ saṅketamātrasvabhāvaḥ parikalpitaḥ śabdārthayoḥ sambandha iti ye vadanti naiyāyikasaugatādayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7079: asya śabdasyāyamartha ityupadeśassa iti ca kecit /
GK16andhvc3u:7091: vyañjakatve tu tatpṛṣṭhabhāvini bhāvāntarasādhāraṇe lokaprasiddha evānugamyamāne ko vimatīnāmavasaraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7092: locanam nanvanubhavena dvicandrādyapi siddhaṃ tacca vimatipadamityāśaṅkyāha--avirodhaśceti /
GK16andhvc3u:7093: avidyamāno virodho nirodho bādhakātmako dvitīyena jñānena yasya tenānubhavasiddhaścābādhitaścetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7096: naitat; na hi vācakatve sā vimatiḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7097: api tu vācakatvasya naisargikatvakṛtrimatvādau tadāha--vācakatve hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:7098: nanvevaṃ vyañjakatvasyāpi dharmāntaramukhena vipratipattiviṣayatāpi syādityāśaṅkyāha--vyañjakatve tviti /
GK16andhvc3u:7100: akṣinikocādeḥ sāṅketikatvaṃ cakṣurādikasyānādiryogyateti dṛṣṭvā bālapriyā yathā dīpādiḥ parikalpitanijaviṣayādanyaṃ viṣayamapi prakāśayati,
GK16andhvc3u:7101: tathā śabdo 'pi saṅketitādanyaṃ viṣayaṃ prakāśayatīti teṣāmapyanubhavasiddha evāyaṃ śabdānāṃ vyañjakabhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7105: taccetyasya sthāne na ca neti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7124: vācakatvasya vipratipattiviṣayatvaṃ vyañjakatvasya tadabhāvañca darśayan bhāvamāha--akṣītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7134: alaukike hyarthe tārkikāṇāṃ vimatayo nikhilāḥ pravartante na tu laukike /
GK16andhvc3u:7135: na hi nīlamadhurādhiṣvaśeṣalokendriyagocare bāghārahite tattve parasparaṃ vipratipannā dṛśyante /
GK16andhvc3u:7136: na hi bādhārahitaṃ nīlaṃ nīlamiti bruvannapareṇa pratiṣidhyate naitannīlaṃ pītametaditi /
GK16andhvc3u:7137: tathaiva vyañjakatvaṃ vācakānāṃ śabdānāmavācakānāṃ ca gītadhvanīnāmaśabdarūpāṇāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7138: ca ceṣṭādīnāṃ locanam kāmamastu saṃśayaḥ śabdasyābhidheyaprakāśane vyañjakatvaṃ tu
GK16andhvc3u:7139: yādṛśamekarūpaṃ bhāvāntareṣu tādṛgeva prakṛte 'pīti niścataikarūpe kaḥ saṃśayasyāvakāśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7141: api tu prādhānikamidaṃ pāramāṇavamidaṃ jñānamātramidaṃ tucchadamiti tatsṛṣṭāvalaukikya eva vipratipattayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7145: saha sambandhasya sāṅkatikatvaṃ dvitīyasyārthena saha sambandhasya naisargikatvañca dṛṣṭverthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7147: śabdasya vācakatve kimidaṃ sāṅketikamāhosvinnaisargikamiti vācakatvadharmikassaṃśayaḥ kāmaṃ bhavatvityarthaḥ /
