GK16andhvc3u:7153: na tu laukika ityuktamupapādayati vṛttau 'na hī'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7169: etanna nīlametatpītamiti na hi pratiṣidhyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7171: nīle etanna nīlamiti vipratipattirna hīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7175: api tbityalaukikya eva vipratipattaya iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7195: aśabdamarthaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ hi sūcayanto vyāhārāstathā vyāpārā nibaddhāścānibaddhāśca vidagghapariṣatsu vividhā vibhāvyante /
GK16andhvc3u:7196: tānupahāsyatāmātmanaḥ pariharan ko 'tisandadhīta sacetāḥ locanam aśabdamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:7202: lakṣaṇe śatrādeśaḥ ātmanaḥ karmabhūtasya yopahasanīyatā tasyāḥ parihāreṇepalakṣitastāṃ parijīhīrṣurityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7218: tathābhūto vyāpāro vyañjakatvalakṣaṇo yeṣāṃ tathābhūtā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7254: astyatisandhānāvasaraḥ vyañjakatvaṃ śabdānāṃ gamakatvaṃ tacca liṅgatvamataśca vyaṅgyapratītirliṅgipratītireveti liṅgiliṅgabhāva eva teṣāṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvo nāparaḥ kaścit /
GK16andhvc3u:7255: ataścaitadavaśyameva boddhavyaṃ yasmādvakrabhiprāyāpekṣayā vyañjakatvamidānīmeva tvayā pratipāditaṃ vakrabhiprāyaścānumeyarūpa eva /
GK16andhvc3u:7261: vyañjakatvaṃ nāpahnūyate tattvatiriktaṃ na bhavati api tu liṅgiliṅgabhāva evāyam /
GK16andhvc3u:7277: paroktaṃ svīkṛtyāpi svasiddhāntasthāpanāya yo vādassa prauñavādaḥ taṃ vadatīti prauḍhavādī,
GK16andhvc3u:7283: vṛttau 'tat kiṃ naḥ chinnam' ityuktasyaiva vivaraṇam--'vācakatve'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7285: prasiddho yaśśabdasya prakāro dharmo 'bhidhā lakṣaṇā ca tadvilakṣaṇatvamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7293: vyañjakatvaṃ liṅgatvamastvityuktyā siddhaṃ nassamīhitamiti manyamānaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇaṃ pratyāha--'na punari'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7295: na punarayaṃ paramārtho yadvyañjakatvaṃ liṅgatvameva sarvatra vyaṅgyapratītiśca liṅgipratītireveti /
GK16andhvc3u:7297: śabdānāṃ liṅgatvameveti tadetadyathāsmābhirabhihitaṃ tadvibhajyaṃ pratipādyate śrūyatām /
GK16andhvc3u:7300: vivakṣā ca śabdasvarūpaprakāśanecchā śabdenārthaprakāśanecchā ceti dviprakārā /
GK16andhvc3u:7304: te tu dve apyanumeyo viṣayaḥ śabdānām /
GK16andhvc3u:7307: prayoktā hi kadācitsvaśabdenārthe locanam śabdasya yo vyāpārastasya viṣayo viśeṣa ityāhuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7309: pradīpālokādau liṅgiliṅgabhāvaśūnyo 'pi hi vyaṅgyañjakabhāvo 'stīti vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvasya liṅgiliṅgabhāvo 'vyāpaka iti kathaṃ tādātmyam /
GK16andhvc3u:7311: śabda uccarite yāvati bālapriyā iti yadayaṃ punarna paramārthaṃ iti sambandhaḥ. atrābhiprāyamāha locane--pradīpetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7313: liṅgiliṅgabhāvena liṅginirūpitaliṅgatvena śūnyaḥ vinā kṛtaḥ tadasamānādhikaraṇa iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:7314: śūnye iti pāṭhe pradīpālokādāvityasya viśeṣaṇaṃ tat /
GK16andhvc3u:7321: yadi hi vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvo liṅgiliṅgabhāva eva syānna tadatiriktaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7322: tarhi yatra yatra vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvastatra tatra liṅgiliṅgabhāvo 'pi bhavet,
GK16andhvc3u:7324: nanu vaktrabhiprāyasya vyañjakatvantu śabdasya liṅgatvameva vaktṛjñānānumāpakatvaṃ śabdasyeti vadatāṃ prābhākarāṇāṃ matasya saṃvādakatvādityāśaṅkāyāmuktaṃ vṛttau 'yadapī'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7332: tatra śabdaprayuyukṣā arthapratipipādayiṣā cetyubhayyapi vivakṣānumeyā tāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:7333: yastu pratipipādayiṣāyāṃ karmabhūto 'rthasyatra śabdaḥ karaṇatvena vyavasthitaḥ na tvasāvanumeyaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7335: na ca tatra śabdasyakaraṇatve yaiva liṅgasyetikartavyatā pakṣadharmatvagrahaṇādikā sāsti,
GK16andhvc3u:7342: śabdasvarūpaprakāśanecchayoccaritena śabdenāyaṃ prāṇīti śroturyā prāṇitvamātrasya pratipattiḥ mātrapadenārthasya vyavacchedaḥ sā phalaṃ yasyāssetyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:7346: śabdaviśeṣasya pratipipādayiṣitārthabodhānukūlasya vākyasya yadavadhāraṇaṃ vakturanusandhānaṃ tasminnavasitā paryavasitā tadutpādanena kṛtārtheti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:7347: ata eva vyavahitāpi śābdabodhaṃ prati vyavadhānavatyapi /
GK16andhvc3u:7349: śabdenārthaviśeṣasyāvadhāraṇe śroturbodhe avasitā paramparayā tadutpādiketi yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:7367: pratipādanaṃ prati karaṇatvāttathāvidhārthaṃ prati karaṇatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:7374: pakṣadharmatvagrahaṇādikā liṅgasyetikartavyatā yā sā tatra śabdasya karaṇatvena cāstīti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:7381: tattacchabdasya tattadarthe yassaṅketastasya sphuraṇaṃ smaraṇaṃ sa tu dvividho 'pi pratipādyo viṣayaḥ śabdānāṃ na liṅgitayā svarūpeṇa prakāśate,
GK16andhvc3u:7383: vivakṣāviṣayatvaṃ hi tasyārthasya śabdairliṅgitayā pratīyate na tu svarūpam /
GK16andhvc3u:7384: yadi hi liṅgitayā tatra sabdānāṃ vyāpāraḥ syattacchabdārthe locanam tvanyaiva saṃketasphuraṇādikā tanna tatra śabdo liṅgam /
GK16andhvc3u:7385: itikartavyatā ca dvidhā--ekayābhidhāvyāpāraṃ karoti ditīyayā vyañjanāvyāpāram /
GK16andhvc3u:7411: gopanakṛtaṃ yatsaundaryaṃ sūkticārutvaṃ tadāderyo lābho niṣpattistadabhisandhānādikayetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7431: ayamarthassatyo mithyā vetyādisaṃśayāśca vastutaḥ pravartante tatpravṛttirna syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7434: tatra yathā tadvivādā na pravartante tathetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7436: samyaṅ mithyātvāda vivādā eva na pravarteran dhūmādiliṅgānumitānumeyāntaravat /
GK16andhvc3u:7442: vaktricchā hi vācyāderarthasya bālapriyā kenacilliṅgena kasyacidarthasyānumitirniścayarūpaiva bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7445: nanu vyaṅgyatvenābhimatasyārthasya śabdena sambandhe sati tatra vyāpārassiddhyati,
GK16andhvc3u:7446: sa eva netyāśaṅkāyāmuktameva smārayati vṛttau 'vyaṅgyaścārthaṃ' ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7452: nanu vācyasya sākṣātsambandhaḥ vyaṅgyasya tu taddvāraka ityata āha--'sākṣādi'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7454: ata eva saṃyogasaṃyuktasamavāyādīnāṃ sannikarṣatvābhidhānaṃ saṅgacchata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7455: vyaṅgyasya vācyasāmarthyākṣiptatayā tena saha sambandhasya vācyadhaṭitatvamuktaṃ draḍhīkartuṃ pūrvoktaṃ smārayati--'vācye'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7477: vyaṅgyatvenābhimato 'rtho na śabdasya liṅgaliṅgibhāvena sambandhī śabdapratipādyatvādvācyavadityanumānamanena darśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:7486: upādhiśabdo 'tra vyāvartakaparyāya ityāśayena vyācaṣṭe locane vaktricchetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7488: anena vaktrāyamartho vivakṣita iti pratītau vivakṣā hyarthasya viśeṣeṇatvena bhāsate /
GK16andhvc3u:7489: tasmādityuktaṃ draḍhayituṃ pūrvoktameva smārayati eva vyaṅgye liṅgtayā śabdānāṃ vyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7491: pratiyamāne tasminnabhiprāyarūpe 'nabhiprāyarūpe ca vācakatvenaiva vyāpāraḥ samnbandhāntareṇa vā /
GK16andhvc3u:7494: na ca vyañjakatvaṃ liṅgatvarūpameva ālokādiṣvanyathā dṛṣṭatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:7495: tasmātpratipādyo viṣayaḥ śabdānāṃ na liṅgitvena sambandhī vācyavat /
GK16andhvc3u:7496: yo hi liṅgitvena teṣāṃ sambandhī yathā darśito viṣayaḥ sa na vācyatvena pratīyate,
GK16andhvc3u:7498: pratipādhasya ca viṣayasya liṅgitve tadviṣayāṇāṃ vipratipattīnāṃ laukikaireva kriyamāṇānāmabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7507: icchāyāṃ loko na vipratipadyate 'rthe tu vipratipattimāneva /
GK16andhvc3u:7508: nanu yadā vyaṅgyo 'rthaḥ pratipannastadā satyatvaniścayo 'syānumānādeva pramāṇāntarāt kriyata iti punarapyanumeva evāsau /
GK16andhvc3u:7529: pratipādyasya vyaṅgyasya śabdāpekṣayā liṅgitvābhāve 'pi saṃvādakapramāṇāntarāpekṣayā liṅgitvaṃ bhavatyeveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7534: yathā ca vācyaviṣaye pramāṇāntarānugamena samyaktvapratītau kvacitkriyamāṇāyāṃ tasya pramāṇāntaraviṣayatve styapi na śabdavyāpāraviṣayatāhānistadyvaṅgyasyāpi
GK16andhvc3u:7536: na caitāvatā vācyasya pratotirānumānikī kiṃ tu tadgatasya tato 'dhikasya satyatvasya tadvyaṅgye 'pi bhaviṣyati /
GK16andhvc3u:7554: ebhirvacanairvākyārthasya satyatvamevāptoktatvarūpānumānena niścetavyamiti labhyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7572: kāvyaviṣaye ca vyaṅgyapratītināṃ satyāsatyanirūpaṇasyāprayojakatvameveti tatra pramāṇāntaravyāpāraparīkṣopahāsāyaiva sampadyate /
GK16andhvc3u:7573: tasmālliṅgipratītireva sarvatra vyaṅgyapratītiriti na śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvc3u:7583: nāyaṃ sahṛdayaḥ kevalaṃ śuṣkatarkopakramakarkaśahṛdayaḥ pratītiṃ parāmarṣṭuṃ nālamityeṣa upahāsaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7584: nanvevaṃ tarhi mā bhūdyatra yatra vyañjakatā tatra tatrānumānatvam;
GK16andhvc3u:7585: yatra yatrānumānatvaṃ tatra tatra vyañjakatvamiti kathamapahnūyata ityāśaṅkyāha--yattvanumeyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:7587: nanvabhiprāyaviṣayaṃ yadvyañjakatvamanumānaikayogakṣemaṃ taccenna prayojakaṃ dhvanivyavahārasya tarhi kimarthaṃ bālapriyā teṣāṃ kāvyarūpāṇām
GK16andhvc3u:7606: vṛttau tadvyañjakatvaṃ dhvanivyavahārasyāprayojakamityevoktamaprayojakatve heturnokta ityato 'bhipretaṃ hetuṃ darśayannāha--tadityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7617: api tu vyañjakatvalakṣaṇaḥ śabdānāṃ vyāpāra autpattikaśabdārthasambandhavādināpyabhyupagantavya iti pradarśanārthamupanyastam /
GK16andhvc3u:7618: tadbhi vyañjakatvaṃ kadācilliṅgatvena kadācidrūpāntareṇa śabdānāṃ vācakānāmavācakānāṃ ca sarvavādibhirapratikṣepyamityayamasmābhiryatna ākhdhaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:7619: tadevaṃ guṇavṛttivācakatvādibhyaḥ śabdaprakārebhyo niyamenaiva tāvadvilakṣaṇaṃ vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:7622: yata eva hi kvacidanumānānenābhiprāyādau kvacitpratyakṣeṇa dīpālokādau kvacitkāraṇatvena
GK16andhvc3u:7624: vyañjakatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tata eva tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo vilakṣaṇamasya rūpaṃ nassidhyati tadāha--tadevamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:7625: nanu prasiddhasya kimarthaṃ rūpasaṃkocaḥ kriyate abhidhāvyāpāraguṇavṛttyādeḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7635: yata eva hi abhiprāyadiviṣayaṃ śabdasya vyañjakatvamanumānainānumityā /
GK16andhvc3u:7639: avivakṣitavācyagataṃ vyañjakatvaṃ guṇavṛtyā ca anugṛhyamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:7646: anenāyaṃ prayogaḥ pradarśitaḥ--vimataṃ vyañjakatvamanumānādiprakārebhyo vilakṣaṇaṃ teṣu vyāvartamāneṣvapi anuvartamānatayāvabhāsamānatvāt,
GK16andhvc3u:7647: yadyeṣu vyāvartamāneṣvapyanuvartamānatayāvabhāsate tattebhyo bhinnaṃ yathā kusumebhyaḥ sūtramiti /
GK16andhvc3u:7651: prasiddhasyābhidhāvyāpāragumavṛtyāde rūpasaṅkocaḥ kimarthaṃ kriyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7659: tadantāpātitve 'pi tasya haṭhādabhidhīyamāne tadviśeṣasya dhvaneryatprakāśanaṃ vipratipattinirāsāya sahṛdayavyutpattaye vā tatkriyamāṇamanatisandheyameva
GK16andhvc3u:7662: evaṃ hi sati sattāmātralakṣaṇe kṛte sakalasadvastulakṣaṇānāṃ paunaruktyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7665: na vayaṃ saṃjñāniveśanādi niṣedhāma iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7671: tripadārthasaṅkarī sattetyanenaiva dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ lakṣitatvācchrutismṛtyāyurvadadhanurvedaprabhṛtīnāṃ bālapriyā viśiṣṭaṃ rūpamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:7682: vastuni hi samucitā vimatirna nāmamātra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7703: yatra vyaṅgyānvaye vācya-cārutvaṃ syāt prakarṣavat // DhvK_3.34 //
GK16andhvc3u:7708: ata evādhunātra na kasyacidvimatiretasmātkṣaṇātprabhṛtīti pratipādayitum--āsīt ityuktam // 3.3 //
GK16andhvc3u:7709: evaṃ yāvaddhvanerātmīyaṃ rūpaṃ bhedopabhedasahitaṃ yacca vyañjakabhedamukhena rūpaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7711: viniveśayituṃ vyañjakavādasthānaṃ racitamiti dhvaniṃ prati yadvaktavyaṃ taduktameva /
GK16andhvc3u:7712: adhunā tu guṇaibhūto 'pyayaṃ vyaṅgyaḥ kavivācaḥ pavitrayatītyamunā dvāreṇa tasyaivātmatvaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7733: nanu kāvyasyātmā dhvanirityabhyupagamena kāvyātmabhūtadhvanisvarūpapratipādanamātravṛttatvāt kimarthaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyapratipādanaṃ kṛtaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:7744: cārutvaprakarṣahetutvena vyaṅgyānvayasya kārikāyāndarśitatvānna vyaṅgyasambandhamātraṃ vyaṅgyo 'rtho lalanālāvaṇyaprakhyo yaḥ pratipāditastasya prādhānye dhvanirityuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:7745: tasya tu guṇībhāvena vācyacārutvaprakarṣe guṇībhūtvayaṅgyo nāma kāvyaprabhedaḥ prakalpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:7746: tatra vastumātrasya vyaṅgyasya tiraskṛtavācyebhyaḥ prīyamānasya kadācidvācyarūpavākyārthāpekṣayā guṇībhāve sati guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatā /
GK16andhvc3u:7747: yathā-- lāvaṇyasindhuraparaiva hi keyamatra yatrotpalāni śaśinā saha samplavante /
GK16andhvc3u:7748: unmajjati dviradakumbhataṭī ca yatra yatrāpare kadalikāṇḍamṛṇāladaṇḍāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:7754: 'yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā' ityatrāntare vyaṅgyaṃ ca vastvāditrayaṃ tatra vastuno vyaṅgyasya ye bhedā uktāsteṣāṃ krameṇa guṇabhāvaṃ darśayati---tatreti
GK16andhvc3u:7763: tatra caiṣāṃ svārthasya sarvathānupapatterandhaśabdoktena nyāyena tiraskṛtavācyatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:7780: vastumātrasya vyaṅgyasyetyādivṛttyuktaṃ sarvaṃ krameṇa pradarśayiṣyannadau bhūmikāṃ racayati locane--abhilāṣetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7798: locanam sa ca pratīyamāno 'pyarthaviśeṣaḥ 'aparaiva hi keyaṃ' ityuktigarbhīkṛte vācyeṃ'śe
GK16andhvc3u:7805: niḥśvāsāndha ivādarśa ityatrāndhaśabdavyākhāyane ya ukto nyāyastenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7806: pratīyamāno 'pītyapiśabdena svataḥ prāptapradhānabhāvasya vaiparītyena guṇībāvāpattirviruddheti darśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:7809: aparaiva hīti keyamiti coktibhyāṃ sāmānyātmanākroḍīkṛta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7817: svasya vācyasya ya ātmā svarūpantasya yadunmajjanamuddhurakandharatayāvasthānaṃ tayā upalakṣitasya /
GK16andhvc3u:7818: tathā nimajjinaṃ vyaṅgyajātaṃ pūrvoktaṃ yena tasya /
GK16andhvc3u:7824: tathā sakalalokasārabhūtāśca ye kuvalayādayo bhāvāḥ padārthasteṣāṃ vargasya /
GK16andhvc3u:7825: atisumagaṃ yadekādhikaraṇaṃ nāyikārūpaṃ tatra yā viśrāntiḥ saṃśliṣyāvasthitistāyā labdhaṃ samuccarūpaṃ saṅghātarūpatvaṃ yena tasya bhāvastattā tayā hetunā /
GK16andhvc3u:7826: yā vismayavibhāvatāprāptistasyāḥ puraskāreṇa purassarīkāreṇeti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7831: tarhi vyaṅgyasya prādhānyamāpatitaṃ tasyaiva vibhāvatāprāptau prayojakatvādityata āha--vācyarūponmajjaneneti /
GK16andhvc3u:7836: yathohāhṛtam---'saṅketakālamanasam' locanam ata eveyati yadyapi vācyasya prādhānyaṃ ,
GK16andhvc3u:7837: tathāpi rasadhvanau tasyāpi guṇateti sarvasya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya prākare mantavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:7844: bālapriyā vyaṅgyasya kaṭākṣavadanādervācyakuvalayacandrādirūpatvena darśanaṃ hyabhilāṣādijanane nimittamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7853: yadi guṇībhūtavyaṅgyaprabhede vācyārthasyaiva prādhānyaṃ syāttdā dhvaniḥ kāvyasyātmeti tatra tatroddhoṣyamāṇamasaṅgataṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7854: śokasyāsya kvacitprabandhe 'nupalambhānmuktakasyaucityānusāreṇa varṇyaviśeṣanirvarṇanāvidheyeti darśayan pakṣāntaramāha--anye tvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7855: lāvaṇyadravasundarīkṛtanadīviṣayetyanena lāvaṇyasindhurityetadvivṛtaṃ lāvaṇyamayī lāvaṇyasundarīkṛtā vā sindhuriti vigrahaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7856: sindhuśabdo na tiraskṛtavācyo vyañjaka iti ca bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7858: asmin pakṣe kuvalayādīnāmatisubhagaikādhikaraṇasamāveśakṛtasaubhāgyalābho na sāmañjasyena bhavatītyasvarasamanya ityanena sūcayan pakṣāntaramāha--yadi vetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7861: na ca prāguktadoṣastaruṇyā eva varṇanīyatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7867: vaktavyatayā kathamatiraskṛtavācyatvamiti śaṅkāṃ parijihīrṣuḥ pratyuta tatpadasya
GK16andhvc3u:7873: locanam etacca prathamoddyota eva nirūpitam anurāgaśabdasya cābhilāṣe taduparaktatvalakṣaṇayā lāvaṇyaśabdavatpravṛttirityabhiprāyeṇātiraskṛtavācyatvamuktam
GK16andhvc3u:7879: guṇībhāve vā kathamacārutvaṃ na syādityāśaṅkya pratyuta sundaratā bhavatīti prasiddhadṛṣṭāntamukhena darśayati---tatra ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:7881: evaṃ vastuno rasādeśca guṇībhāvaṃ pradarśyālaṅkārātmano 'pi tṛtīyasya vyaṅgyaprakārasya taṃ darśayati---vyaṅgyālaṅkārasyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:7883: evaṃ prakāratrayasyāpi guṇabhāvaṃ pradarśya bahutaralakṣyavyāpakatāsyeti darśayitumāha---tatheti /
GK16andhvc3u:7887: tatpadārthastadvastu taduparaktaṃ yena tattvaṃ vastūparañjakatvaṃ tena nimittena lakṣaṇayetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7893: rasavadalaṅkāraviṣayaḥ prākdarśita iti ca vṛttau pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7898: nanu pradhānasyāpi sato rasādeḥ kavivivakṣāvaśādguṇībhāvaḥ kinna syādityata āha--guṇībhāve veti /
GK16andhvc3u:7902: pratyuta bhṛtyotkarṣaviśeṣo 'pi rājotkarṣātiśayāyaiva kalpiṣyata iti cārutvameva puṣṇātīti bhāvaḥ // 3.4 //
GK16andhvc3u:7906: sukhāvahā ityanena teṣu prakāro 'yameva yojya tathā---
GK16andhvc3u:7908: ye ca teṣu prakāro 'yam eva yojyāḥ sumedhasā // DhvK_3.35 //
GK16andhvc3u:7910: ye ca teṣu prakāro 'yameva yojyaḥ sumedhasā // 35 //
GK16andhvc3u:7911: ye caite 'parimitasvarūpā api prakāśamānāstathāvidhārtharamaṇīyāḥ santo vivekināṃ sukhāvahāḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7912: kāvyabandhāsteṣu sarveṣvevāyaṃ prakāro guṇībhūtavyaṅgyo nāma yojanīyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7914: lacchī duhidā jāmāuo harī taṃsa dhariṇiā gaṅgā /
GK16andhvc3u:7915: locanam prasannāni prasādaguṇayogādgabhīrāṇi ca vyaṅgyārthakṣepakatvātpadāni yeṣu /
GK16andhvc3u:7919: yastvetaṃ prakāraṃ tatra yojayituṃ na śaktaḥ sa paramalīkasahṛdayabhāvanāmukulitalocanoktyopahasanīyaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7922: tathā gṛhiṇī gaṅgā yasyāḥ samabhilaṣaṇīye sarvasminvastunyapahata upāyabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7926: mukhyeṃ phalamiti trailokyasārabhūtatā bālapriyā ityatra tatprakārasya cārutvehetutvaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7929: sahṛdayatvapratiṣṭālābhaścaitatprakārayojanakauśalaśālitānibandhana eveti tadarthibhistadviṣaye mahāprayatna ādheya iti darśayituṃ sumedhasetyuktamityāha--yastvetamityādi
GK16andhvc3u:7931: ayaṃ na sahṛdayaḥ kintvalīkasahṛdayabhāvanayā asatyasya sahṛdayatvastha bhāvanayā rasāsvādavaivaśyaṃ manasaḥ prakaṭayituṃ mukulitalocana āste,
GK16andhvc3u:7947: yasyāṃ snānādyadārādhanāditaśca yā labhyate sā gaṅgāsya gṛhiṇyeva,
GK16andhvc3u:7950: labdhāyā āmiamiaṅkā a suā aho kuḍumbaṃ mahoahiṇo //
GK16andhvc3u:7952: prāyeṇaiva parāṃ chāyāṃ bibhral lakṣye nirīkṣyate // DhvK_3.36 //
GK16andhvc3u:7955: vācyālaṅkāravargo 'yaṃ vyaṅgyāṃśasyālaṅkārasya vastumātrasya vā yathoyogamanugame sati cchāyātiśayaṃ vibhrallakṣaṇakārairekadeśena darśitaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:7956: sa tu tathārūpaḥ prāyeṇa sarva eva parīkṣyamāṇo lakṣye nirīkṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:7958: locanam pratīyamānā satī aho kuṭumbaṃ mahodadherityahośabdācca guṇībhāvamanubhavati // 3.5 //
GK16andhvc3u:7959: evaṃ niralaṅkāreṣūttānatāyāṃ tucchatayaiva bhāsamānamamunāntaḥsāreṇa kāvyaṃ pavitrīkṛtamityuktvālaṅkārasyāpyanenaiva ramyataratvamiti darśayati--vācyeti
GK16andhvc3u:7963: bālapriyā lakṣmyāssampadrūpāyā upabhogābhāve cālabdhakalpatvāccandrodayakāle vāruṇyupabhogo hi mukhyaṃ phalaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:7964: sa candrassā vāruṇī cāsya putrabhāvameva bhajata iti mahodadhireva trailokyasāra itīyānartho 'tra dhvananavyāpārādavagamyate /
GK16andhvc3u:7965: sa cāvagatassannaho kuṭumbamiti śabdaspṛṣṭatayā guṇībhāvamavalambate yataḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7966: tadvyaṅgyārthajātopaskṛta eva vācyārtho vismayavibhāvatāṃ prāpnoti camatkārātiśayañca vidhatta iti // 3.4//
GK16andhvc3u:7969: lakṣmīrityādyuktodāharaṇe na kaścidalaṅgāraḥ sphuṭo 'vagamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7983: vyaṅgyāṃśānugama ityatra vyaṅgyasya vācyaṃ pratyaṃśatvaṃ guṇībhūtatvamevetyāha--aṃśatvaṃ guṇamātratvamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:7985: nāmagrahaṇe nāmaikadeśagrahaṇamiti nyāyenaikadeśaśabda ekadeśavivartirūpakapara iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7987: kṛtaiva ca sā mahākavibhiḥ kāmapi kāvyaccharvipuṣyati,
GK16andhvc3u:7988: kathaṃ hyatiśayayogitā svaviṣayaucityena kriyamāṇā satī kāvye locanam tadayamarthaḥ--ekadeśavivartirūpake---
GK16andhvc3u:7989: rājasaṃsairavījyanta śaradaiva saronṛpāḥ ityatra haṃsānāṃ yaccāmaratvaṃ pratīyamānaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7990: tannṛpā iti vācye 'rthe vācye 'rthe guṇatāṃ prāptamalaṅkārakārairyāvadeva darśitaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7993: vyaṅgyaṃ yadalaṅkārāntaraṃ vastvantaraṃ ca saṃspṛśanti ye svātmanaḥ saṃskārāyāśliṣyantīti te tathā /
GK16andhvc3u:7996: kāvyaśobhāṃ puṣyatīti yaduktaṃ tatra hetumāha---kathaṃ hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:7998: atiśayayogitā kathaṃ notkarṣamāvahet kāvye nāstyevāsau prakāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7999: svaviṣaye yadaucityaṃ tena ceddhṛdayasthitena tāmatiśayoktiṃ kaviḥ karoti /
GK16andhvc3u:8000: yathā bhaṭṭendurājasya-- yadviśramya vilokiteṣu bahuśo niḥsthemanī locane yadgātrāṇi daridrati pratidinaṃ lūnābjinīnālavat /
GK16andhvc3u:8030: karoti cettadā nāstyevāsau prakāra iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8032: bhāmahenāpyatiśayoktilakṣaṇe yaduktam--- locanam dūrvākāṇḍaviḍambakaśca nibiḍo yatpāṇḍimā gaṇḍayoḥ kṛṇṇe yūni sayauvanāsu vanitāsveṣaiva veṣasthitiḥ
GK16andhvc3u:8033: atra hi bhagavato manmathavapuṣaḥ saubhāgyaviṣayaḥ sambhāvyata evāyamatiśaya iti tatkāvye lokottaraiva śobhollasati /
GK16andhvc3u:8038: nanvatiśayoktiḥ sarvālaṅkāreṣu vyaṅgyatayāntalīṃnaivāsta iti yaduktaṃ tatkatham?
GK16andhvc3u:8040: na ca sāmānyaṃ śabdādviśeṣapratīteḥ pṛthagbhūtatayā paścāttanatvena cakāstīti kathamasya vyaṅgyatvamityāśaṅkyāha--bhāmaheneti /
GK16andhvc3u:8065: atrātimahato 'pyavakāśātmakākāśasyālpatvena nirmāṇoktyā tato 'pyatiśayitaṃ mahatvaṃ stanayoḥ pratīyata iti atiśayoktirvyaṅgyā,
GK16andhvc3u:8066: parantviyaṃ stanayostathāvidhamahatvasyāsambhāvyamānatvenānaucityavatīti kāvyotkarṣaṃ sampādayituṃ na kṣamata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8077: 'saiṣā' yeyamuktātiśayoktiḥ saiveti tattadalaṅkārāṇāṃ viśeṣatvaṃ tatsāmānyarūpatvañcātiśayokteriti tadarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8078: bhavatvevaṃ tāvatā prakṛte kimāyātamityata āha--na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8080: vyaṅgyaṃ hi vācyāta pṛthaktayā tatpratītyuttaraṃ śabdātpratīyate samānyantvanyathā gaurityādiśabdena saiṣā sarvaiva vakroktiranayārtho vibhāvyate
GK16andhvc3u:8083: tatrātiśayoktiryamalaṅkāramadhitiṣṭhati kavipratibhāvaśāttasya cārutvātiśayayogo 'nyasya locanam bhāmahenāpi yaduktaṃ tatrāyamevārtho 'vagantavya iti dūreṇa sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8085: yātiśayoktirlakṣitā saiva sarvā vakroktiralaṅkāra prakāraḥ sarvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8087: śabdasya hi vakratā abhidheyasya ca vakratā lokottīrṇena rūpeṇāvasthānamityayamevāsāvalaṅkārasyālaṅkārabhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:8094: tatpṛthaktayā bhāsamānatvaṃ vyāpakaṃ vyāpakaṃ nivartamānaṃ svavyāpyaṃ vyaṅgyatvamapi
GK16andhvc3u:8132: tasyāścālaṅkārāntarasaṃkīrṇatvaṃ locanam viśeṣeṇa ca bhāvyate rasamayīkriyate,
GK16andhvc3u:8138: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ---yadi tāvadatiśayokteḥ sarvālaṅkāreṣu sāmānyarūpatā sā tarhi tādātmyaparyavasāyinīti tadyvatirikto naivālaṅkāro dṛśyata iti kavipratibhānaṃ na tatrāpekṣaṇīyaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:8163: yathā khaṇḍamuṇḍādiviśeṣeṣu gotvāderanuvṛttatayā sāmānyarūpatvantathā upamādiviśeṣeṣvatiśayokteranuvṛttatayā sāmānyātmakatvātsarvā vakroktissaivetyabhedavyapadeśo mukhyo vā,
GK16andhvc3u:8165: kāvyajīvitatvaṃ vā vivakṣitamiti vikalpaṃ manasi kṛtyādyandūṣayati--yadi tāvadityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8167: tathāca yathā khaṇḍamuṇḍādayo gotvādyātmakāstathā sarve 'laṅkārā atiśayoktyātmāna eva bhaveyuriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8172: yathā khaṇḍādīnāṃ svata eva gotvādyākāraśālitvaṃ nānyāpekṣaṃ tathā upamāderatiśayayogitvamapīti
GK16andhvc3u:8175: vyaṅgyatvamapi locanam alaṅkāramātraṃ ca na kiñciddṛśyeta /
GK16andhvc3u:8178: aucityavatī jīvitamiti cet--aucityanibandhanaṃ rasabhāvādi muktvā nānyatkiñcidastīti tadevāntaryāmi mukhyaṃ jīvitamityabhyupagantavyaṃ na tu sā /
GK16andhvc3u:8179: etena yadāhuḥ kecit--aucityaghaṭitasundaraśabdārthamaye kāvye kimanyena dhvaninātmabhūteneti te svavacanameva dhvanisadbhāvabhyupagamasākṣibhūtaṃ manyamānāḥ pratyuktāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8191: kāvyajīvitatvenetthaṃ vivakṣitā kāvyajīvitatvapradarśanāya sarvā vakroktisyaiṣetyuktā tathāpītyaṅgīkṛtya vādasūcakam /
GK16andhvc3u:8213: sarvā vakroktissaiṣeti nirdeśo mukhaṃ candra ityādivadabhedopacāra evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8220: tasyā ityasya vācyatvenetyanenāpi sambandha iti vyācaṣṭe--sāpītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8232: yeṣu cālaṅkāreṣu sādṛśyamukhena tattvapratilambhaḥ yathā rupakopamātulyayogatānidarśanādiṣu
GK16andhvc3u:8233: teṣu gamyamānadharmamukhenaiva yatsādṛśyaṃ tadeva śobhātiśayaśāli bhavatīti te sarve
GK16andhvc3u:8236: teṣu prakāreṣu madhye ya ādyaḥ prakārastasmin /
GK16andhvc3u:8237: nanvatiśayoktireva cedevambhūtā tatkimapekṣayā prathamaṃ tāvaditi kramaḥ sūcita ityāśaṅkyāha--ayaṃ cati /
GK16andhvc3u:8240: evamalaṅkāreṣu tāvadvyaṅgyasparśo 'stītyuktyā tatra kiṃ vyaṅgyatvena bhātīti /
GK16andhvc3u:8243: nidarśanāyāstu 'kriyayaiva tadarthasya bālapriyā vyaṅgyatayā sthātumārabdhāyā api aparaiveti śabdena spṛṣṭatvādvācyatvamāpatitamiti dvayorvācyatvamityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:8256: kramo hi satsveva bahuṣu kramikeṣu ghaṭeta,
GK16andhvc3u:8271: rūpakādau sādṛśyaṃ vyaṅgyamupamā tu tatsvarūpaiveti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8285: tathā hi 'prabhāmahatyā śikhayeva dīpaḥ' ityādau sphuṭaiva dīpakacchāyā lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8292: upamāgarbhatva ityapamāśabdena sarva eva tadviśeṣā rūpakādayaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:8295: 'tayā sa pūtaśca vibhūṣitaśca' ityetena dīpasthānīyena dīpanāddīpakamatrānupraviṣṭaṃ pratīyamānatayā,
GK16andhvc3u:8318: anena dīpa iveti dīpayatīti vā dīpakaśabdavyutpattirdarśitā /
GK16andhvc3u:8323: tadevaṃ vyaṅgyāṃśasaṃsparśe saṃti cārutvātiśayayogino rūpakādayo 'laṅkārāḥ sarva eva guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya mārgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8324: guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvaṃ ca teṣāṃ tathājātīyānāṃ sarveṣāmevoktānuktānāṃ sāmānyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8325: tallakṣaṇe sarva evaite locanam hyetadupamāyāṃ spaṣṭenābhidhāprakāreṇaiva /
GK16andhvc3u:8328: sulakṣitā iti yatkilaiṣāṃ tadvinirmuktaṃ rūpaṃ na tatkāvye 'bhyarthanīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8338: aprastutapraśaṃsā sarvāṇi jñāpakāni yathā padasaṃjñāyāmantavacanam--'anyatra saṃjñāvidhau pratyayagrahaṇe tadantavidhirna' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:8339: ākṣepaścobhayatra vibhāṣāsu vikalpātmakaviśeṣābhidhitsayā iṣṭasyāpi vidheḥ pūrvaṃ niṣedhanātpratiṣedhena bālapriyā atra hetundarśayannāha---sādhāraṇetyādi
GK16andhvc3u:8349: mālopamātiriktopāttadharmakopamāsthale tu dharmasyobhayatra sambandhaḥ spaṣṭamabhidhīyata iti na dīpakasya vyaṅgyatayānupraveśa iti mālopametyuktam
GK16andhvc3u:8352: anye copamādayo 'laṅkārāstatkathaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyalakṣaṇe kṛte teṣāṃ lakṣitatvasiddhirityato 'bhiprāyamudbhedayannāha--yatkiletyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8371: ekaikasya svarūpaviśeṣakathanena tu sāmānyalakṣaṇarahitena pratipādapāṭheneva śabdā na śakyante tattvato nirjñātum, ānantyāt /
GK16andhvc3u:8377: guṇībhūtavyaṅgyataivātrālaṅkāratāyāṃ marmabhūtā lakṣitāḥ tān suṣṭu lakṣayati /
GK16andhvc3u:8378: yayā supūrṇa kṛtvā lakṣitāḥ saṅgṛhītā bhavanti,
GK16andhvc3u:8384: rasasya svātmanaiva viśrāntidhāmna ānandātmakatvamiti nānavasthā kāciditi tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8391: jalabāhulyapradarśanāya kuṇḍikāṃ viṣayīkṛtya samudra iti nirdeśādbhede abhedarūpātiśayoktiriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8397: tallakṣaṇe sarva evaite sulakṣitā bhavantītyetasya vivaraṇam--guṇībhūtetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8401: uktena sāmānyalakṣaṇena vinā tattadviśeṣalakṣaṇasyaiva kathana ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8402: kvacadgranthe tūpamā hītyādikassaṅgṛhītā bhavantītyanto grantho na dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8403: nanu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvemeva sarveṣāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tallakṣaṇena teṣāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:8410: nanvalaṅkāracārutvaprayojakaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya cārutvaṃ vaktavyantadapyanyena prayuktantadapyanyenetyanavasthāprasaṅga ityata āha--vyaṅgyasyetyādi
GK16andhvc3u:8411: yaduktantallakṣaṇe sarva ete sulakṣitā iti tadākṣipya tatsamādhānaparatayottaragranthamavatārayati--nanvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8413: dīpakādau kvacideva cakāstyākṣepādau tu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya ca prakārāntareṇāpi vyaṅgyārthānugamalakṣaṇena viṣayatvamastyeva /
GK16andhvc3u:8414: tadayaṃ dhvaniniṣyandarūpo dvitīyo 'pi mahākaviviṣayo 'tiramaṇīyo lakṣaṇīyaḥ sahṛdayaiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8415: sarvathā nāstyeva sahṛdayahṛdayahāriṇaḥ kāvyasya sa locanam lakṣitena sarveṣāṃ saṃgrahaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8416: maivam; vastumātraṃ vā raso vā vyaṅgyaṃ sadguṇībhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati tadevāha-guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:8418: yadi vetthamavataraṇikā--nanu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyenālaṅkārā yadi lakṣitāstarhi lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ kimiti noktamityāśaṅkyāha--guṇībhūteti /
GK16andhvc3u:8420: kena lakṣaṇīyatvaṃ dhvanivyatirikto yaḥ prakāro vyaṅgyatvenārthānugamo nāma tadeva lakṣaṇaṃ tenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8421: vyaṅgye lakṣite tadguṇībhāve ca nirūpite kimanyadasya lakṣakriyatāmiti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8429: yatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasthale 'laṅkāro na cakāsti tatreti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8432: sa lakṣaṇamasādhāraṇadharmaḥ svarūpaṃ vā yasya prakārāntarasya teneti tadarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8448: nanvetallakṣaṇanna prāguktamataḥ kathaṃ siddhavadabhidhānamityata āha--vyaṅgya ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8450: yatra vyaṅgyānvaya ityādinā guṇībhāvaśca nirūpita iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8460: locanam yatprāguktaṃ sakalasatkavikāvyopaniṣadbhūtamiti tanna pratāraṇamātramarthavādarūpaṃ mantavyamiti darśayitum--tadidamiti // 3.6 //
GK16andhvc3u:8472: kārikāyāṃ mukhyetyasya bhūṣetyanena sambandha iti darśayati--mukhyā bhūṣeti /
GK16andhvc3u:8479: gopanaiva sāro yasya tattathāvidhaṃ saundaryameva prāṇā yasyāstasyā bhāvastattā,
GK16andhvc3u:8486: kintu yoṣitāṃ yauvanārambhasambhāvinī kāpi hṛdayasya daśetyāha--antarityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8487: antarmadanodbhedajaṃ tadghṛdayasaundaryantadeva rūpaṃ yasyāssā madanodbhedarūpamanovikārātmiketi yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:8493: prakārāntareṇāpi tadyathā---- visrambhotthā manmathājñāvidhāne ye mugdhākṣyāḥ ke 'pi līlāviśeṣāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8494: akṣuṇṇāste cetasā kevalena sthitvaikānte santataṃ bhāvanīyāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:8496: tathā pratīyamānasya priyatamābhilāṣānunāyanamānaprabhṛteḥ cāyā kāntiḥ yayā /
GK16andhvc3u:8497: śṛṅgārarasataraṅgiṇī hi lajjāvaruddhā nirbharatayā tāstān vilāsānnetragātravikāraparamparārūpān prasūta iti gopanāsārasaundaryalajjāvijṛmbhitametaditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8499: manmathācāryeṇa tribhuvanavandyamānaśāsanena ata eva lajjāsādhvasadhvaṃsinā dattā
GK16andhvc3u:8509: rājā jñāto 'pyanatilaṅghanīyā hyācāryājñā “gurau ruṣṭe na kaścane“tyādivacanādata ācāryatvarūpaṇam /
GK16andhvc3u:8518: akṛtakāḥ akṛtrimāḥ tathā sambhogasya yā paribhāvanā āsvādaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:8528: ityatra ke 'pītyanena padena vācyamaspaṣṭamabhidadhatā pratīyamānaṃ vastvakliṣṭamanantamarpayatā kā chāyā nopapāditā /
GK16andhvc3u:8530: sā vyaṅgyasya guṇī-bhāve prakāram imam āśritā // DhvK_3.38 //
GK16andhvc3u:8533: yā caiṣā kākvā kvacidarthāntarapratītirdṛśyate sā vyaṅgyasyārthasya guṇībhāve sati guṇībhūtavyaṅgyalakṣaṇaṃ kāvyaprabhedamāśrayate /
GK16andhvc3u:8538: tatra hi sākāṅkṣanirākāṅkṣādikrameṇa paṭhyamāno 'sau śabdaḥ prakṛtārthātiriktamapi vāñchatīti laulyamasyābhidhīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8539: yadi vār iṣadarthe kuśabdastasya bālapriyā arhā ityasyaiva vivaraṇam--ucitā iti /
GK16andhvc3u:8545: uktaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ vācyārthopaskārakaṃ satkāvyasya cārutvaṃ sampādayatītyarthaḥ // 3.7 //
GK16andhvc3u:8548: nanu laulyamicchā tatkathamatra ghaṭata ityata āha--tatra hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8551: yathoktaṃ kāvyānuśāsane--“sā ca kākurdvidhā sākāṅkṣā nirākāṅkṣā ca,
GK16andhvc3u:8555: kintu nyūnābhyadhikaḥ pramāṇabalena nirṇayayogyastadvākyaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ tadviparītaṃ nirākāṅkṣam. vaktṛgāta hyākāṅkṣā vākye upacaryate /
GK16andhvc3u:8558: viṣayo 'pi trividhaḥ arthāntaraṃ tadarśagata eva viśeṣastadarthābhāvo ve“tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8574: tena hṛdayasthavastupratīterīṣadbhūmiḥ kākuḥ tayā yār'thāntaragatiḥ sa kāvyaviśeṣa imaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyaprakāramāśritaḥ. atra heturvyeṅgyasya tatra guṇībhāva eva bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:8578: anye tvāhuḥ---vyaṅgyasya guṇībhāve 'yaṃ prakāraḥ anyathā tu tatrāpi dhvanitvameveti /
GK16andhvc3u:8579: taccāsat; kākuprayoge sarvatra śabdaspṛṣṭatvena vyaṅgyasyonmīlitasyāpi guṇībhāvāt kākurhi śabdasyaivala kaściddharmastena spṛṣṭaṃ 'gaupyaivaṃ gaditaḥ saleśaṃ' iti,
GK16andhvc3u:8581: ata eva 'bhama dhammia' ityādau kākuyojane guṇībhūtavyaṅgyataiva vyaktoktatvena tadābhimānāllokasya /
GK16andhvc3u:8585: ghārtarāṣṭrā iti ca sākāṅkṣadīptagadgadatārapraśamanoddīpanacitritā bālapriyā kaścidupāya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8589: arthāntaragatirityanenārthāntarāvagamakaḥ kāvyaviśeṣo vivakṣita iti vakṣyati tadāśayena setyetadvyācaṣṭe--sa kāvyaviśeṣa iti /
GK16andhvc3u:8590: guṇībhāva iti saptamī nimitte guṇībhāvaddhetorityartha ityāha--tatretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8592: arthāntaragātirityasya arthāntarasya pratītiriti yathāśrutārthakatve arthāntarapratītereva guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvaṃ vaktavyaṃ bhavati,
GK16andhvc3u:8596: anye tu kākusthale yatra tadvyaṅgyasya prādhānyantatra dhvanitvaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:8597: yatra guṇībhāvastatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvaṃ tadetadvyaṅgyasya guṇībhāva ityanena darśitamiti vyācakṣate;
GK16andhvc3u:8617: sākāṅkṣā dīptā gadgadena tārāpraśamanoddīpanābhyāṃ citritā viśeṣavatī cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8619: āma asaio orama paivvae ṇa tueṃ maliṇiaṃ sīlam /
GK16andhvc3u:8620: kiṃ uṇa jaṇassa jāa vva cāndilaṃ taṃ ṇa kāmemo //
GK16andhvc3u:8621: śabdaśaktireva hi svābhidheyasāmarthyākṣiptakākusahāyā satyarthaviśeṣapratipattiheturna kākumātram. viṣayāntare svecchākṛtātkākumātrāttathāvidhārthapratipattyasambhavāt
GK16andhvc3u:8622: sa cārthaḥ kākuviśeṣasahāyaśabdavyāpāropārūḍho 'pyarthasāmarthyalabhya iti vyaṅgyarūpa eva /
GK16andhvc3u:8624: vyaṅgyamarthaṃ spṛśantī tenaivopakṛtā satīkrodhānubhāvarūpatāṃ vyaṅgyopaskṛtasya vācyasyaivādhatte /
GK16andhvc3u:8626: āma asatyaḥ uparama pativrate na tyā malinitaṃ śīlam /
GK16andhvc3u:8627: kiṃ punarjanasya jāyeva nāpitaṃ taṃ na kāmayāmahe //
GK16andhvc3u:8634: candilaṃ nāpitamiti pāmaraprakṛtiṃ na kāmayāmahe iti nirākāṅkṣagadgadopahāsagarbhā /
GK16andhvc3u:8635: eṣā hi kayācinnāpi tānuraktayā kulavadhvā dṛṣṭāvinayāyā upahāsyamānāyāḥ pratyupahāsāveśagarbhoktiḥ kākupradhānaiveti /
GK16andhvc3u:8637: bālapriyā dīptatārāvalaṅkārāntargatau praśamanoddīpane tvaṅgāntargate iti vivekaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8639: mayi jīvati dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ svasthā bhavantīti vācyārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8659: pativrata iti na malinitamityatra ca kākvā tattadabhāvo vyaṅgya ityabhiprāyeṇāha--pativrata ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8664: anugama ityasya tadviśiṣṭavācyapratītistadā guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatayā tathāvidhārthadyotinaḥ kāvyasya vyapadeśaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8666: prabhedasyāsya viṣayo yaś ca yuktyā pratīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8667: vidhātavyā sahṛdayair na tatra dhvani-yojanā // DhvK_3.38 //
GK16andhvc3u:8670: saṅkīrṇo hi kaściddhvanerguṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya ca lakṣye dṛśyate mārgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8673: vācakatve 'nugamo guṇatvaṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvasya vyaṅgyaviśiṣṭavācyapratītyā tatraiva kāvyasya prakāśakatvaṃ kalpyate;
GK16andhvc3u:8674: tena na tathā vyapadeśa iti kākuyojanāyāṃ sarvatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyataiva /
GK16andhvc3u:8675: ata eva 'mathnāmi kauravaśataṃ samare na kopāt' ityādau viparītalakṣaṇaṃ ya āhuste na samyakyarāmamṛśuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8679: 'darśe yajeta' ityatra tu tathāvidhakākvādyupāyāntarābhāvadbhavatu viparītalakṣaṇā ityalamavāntareṇa bahunā // 3.8 //
GK16andhvc3u:8690: pratijñātakauravaśatavadhasya kruddhasya bhīmasenasya vacanamidamata eva na mathnāmītyādau viparītalakṣaṇeti kecittadāha--viparītetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8695: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ--na mathnāmītyādirūpasya mathanādiniṣedhasyādau pratītiḥ paścāttu mathnāmyevetyādirūpasya tanniṣedhaniṣedhasya pratītiritina,
GK16andhvc3u:8696: kintūccāraṇakāla eva kākubalānmathanādiniṣedhasya niṣeṣapratiyogitvenaiva na mathnāmi netyākārikā pratītirato mathanādiniṣedhasya vācyasya niṣedho vyaṅgya eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:8698: na dṛśyate candro 'treti vyutpattyā darśaśabdo 'māvāsyāyāṃ prayujyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8702: pramukha evānyatarāvadhāraṇaniyamāsambhavo yatra yuktiparāmarśaṃ tatra yasya yuktisahāyatā tatra tena vyapadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8704: yathā--- patyuḥ śiraścandrakalāmanena spṛśeti sakhyā parihāsapūrvam /
GK16andhvc3u:8705: sā rañjayitvā caraṇau kṛtāśīrmākhyena tāṃ nirvacanaṃ jaghāna //
GK16andhvc3u:8708: alaktakoparaktasya hi candramasaḥ parabhāgalābho 'navaratapādapatanaprasādanairvinā na patyurjhaṭiti yatheṣṭānuvartinyā bhāvyamiti copadeśaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:8709: śirodhṛtā yā candrakalā tāmapi paribhaveti sapatnīlokāpajaya uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8719: yadā tu vyaṅgyādeva nyakkṛtavācyāttadā dhvanitvamiti cārutvapratītirūpakāryabalādeva tadanyatarāvadhāraṇasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8729: 'nirvacanam' ityadivṛttigranthena darśataṃ vyaṅgyaṃ tasya guṇībhāvaṃ ca pradarśayati--anenetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8740: yathā ca--- prāyacchatoccaiḥ kusumāni māninī vipakṣagotraṃ dayitena lambhitā /
GK16andhvc3u:8741: na kiñcidūce caraṇena kevalaṃ lileśa bāṣpākulalocanā bhuvam //
GK16andhvc3u:8742: ityatra 'nirvacanaṃ jaghāna' 'na kiñjidūce' iti pratiṣedhamukhena vyaṅgyasyārthasyoktyā kiñcidviṣayīkṛtatvādguṇībhāva eva śobhate /
GK16andhvc3u:8743: yadā vakroktiṃ vinā vyaṅgyo 'rthastātparyeṇa pratīyate tadā tasya prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8754: evaṃvidheṣu śṛṅgārāvasareṣutāmevāyaṃ smaratīti mānanapradarśanamevātra na yuktamiti sātiśayamanyusaṃbhāro vyaṅgyo vacananiṣedhasyaiva vācyasya saṃskāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8770: 'na kiñcidūca' ityasya prayojanaṃ darśayan vyaṅgyamāha--evaṃ vidheṣvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8786: yathā ca--- durārādhā rādhā subhaga yadanenāpi bhṛjata- stavaitatprāṇeśājadhanavasanenāśru patitam /
GK16andhvc3u:8792: he subhaga / yat patitametadaśru anena prāṇeśājadhanavasanenāpi mṛjatastava rādhā durārādhā strīcetaḥ kaṭhoraṃ tadupacārairalaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:8806: mṛjata iti vartamānārthakapratyayena mārjanasyāvirāmatvokyā vyaṅgyamāha--anena hi pratyutetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8811: kaṭhoraṃ strīcetastadalamupacārairvirama he kriyātkalyāmaṃ vo hariranunayaṣvevamuditaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:8812: locanam yanmāṃ vismṛtya tāmeva kupitāṃ manyase /
GK16andhvc3u:8816: yadi tūcyate iyatāpyādareṇa kimiti kopaṃ na muñcasi,
GK16andhvc3u:8820: ātmani caitatsukumārahṛdayā yoṣita iti na kiṃñcidvajrasārādhikamāsāṃ hṛdayaṃ yadevaṃvidhavṛttāntasākṣātkāre 'pi sahasradhā na dalati /
GK16andhvc3u:8823: anunayeṣviti bahuvacanenavāraṃ vāramasya bahuvallabhasyeyameva sthitiriti saubhāgyātiśaya uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8826: yastu triṣvapi ślokeṣu pratīyamānasyaiva rasāṅgatvaṃ vyācaṣṭe sma /
GK16andhvc3u:8828: evaṃ hi vyaṅgyasya yā guṇībhūtatā prakṛtā saiva samūlaṃ truṭyet /
GK16andhvc3u:8829: rasādivyatiriktasya hi vyaṅgyasya rasāṅgabhāvayogitvameva bālapriyā patitamiti bhūtanirdeśena vyaṅgyamāha--gata ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8838: evaṃ bodhanīyaṃ prati vyaṅgyamuktvā rādhagataṃ vyaṅgyamāha--ātmanītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8845: uktasya vyaṅgyajātasya vācyaṃ prati tasya rasaṃ prati cāṅgabhāvamāha--evamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8850: vyākhyāturasyāyamāśayaḥ- yasya hi mukhyaṃ prādhānaṃ taṃ pratyevaṃ guṇībhāvo 'nyāyyaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:8851: rasasyaiva ca tatprādhānyamiti nedaṃ vyākhyānaṃ sādhīyaityupahāsoktyā darśayati--sa devamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8852: yathā kaścinnirdhanatayā devaṃ vikrīya dhanaṃ sampādya tadyātrotsavaṃ kartumārabhate,
GK16andhvc3u:8853: tathā guṇībhūtavyaṅgyopapādanāya pravṛttastadvirodhinaṃ kañcitprakāramāśrita iti mahattaramasya kauśalamityupahāsaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8860: evaṃ sthite ca 'nyakkāro hyayameva' ityādiślokanirdiṣṭānāṃ padānāṃ vyaṅgyaviśiṣṭavācyapratipādane 'pyetadvākyārthībhūtarasāpekṣayā vyañjakatvamuktam
GK16andhvc3u:8863: teṣu hi vyaṅgyaviśiṣṭatvaṃ vācyasya pratīyate na tu vyaṅgyarūpapariṇatatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:8866: na ca kevalaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyānyeva padānyalakṣyakramavyaṅgyadhvanervyañjakāni yāvadarthāntarasaṃkramitavācyāni dhvaniprabhedarūpāṇyapi /
GK16andhvc3u:8868: yatra tu vākye rasāditātparye nāsti guṇībhūtavyaṅgyaiḥ padairudbhāsite 'pi tatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyataiva samudāyadharmaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8870: ramante ca saha strībhiḥ kuśalāḥ khalu mānavāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:8871: locanam prādhānyaṃ nānyatkiñcidityalaṃ pūrvavaṃśyaiḥ saha vivādena /
GK16andhvc3u:8875: eṣa ca ślokaḥ pūrvameva vyākhyāta iti na punarlikhyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8879: vyaṅgyaṃ tvasambhāvyatvaviparītakāritvādi bālapriyā ato vācyaṃ pratyeva guṇībhāvo vaktavya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8890: rājasevādivyavahāropalakṣitasya viṣopabhogatulyasya sarvasyāpi laukikavyavahārasya viṣayavairasyāpādakatayā śāntarasavyañjakatvāditi śaṅkāmanūdya pariharati--yadyapītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8895: tato mānavāḥ kuśalāḥ salviti vācyārthaprayukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8898: yena dhvanirguṇībhūtavyaṅgyayoralaṅkārāṇāṃ cāsaṅkīrṇe viṣayaḥ sujñāto bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:8899: anyathā tu prasiddhālaṅkāraviṣaya eva vyāmohaḥ pravartate /
GK16andhvc3u:8901: taccāpiśabdābhyāmubhayato yojitābhyāṃ caśabdena sthānatrayayojitena khaluśabdena cobhayato yojitena mānavaśabdena spṛṣṭameveti guṇībhūtam /
GK16andhvc3u:8904: yatra vyaṅgyaṃ nāstyeva tatra teṣāṃ śuddhānāṃ prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8910: tata eva ca camatkāra ityata āha--vyaṅgyantvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8919: rājānamapi sevante api viṣamapi upabhuñjate api iti karmaṇā kriyayā ca yojitābhyāmityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8921: sevākriyāyā kṣaṇe kṣaṇe sulabhāpāyatayā samāhitamatibhirapi duranuṣṭheyā /
GK16andhvc3u:8924: eko dyotako bahuṣvantya iti nyāyādramante ceti cakārasya samuccayārthakasya kriyātrayeṇa yojanetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8926: khaluśabdaḥ kuśalaśabdena mānavaśabdena ca yojanīya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8934: prasiddhālaṅkāraviṣaya evetyevakāreṇa kimuta vyaṅgyaviṣaya ityartho darśita ityāha--vyaṅgyaprakārastvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8947: lāvaṇyadraviṇavyayo na gaṇitaḥ kleśo mahān svīkṛtaḥ svacchandasya sukhaṃ janasya vasataḥ cintānalo dīpitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8948: eṣāpi svayameva tulparamaṇābhāvādvarākī hatā ko 'rthaścetasi vedhasā vinihitastanvyāstanuṃ tanvatā //
GK16andhvc3u:8949: ityatra vyājastutiralaṅkāra iti vyākhyāyi kenacittanna cuturastram;
GK16andhvc3u:8956: cireṇa hi yo vyayaḥ sampadyate na tu vidyudiva jhaṭiti tatrāvaśyaṃ gaṇanayā bhavitavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8962: yatsvayaṃ nirmīyate tadeva ca nihanyata iti mahadvaiśasamapiśabdena vakāreṇa coktam /
GK16andhvc3u:8964: na svātmano na lokasya na nirmitasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8966: rāgiṇo hi varākī hateti kṛpaṇatāliṅgitamamaṅgalopahataṃ cānuvitaṃ vacanam /
GK16andhvc3u:8973: pādatrayoktānaṃ trayāṇāmekena yogyo na kaścidartho nirūpyamāṇo dṛśyata ityāha--na svātmana ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8985: varākīti kṛpaṇatāliṅgitaṃ hatetyamaṅgalopahataṃ ca vacanaṃ rāgiṇo hyanucitamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8986: rāgī hi tannimagnacittavṛttitayā tāmeva bahumanyamānastadrūpasuṣamāsudhāmāsvādayan kathaṅkāraṃ tasyāḥ śocyatvamamaṅglatvaṃ ca paryālocayediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8991: ātmanyapi tadrūpāsambhāvanāyāṃ rāgatāyāṃ ca paśuprāyatvaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:8993: vā sītādiviṣaye duṣyantaprāyasya vānirjñātajātiviśeṣe śakuntalādau kimiyaṃ svasaubhāgyābhimānagarbhā
GK16andhvc3u:8995: vītarāgasya vā anādakālābhyastarāgavāsanāvāsitatayā madhyasthatvenāpi tāṃ vastutastathā paśyato neyamuktiḥ na saṃbhāvyā /
GK16andhvc3u:8996: na hi vītarāgo viparyastān bhāvān paśyati /
GK16andhvc3u:9003: kāmamastu svātmavyatiriktajanāpekṣayā tulyaramaṇābhāvasya sambhāvanā svātmāpekṣayāpi tatsambhāvanā na yuktetyatastadvacanamatyantānucitamityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:9018: vītarāgasya vā iyamuktina na sambhāvyeti sambandhathaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:9043: atra vyaṅgyopaskṛtasya vācyārthasyaiva prādhānyamityato 'prastutapraśaṃsālaṅkāra iti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:9045: na cāyaṃ ślokaḥ kvacitprabandha iti śrūyate,
GK16andhvc3u:9049: viśeṣajñamātmano na kañcidevāparaṃ paśyataḥ paridevitametaditi prakāśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9050: tathā cāyaṃ dharmakīrteḥ śloka iti prasiddhiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9053: locanam dhikte kārṣṇyamiti sā paraṃ prastutaparatayeti nātrāsambhava ityāśaṅkyāha--na ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:9054: nissāmānyeti nijamahimeti viśeṣajñamiti paridevitamityetaiścaturbhirvākyakhaṇḍaiḥ krameṇa pādacatuṣṭayasya tātparyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GK16andhvc3u:9056: nanu kimiyatetyāśaṅkya tadāśayena nirvivādatadīyaślokārpitenāsyāśayaṃ saṃvādayati--sambhāvyata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:9057: avagāhanamadhyavasitamapi na yatra āstāṃ tasya sampādanam /
GK16andhvc3u:9061: ahamiti mahīyānavalepaḥ parisphuṭaṃ gamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9066: yato 'yaṃ dharmakīrteḥ śloka iti prasiddhiratastathāpūrvoktārthaka ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9067: viniścayavṛttyante sthito 'yaṃ śloka iti prasiddhiratastathāpūrvoktārthaka ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9074: prakṛtodāharaṇe hi vivādo vyājastutyaprastutapraśaṃsāviṣayo na vakṣyamāṇatadīyaśloka iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9078: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ--yo yasyāśayo 'nyatra suspaṣṭapratipattikassa eva sambhavan anyatrāparisphuṭapratītike
GK16andhvc3u:9085: payaḥpakṣe yadā dānāyāntaḥ praveśo yasya tat /
GK16andhvc3u:9086: analpā dhīśaktirbuddhisāmarthyaṃ yasya tenāpyanyena kenacit kartrā /
GK16andhvc3u:9091: mataṃ mama jagatyalabdhasadṛśapratigrāhakaṃ prayāsyati payonidheḥ paya iva svadehe jārām //
GK16andhvc3u:9094: alabdhaṃ prayatnaparīkṣitamapi na prāptaṃ sadṛśaṃ yasya tathābhūtaṃ pratigrāhamekaiko grāho jalacaraḥ prāṇī airāvatoccaiḥśravodhanvantariprāyo yatra tadalabdhasadṛśapratigrāhakam /
GK16andhvc3u:9099: parasya bālapriyā evaṃ bhūtaṃ mama mataṃ matapratipādako granthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9100: alabdhaḥ sadṛśaḥ svatulyaḥ pratigrāhako 'nyān pratibodhayitā svayaṃ bo /
GK16andhvc3u:9107: adṛṣṭaṃ paramaṃ yasmāttathāvidhamarthatattvaṃ kaustubhādiṃ yatra tat /
GK16andhvc3u:9133: tattacchalokena piratipāditāyāstathāvidhasya svasya svamatasya ca tathāvidhaśocyāvasthāyāḥ svapne 'pyasambhāvyāyāḥ sambhavāt svasya vismayaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:9140: tatra vivakṣitatvaṃ yathā-- parārthe yaḥ pīḍāmanubhavati bhaṅge 'pi madhuro yadīyaḥ sarveṣāmiha khalu vikāro 'pyabhimataḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9141: na samprāpto vṛrddhi yadi sa bhṛśamakṣetrapatitaḥ kimikṣordeṣo 'sau na punaraguṇāyā marubhuvaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:9142: yathā vā mamaiva--- amī ye dṛśyaneti nanu subhagarūpāḥ saphalatā bhavatyeṣāṃ yasya kṣaṇamupagatānāṃ viṣayatām /
GK16andhvc3u:9145: vīrarase viśrāntiriti mantavyam anyathā paridevitamātreṇa kiṃ kṛtaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:9148: iha tu saṅgatirastyevetyāśaṅkya saṅgatāvapi bhavatyevaiṣeti darśayitumupakramate---aprastuteti /
GK16andhvc3u:9151: yasya cakṣuṣo viṣayatāṃ kṣaṇaṃ gatānāmeṣāṃ saphalatā bhavati tadidaṃ bālapriyā śrotṛjanasyotsāhajanane hetudvayam--atyādaretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9164: nanvaprekṣāpūrvakatvamātmano 'nena darśitaṃ svaviṣayaparidevitasya sarvatra tadāvedakatvāditi na kiñcitkaratvaviraha ityāśaṅkya pariharati--aprekṣetyādi
GK16andhvc3u:9165: nanvaprastutapraśaṃsāyāmityādigranthasya kā saṃgatirityataḥ prāsaṅgikī seti darśayannavatārayati--nanvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9175: nirāloke loke kathamidamaho cakṣuradhunā samaṃ jātaṃ sarvairna samamathavānyairavayavaiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:9176: anayorhi dvayoḥ ślokayorikṣucakṣuṣī vivakṣitasvarūpe eva na ca prastute /
GK16andhvc3u:9178: avivakṣitatvaṃ yathā-- kastvaṃ bhoḥ kathayāmi daivahatakaṃ māṃ viddhi śākhoṭakaṃ vairāgyādiva vakṣi,
GK16andhvc3u:9186: aprāptaḥ para utkṛṣṭo bhāgo 'rthalābhātmakaḥ svarūpaprathanalakṣaṇo vā yena tasya /
GK16andhvc3u:9188: anena padenedamāha--akathanīyametat śrūyamāṇaṃ hi nirvedāya bhavati,
GK16andhvc3u:9190: kākvā devahatakamityādinā ca sūcitaṃ te vairāgyamiti bālapriyā aprastutārthavarṇanasthala ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9194: pīḍā nāmākṣau niṣpīḍanaṃ satpuruṣe tu kleśaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9203: ye ityasya pratinirdeśaḥ--'eṣām' iti 'yasyetyasyedam' iti ca /
GK16andhvc3u:9205: viveko 'pītyapiśabdena prakāśarūpārthasya saṅgrahaḥ sāmyābhāve vivakṣitaṃ hetuṃ darśayati--hastā hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9209: bhāgaśabdena dhanādilābhaḥ kīrtiprasaralābho vā grāhyo dvayorapi bhajanīyatvena bhāgaśabdavācyatvādityāha--arthalābhaityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9214: śrūyamāṇaṃ na tu śravaṇottaramevetyatiśayitanirvedahetutvaṃ śravaṇasya dyotayituṃ śatṛpratyena nirdeśaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9219: vāmenātra vaṭastamadhvagajanaḥ sarvātmanā sevata na cchāyāpi paropakārakariṇī mārgasthitasyāpi me //
GK16andhvc3u:9220: na hi vṛkṣaviśeṣeṇa sahoktipratyuktī sambhavata ityavivakṣitābhidheyenaivānena ślokena
GK16andhvc3u:9225: verīeṃ vaiṃ dento pāmara ho ohasijjihasi //
GK16andhvc3u:9238: smṛtiviṣayavastuno nirvedapradatvātsmaraṇasahabhāvī nirveda iti sanirvedatvaṃ smaraṇasya /
GK16andhvc3u:9250: he pāmara tathābhūtāyā badaryāḥ vṛti dadāttvaṃ janairapahasiṣyasa ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9253: sambhavītyasyānantaraṃ na cāsambhavīti ca kvacit atra hi vācyāratho nātyantaṃ sambhavī nā casambhavī /
GK16andhvc3u:9256: kāvye ubhe tato 'nyad yat tac citram abhidhīyate // DhvK_3.41 //
GK16andhvc3u:9258: tatra kiṃcic chabda-citraṃ vācya-citram ataḥ param // DhvK_3.42 //
GK16andhvc3u:9263: locanam iti pāṭhe samṛddhena ṛddhimātreṇa sātpuruṣo na tu guṇādineti vyākhyeyam /
GK16andhvc3u:9265: vācyabhāvaniyamo nāsti nāstīti na śakyaṃ vaktuṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:9267: tathā hi utpathajātāyā iti na tathākulodbhūtāyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9269: phalakusumapatrrarahitāyā ityevambhūtāpi kācitputriṇī vā bhrātrādipakṣaparipūrvatayā sambandhivargapoṣitā vā parirakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9272: evamaprastutapraśaṃsāṃ prasaṅgato nirūpya prakṛtameva yannirūpaṇīyaṃ tadupa saṃharati--tasmāditi /
GK16andhvc3u:9273: aprastutapraśaṃsāyāmapi lāvaṇyetyatra śloke yasmādyvāmoho loksya dṛṣṭastato hetorityarthaḥ // 40 //
GK16andhvc3u:9274: evaṃ vyaṅgyasvarūpaṃ nirūpya sarvathā yattacchūnyaṃ tatra kā vārteti nirūpayitumāha--pradhānetyādinā /
GK16andhvc3u:9278: vācyārtha ityādigranthaṃ tātparyato vivṛṇoti locane--vācyabhāvaniyamo nāstīti /
GK16andhvc3u:9281: vācyārtho na bhambhavatīti vaktuṃ ca na śakyamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9286: evaṃ bhūtāpi akulīnā lāvaṇyādiguṇarahitā ca bhavantyapi /
GK16andhvc3u:9289: iyaṃ tu putrādirahitā ca ato 'syā rakṣāṃ kurvaṃstvaṃ parihāsāspadaṃ bhaviṣyasītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9298: vibhāgapradarśanamātreṇa siddhe śabdacitraṃ vācyacitramiti samaśīrṣikayā vyaṅgyasyārthasya prādhānye dhvanisaṃjñitakāvyaprakāraḥ guṇabhāge tu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatā /
GK16andhvc3u:9299: tato 'nyadrasabhāvāditātparyarahitaṃ vyaṅgyārthaviśeṣaprakāśanaśaktiśūnyaṃ ca kāvyaṃ kevalavācyavācakavaicitryamātrāśrayeṇopanibaddhamālekhyaprakhyaṃ yadābhāsate taccitram /
GK16andhvc3u:9303: vācyacitraṃ tataḥ śabdacitrādanyadvyaṅgyārthasaṃsparśarahitaṃ prādhānyena vākyarthatayā sthitaṃ rasāditātparyarahitamutprekṣādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9307: tatra yatra vastvalaṅgārāntaraṃ vā vyaṅgyaṃ nāsti sa nāma citrasya kalpayatāṃ viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9308: yatra tu rasādīnāmavaliṣayatvaṃ sa kāvyaprakāro na sambhavatyeva /
GK16andhvc3u:9310: vastu ca sarvameva jagadgatamavaśyaṃ kasyacidrasasya bhāvasya vāṅgtvaṃ pratipadyate antato vibhāvatvena /
GK16andhvc3u:9312: na ca tadasti vastu kiñcidyanna cittavṛttiviśeṣamupajanayati tadanutpādane vā locanam prasiddhameva tattulyamevārthacitraṃ mantavyamiti bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:9333: na tanmukhyaṃ kāvyaṃ kāvyānukāro hyasāviti vacanāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9336: kaviviṣayataiva tasya na syāt kaviviṣayaśca citratayā kaścinnirūpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9338: kiṃ tu yadā rasabhāvādivivakṣāśūnyaḥ kaviḥ śabdālaṅkāramarthālaṅkāraṃ vopanibadhnāti tadā tadvivakṣāpekṣayā rasādiśūnyatārthasya parikalpyate
GK16andhvc3u:9340: vācyasāmarthyavaśena ca kavivivakṣāvirahe 'pi tathāvidhe viṣaye rasādipratītirbhavantī paridurbalā locanam nanu mā bhūtkaviviṣaya ityāśaṅkyāha--kaviviṣayaśceti
GK16andhvc3u:9341: kāvyarūpatayā yadyapi na nirdiṣṭastathāpi kavigocarīkṛta evāsau vaktavyaḥ anyasya
GK16andhvc3u:9343: sā cāvaśyaṃ vibhāvānubhāvyabhicāriparyavasāyanīti bhāvaḥ kiṃ tviti /
GK16andhvc3u:9347: naiva tatra rasapratītirasti yathā pākānabhijñasūdaviracate māṃsapākaviśeṣe /
GK16andhvc3u:9359: tathāpi kathaṃ rasādiśūnyatvābhāva ityata āha--sā cetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9377: bhavatītyanenāpa prakāreṇa nīrasatvaṃ parikalpya citraviṣayo vyavasthāpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9381: tadā nāstyeva tatkāvyaṃ dhvaneryatra na gocaraḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:9382: ' etacca citraṃ kavīnāṃ viśṛṅkhalagirāṃ rasāditātparyamanapekṣyaiva kāvyapravṛttidarśanādasmābhiḥ parikalpitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9383: idānīntanānāṃ tu nyāyye kāvyanaya vyavasthāpane kriyamāṇe nāstyeva dhvanivyatiriktaḥ kāvyaprakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9384: yataḥ paripākavatāṃ kavīnāṃ rasāditātparyavirahe vyāpāra eva naśobhate /
GK16andhvc3u:9385: rasāditātparye ca nāstyeva tadvastu yadabhimatarasāṅgatāṃ nīyamānaṃ na praguṇībhavata /
GK16andhvc3u:9386: acetanā api hi bhāvā yathāyathamucitarasavibhāvatayā cetanavṛttāntayojanayā vā na santyeva te ye yānti na rasāṅgatām /
GK16andhvc3u:9388: ajñakṛtāyāṃ ca śikhariṇyāmaho khikhariṇīti na tajjñānāccamatkāraḥ api tu dadhiguḍamaricaṃ caitadasamañjasayojitamiti vaktāro bhavanti /
GK16andhvc3u:9394: heyatayā tadupadiśyata iti cet--ghaṭe kṛte kavirna bhavatatyetadapi vaktavyamityāśaṅkya kavibhiḥ khalu tatkṛtamato heyatayopadiśyata ityetannirūpayati--etaccetyādinā
GK16andhvc3u:9397: bālapriyā iti vaktāro bhavantītyanena rasāsvādasya daurbalyaṃ darśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9412: śṛṅgārī cetkaviḥ kāvye jātaṃ rasamayaṃ jagat /
GK16andhvc3u:9416: tasmānnāstyeva tadvastu yatsarvātmanā rasatātparyavataḥ kavestadicchayā tadabhimatarasāṅgatāṃ na dhatte /
GK16andhvc3u:9417: tathopanibadhyamānaṃ vā na cārutvātiśayaṃ locanam yatpadāni tyajantyeva parivṛttisahiṇṇutām /
GK16andhvc3u:9423: ata eva bharatamuniḥ--'kaverantargataṃ bhāvaṃ' 'kāvyārthān bhāvayati' ityādiṣu kaviśabdameva /
GK16andhvc3u:9437: iti ślokaḥ, kāvyārthānityādivākyaṃ ca nāṭyaśāstre saptamādhyāye vartete /
GK16andhvc3u:9442: koḥ kavatervā kavanīyaṃ kāvyaṃ tatra ca padārthavākyārthau raseṣvevaṃ paryavasyata ityasādhāraṇyātprādhānyacca kāvyasyārthā rasāḥ arthyante
GK16andhvc3u:9449: sthite caivaṃ sarva eva kāvyaprakāro na dhvanidharmatāmatipatati rasādyapekṣāyāṃ kaverguṇībhūtavyaṅgyalakṣaṇo 'pi prakārastadaṅgatāmavalambata ityuktaṃ prāk /
GK16andhvc3u:9450: yadā tu cāṭuṣu devatāstutiṣu vā rasādīnāmaṅgatayā vyavasthānaṃ hṛdayavatīṣu ca saprajñakagāthāsu
GK16andhvc3u:9451: kāsucidyvaṅgyaviśiṣṭavācye prādhānyaṃ tadapi guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya dhvaniniṣpandabhūtatvemevetyuktaṃ prāk /
GK16andhvc3u:9452: tadevamidārnīntanakavikāvyanayopadeśe kriyamāṇe prāthamikānāmabhyāsārthināṃ yadi paraṃ citreṇa vyavahāraḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:9455: yāvadrasiko na bhavati tadā paridṛśyamāno 'pyayaṃ bhāvavargo yadyapi sukhaduḥkhamohamādhyasthyamātraṃ laukikaṃ vitarati,
GK16andhvc3u:9456: tathāpi kavivarṇanopārohaṃ vinā lokātikrāntarasāsvādabhūvaṃ nādhiśeta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9467: madhye tiṣṭhatīti madhyasthaḥ tasya bhāvo mādhyasthyaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohānāṃ yanmādhyasthyaṃ tadekānubhavaṃ tanmātramityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9482: bhavantu iti hālikasyāśiṣaṃ vardhayantyā punaḥ punaḥ kurvatyā kayācit /
GK16andhvc3u:9486: kārpāsalatānāṃ paripoṣe tatsthale niśśaṅkaṃ hālikena saha ramaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti baddhathā nirvṛtirityanena taccauryasambhogābhilāṣo vadhvā vyajyate,
GK16andhvc3u:9490: tadayamatra saṃgrahaḥ--- yasmin raso vā bhāvo vā tātparyeṇa prakāśate /
GK16andhvc3u:9493: locanam atra godāvarīkacchalatāgahane bhareṇa jambūphaleṣu pacyamāneṣu /
GK16andhvc3u:9494: hālikavadhūḥ paridhatte jambūphalarasaraktaṃ nivasanamiti tvaritayauryasaṃbhogasaṃbhāvyamānajambūphalarasaraktatvaparabhāganihnavanaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyamityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16andhvc3u:9496: ātmātminorabheda eva vastuto vyutpattaye tu vibhāgaḥ bālapriyā prātiveśyiko nirvṛtiṃ prāpita iti ca locane pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9499: atra pakṣe saṅketasthānārthinaṃ svānuraktaṃ prātiveśyikaṃ tatsambhogābhilāṣiṇī kācidyadṛcchayā
GK16andhvc3u:9500: dṛṣṭaṃ hālikaṃ pratyevamāśīrvādena saṅketasthānaṃ jñāpitavatīti tatsammogābhilāṣo vyaṅgyo bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9508: tvaritaḥ patitajambūphale nikuñcadeśe sicayāstaraṇe tvarayā kṛto yaścauryasambhogastena
GK16andhvc3u:9509: sambhāvyamānaḥ samutpādyamāstaddhetukatayā tarkyamāṇo vā yo jambūphalarasaraktatvena
GK16andhvc3u:9510: parabhāgaḥ sicyasya tattadbhāge varṇāntaraprāptiḥ tasya nihnavanaṃ gopanecchetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9512: sarvāvayavāvacchedena jambūphalarasaraktasya sicayasya paridhānena tannihnavanaṃ gamyate,
GK16andhvc3u:9514: nanu dhvanikāvyayorātmaśarīrasthānīyayorbhedādvṛttau ' dhvanireva kāvyam' iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdeśo 'nupapanna ityata āha--ātmātminorityādi
GK16andhvc3u:9518: dhvaniḥ kāvyasyātmā sarvatra tatra viṣayī jñeyaḥ sahṛdayairjanaiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:9520: saṅkara-saṃsṛṣṭibhyāṃ punar apy uddyotate bahudhā // DhvK_3.43 //
GK16andhvc3u:9523: tasya ca dhvaneḥ svaprabhedairguṇībhūtavyaṅgyena vācyālaṅkāraiśca saṅkarasaṃsṛṣṭivyavasthāyāṃ kriyamāṇāyāṃ bahuprabhedatā lakṣye dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9534: sa trividhasya dhvaneḥ kāvyamārgo viṣaya ita yāvat // 41// ,42 //
GK16andhvc3u:9536: sahaguṇībhūtavyaṅgyena sahālaṅkārairye vartante sve dhvaneḥ prabhedāstaiḥ saṃkīrṇatayā saṃsṛṣṭyā vānantaprakāro dhvanirita tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:9539: tatrāpi pratyekaṃ saṃkareṇa saṃsṛṣṭyā ceta ṣaṭ /
GK16andhvc3u:9540: saṃkarasyāpi trayaḥ prakārāḥ anugrāhyanugrāhakabhāvena saṃdehāspadatvenaikapadānupraveśeneti dvādaśa bhedāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9541: pūrvaṃ ca ye pañcatriṃśadbhedā uktāste guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasyāpi bālapriyā śabdārthamayaṃ kāvyaṃ śarīramiti vibhāga ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9548: prakāśate sarvatra tatra vyaṅgyaprādhānyaikanibandhano dhvaniḥ viṣayī san sahṛdayairjanairjeya ityanvayaḥ // 41// ,42 //
GK16andhvc3u:9550: udyātata ityatra dhvaniriti śeṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9551: saguṇībhūtavyaṅgyaissālaṅkāraissvaprabhedaiḥ saha saṅkarasaṃsṛṣṭyoruktyā pratyekaṃ taistribhissaha te labhyete ityāśayena vibhāgān darśayati--svaprabhedairityādi
GK16andhvc3u:9552: prakāśyata iti sammiśnyata iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9556: pūrvaṃ ca ye pañcatriṃśadbhedā uktā iti /
GK16andhvc3u:9557: dvitīyodyotāvasāna 'evaṃ dhvaneḥ prabhedān pratipādye'ti vṛttigranthavyākhyānāvasare ye pañcatriśadbhedāḥ tatra svaprabhedasaṅkīrṇatvaṃ kadācidanugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena
GK16andhvc3u:9562: khaṇapāhuṇiā deara esā jāāeṃ kiṃpi de bhaṇidā /
GK16andhvc3u:9566: tatra saṃkaratrayeṇa saṃsṛṣṭyā ca guṇane dve śate caturaśītyadhike /
GK16andhvc3u:9567: tāvatā pañcatriṃśato mukhyabhedānāṃ guṇane saptasahastrāṇi catvāri śatāni viśatyadhikāni bhavanti /
GK16andhvc3u:9569: tatrā vyutpattaye katipayabhedeṣūdāharaṇāni ditsuḥ svaprabhedānāṃ kārikāyāmanyapadārthatvena pradhānatayoktatvāttadāśrayāṇyeva catvāryudāharaṇānyāha--tatreti
GK16andhvc3u:9574: eṣā te jāyayā kimapi bhaṇitā roditi /
GK16andhvc3u:9576: sā tāvaddevarānuraktā tajjāyayā viditavṛttāntayā kimapyuktetyeṣoktistadvṛttāntaṃ bālapriyā svayaṃ pratipāditā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9587: dve śate caturaśītyadhike ityasyānantaraṃ 'tāvatā pañcatriśato mukhyabhedānāṃ guṇane saptasahasrāṇi catvāri viṃśatyadhikāni bhavantīti pāṭho bahuṣu grantheṣu dṛśyate,
GK16andhvc3u:9591: ato 'laṅkāratvāvacchi eka eva grāhya iti bhāva- /
GK16andhvc3u:9610: (kṣaṇaprādhuṇikā devara eṣā jāyayā kimapi te bhaṇitā /
GK16andhvc3u:9615: ekavyañjakānupraveśena tu vyaṅgyatvamalakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya svaprabhedāntarāpekṣayā locanam dṛṣṭavatyā anyasyāstaddevaracaurakāminyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9616: tatra tava gṛhaṇyāyaṃ vṛttānto jñāta ityubhayataḥ kalahāyitumicchantyevamāha /
GK16andhvc3u:9618: yadi vā tvaṃ tāvadetasyāmevānurakta itīrṣyākopatātparyādanunayanamanyaparaṃ vivakṣitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9620: vayaṃ tvidānīṃ garhaṇīyāḥ saṃvṛttā ityetatparatayā ubhayathāpi ca svābhiprāyaprakāśanādekataraniścaye pramāṇābhāva ityuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:9625: vidito vṛttāntastasyā devarasya ca parasparānurāgādiryayā tayetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9629: jāyayā kimapi bhaṇiteti rodanahetupradarśanamātraṃ na tatkathanasya phalāntaramapyastītyāha--tatretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9642: sa cātra sambhogatvena rūpeṇa lakṣyo vivakṣita ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9643: tasyāṃ tavānurāgo mayā jñāta ityādirarthaścātra vyaṅgyo bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9667: guṇībhūtavyaṅgya saṅkīrṇatvaṃ yathā--'nyakkāro hyayameva me yadarayaḥ' ityādau /
GK16andhvc3u:9668: yathā vā-- kartā dyūtacchalānāṃ jatumayaśaraṇoddīpanaḥ so 'bhimānī kṛṣṇākeśottarīyavyapanayanapaṭuḥ pāṇḍavā yasya dāsāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9669: rājā duḥśāsanādergururanujaśatasyāṅgarājasya mitraṃ kkāste duryodhano 'sau kathayata na ruṣā draṣṭumabhyāgatau svaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:9671: yadi vā devarānuraktāyā eva taṃ devaramanyayā sahāvalokitasaṃbhogavṛtāntaṃ pratīyamuktiḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:9675: sarvatra kāvye rasāditātparyaṃ tāvadasti tatra rasadhvanerbhāvadhvaneścaikena vyañjakenābhivyañjanaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:9681: evaṃ svaprabhedaṃ prati caturbhedānudāhṛtya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyaṃ pratyudāharati--guṇībhūteti /
GK16andhvc3u:9697: saṃyogastadātmakasya lepasya vācyārthasya bādhāllipidhātuḥ samparkaṃ lakṣayaṃstadatiśayaṃ dyotayati /
GK16andhvc3u:9698: evaṃ payodāssuhṛdo yeṣāmityatra vācyārthasya bādhātsuhṛtpadamupakāritvena rūpeṇa lakṣayattadatiśayaṃ vyanaktītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9706: atra hyalakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya vākyārthībhūtasya vyaṅgyaviśiṣṭavācyābhidhāyibhiḥ padaiḥ sammiśratā /
GK16andhvc3u:9707: ata eva ca padārthāśrayatve guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya vākyārthāśrayatve ca dhvaneḥ saṅkīrṇatāyāmapi na virodhaḥ svaprabhedāntaravat /
GK16andhvc3u:9712: tena tadupalakṣitā yo 'rtho vyaṅgyaguṇībhāvena vartate tena saṃmiśratā saṃkīrmatā /
GK16andhvc3u:9713: sā cānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena saṃdehayogenaikavyañjakānupraveśena ceti yathāsaṃbhavamudāharaṇadvaye yojyā /
GK16andhvc3u:9714: tathā hi-me yadaraya ityādibhi- sarvaireva padārthauḥ kartetyādibhiśca vibhāvādirūpatayā raudra evānugṛhyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9715: kartetyādau ca pratipadaṃ pratyavāntaravākyaṃ pratisamāsaṃ ca vyaṅgyamutprekṣituṃ śakyameveti na likhitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9721: ekavyañjakānupraveśastu taireva padaiḥ guṇībhūtavya vyaṅgyasya pradhānībhūtasya carasasya vibhāvādidvāratayābhivyañjanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:9724: nyakkāra ityādau rāvaṇagatasya kartetyādau bhīmasenagatasya ca krodhasya pratīteriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9743: kartetyādau tu te kiṃ na santītyata āha--kartetyādāviti /
GK16andhvc3u:9746: raudra evānugṛhyata ityanenānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena saṅkaraṃ pradarśya sandehayogena taṃ darśayati--tatretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9752: tathā ca guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya dhvaneśca sandehasaṅkara iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9756: ata evetyetadvyākhyāyā ta evetyādi na yathāhi dhvaniprabhedāntarāṇi parasparaṃ saṅkīryante padārthavākyārthāśrayatvena ca na viruddhāni /
GK16andhvc3u:9757: kiṃ caikavyaṅgyāśrayatve tu pradhānaguṇabhāvo virudhyate na tu vyaṅgyabhedāpekṣayā tato 'pyasya na virodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9758: ayaṃ ca saṅkarasaṃsṛṣṭivyavahāro bahūnāmekatra vācyavācakabhāva iva vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāve 'pi nirvirodha eva mantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9759: yatra tu padāni kānicidavivakṣitavācyānuramanarūpavyaṅgyavācyāni vā tatra dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:9761: atra hi 'vilāsasuhṛdā' 'rādhārahaḥsākṣiṇām' ityete pade dhvaniprabhedarūpe 'te' 'jāne' ityete ca pade guṇībhūtavyaṅgyarūpe /
GK16andhvc3u:9764: nanu vyaṅgyaṃ guṇībhūtaṃ pradhānaṃ ceti viruddhameva taddṛśyamānamapyuktatvānna śraddheyamityāśaṅkya vyañjakabhedāttāvanna virodha iti darśayati--ata eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:9770: nanu vyañjakabhedātprathamabhedayoḥ parihāro 'stu ekavyañjakānupraveśe tu kiṃ vaktavyamityāśaṅkya pāramārthikaṃ parihāramāha--kiñcetiḥ tato 'pīti /
GK16andhvc3u:9772: nanu vācyālaṅkāraviṣaye śruto 'yaṃ saṃkarādivyavahāro na tu vyaṅgyaviṣaya ityāśaṅkyāha--ayaṃ ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:9774: mananena pratītyā tathā niśceyaḥ ubhayatrāpi pratītereva śaraṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9783: anugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena sandehayogena ca yau saṅkarau tayorityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9794: mukhyārthayoḥ vācyālaṅkārasaṅkīrṇatvamalakṣyakramavyaṅgyāpekṣayā rasavati sālaṅkāre kāvye sarvatra suvyavasthitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9797: suhṛcchabdena sākṣiśabdena cāvivakṣitavācyo dhvaniḥ 'te' itipadenāsādhāraṇaguṇagaṇo 'bhivyakto 'pi guṇatvamavalambate,
GK16andhvc3u:9806: 'vivakṣā tatparatvena' iti dvitīyoddyotamūlodāharaṇebhyaḥ saṃkaratrayaṃ saṃsṛṣṭiśca labhyata eva /
GK16andhvc3u:9807: 'calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭim' ityatra hi rūpakavyatirekasya prāgvyākhyātasya śṛṅgārānugrāhakatvaṃ svabhāvokteḥ śṛṅgārasya caikānupraveśaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9808: 'uppaha jāyā' iti gāthāyāṃ pāmarasvabhāvoktirvā dhvanirveti prakaraṇādyabhāve ekataragrāhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ nāsti /
GK16andhvc3u:9810: tathāpi 'nāti nirvahaṇaiṣitā' iti yadabhiprāyeṇoktaṃ tatra saṅkārāsambhavātsaṃsṛṣṭirevālaṅkārema rasadhvaneḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9814: bālapriyā suhṛtvasākṣitvayoracetaneṣu latāveśmasu bādhātsuhṛtpadamupakāritvena sākṣipadamāsannatvena rūpeṇa ca lakṣayati /
GK16andhvc3u:9839: yā vyāpāravatī rasān rasayituṃ kācatkavīnāṃ navā dṛṣṭiryā pariniṣṭhitārthaviṣayonmeṣā ca vaipaścitī /
GK16andhvc3u:9848: ata eva te kavayaḥ varṇanāyogāt teṣām /
GK16andhvc3u:9853: tatra dṛṣṭiścākṣuṣaṃ jñānaṃ ṣāḍavādi rasayatīti virodhālaṅkāro 'ta eva navā /
GK16andhvc3u:9879: vyāpāravatīti viruddhārthasya pratītyā virodhābhāsālaṅkāra ityāha--tatra dṛṣṭirityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9893: aindriyakaṃ vijñānaṃ laukikatattadviṣayakacākṣuṣajñānaṃ tasyābhyāsa āvṛttiḥ tenollasite prakāśite ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9895: te dve apyavalambya viśvamaniśa nirvarṇayanto vayaṃ śrāntā naiva ca labdhamabdhiśayana tvadbhaktitulyaṃ sukham //
GK16andhvc3u:9896: locanam yā caivaṃvidhā dṛṣṭiḥ pariniṣṭito 'calaḥ arthaviṣaye niścetavye viṣaye unmeṣo yasyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9897: tathā pariniṣṭhite lokaprasiddhe 'rthe na tu kavivadapūrvasminnarthe unmeṣo yasyāḥ sā /
GK16andhvc3u:9900: kavīnāmiti vaipaścitīti vacanena nāhaṃ kavirna paṇḍita ityātmano 'nauddhatyaṃ dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9908: tathā niścitārthaṃ varṇayantaḥ idamitthamiti parāmarśanumānādinānirbhajya nirvarṇanaṃ kimatra sāraṃ syāditi tilaśastilaśo vicayanam /
GK16andhvc3u:9909: yacca nirvarṇyate tatkhalu madhye vyāpāryamāṇayā madhye cārthaviśeṣu niścitonmeṣayā niścalayā dṛṣṭyā samyaṅnirvarṇitaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:9913: na kevalaṃ sāraṃ na labdhaṃ yāvatpratyuta khedaḥ prāpta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9916: yoganidrayā tvamata eva sārasvarūpavedī svarūpāvasthita ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9919: tvameva paramātmasvarūpoviśvasārastasya bhaktiḥ śraddhādipūrvaka upāsanākramajastadāveśastena bālapriyā arthaviṣaya ityasyārthamāha--niścetavya ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9936: mithyādṛṣṭiḥ kavidṛṣṭiḥ tatvadṛṣṭiḥ vipaściddṛṣṭiḥ tayorāṇe vyasaninastātparyavanta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9950: yatra hi kānicitpadāni locanam tulyamapi na labdhamāstāṃ tāvattajjātīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:9951: evaṃ prathamameva parameśvarabhaktibhājaḥ kutūhalamātrāvalambitakaviprāmāṇikobhayavṛtteḥ punarapi parameśvarabhaktiviśrāntireva yukteti manvānasyeyamuktiḥ
GK16andhvc3u:9953: yadapi vā lokottaraṃ rasacarvaṇātmakaṃ tata ubhayato 'pi parameśvaraviśrāntyānandaḥ prakṛṣyate tadānandavipruṇmātrāvabhāso hi rasāsvāda ityuktaṃ prāgasmābhiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9954: laukikaṃ tu sukhaṃ tato 'pi nikṛṣṭaprāyaṃ bahutaraduḥkhānuṣaṅgāditi tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:9957: andhapadanyāsena dṛṣṭiśabdo 'tyantatiraskṛtavācyo vāstu ityekataraniścaye nāsti pramāṇam,
GK16andhvc3u:9962: sakalavākye hi yadyalaṅkāro 'pi vyaṅgyārtho 'pi vyaṅgyārtho 'pi pradhānaṃ tadānugrāhyanugrāhakatvasaṅkarastadabhāve
GK16andhvc3u:9963: tvasaṅgatirityalaṅkāreṇa bālapriyā tasya paramānandarūpatvaṃ ca bhaktirasāyanādigrantheṣu pradarśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9967: vṛttau saṅkīrṇatvamityanenānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena saṅkaraḥ ekapadānupraveśaśaṅkaraśca vivakṣita iti darśayati--tatretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9973: te avalambya nirvarṇayanta ityatra te iti tatpadena dṛṣṭipadavācyārthasya darśanasya parāmarśe darśanamavalambya paśyanta iti viruddhārthasya pratītyā virodhālaṅkāro vetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9976: niḥśvāsāndha ityādāvandhādipadenevātyantatiraskṛtavācyena dṛṣṭipadena lakṣyasya pratibhārūpārthasya parāmarśe 'tyantatiraskṛtavācyo dhvanirvetyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:9990: yathā-- dīrdhīkurvan paṭu madakalaṃ kūjitaṃ sārasānāṃ pratyūṣeṣu sphuṭitakamalāmodamaittrīkaṣāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9991: locanam vā dhvaninā vā paryāyeṇa dvābhyāmapi vā yugapatpadaviśrāntābhyāṃ bhāvyamiti trayo bhedāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9993: yatrānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvaṃ pratyāśaṅkāpi nāvatarati taṃ tṛtīyameva prakāramudāhartumupakramate--yatra hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:9998: atratyo hiśabdo maitrīpadamityasyānantaraṃ yojya iti grantha saṅgatiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10004: tathāsau sukumāro vāyuryena tajjaḥ śabdaḥ sārasakūjitamapi nābhibhavati pratyuta tatsabrahmacārī tadeva dīpayati /
GK16andhvc3u:10005: na ca dīpanaṃ tadīyamanupayogi yatastanmadena kalaṃ madhuramākarṇanīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:10018: vācyālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭatatvaṃ padāpekṣayaiveti padānāmāvṛttiḥ tatra padāpekṣayetyasya tathāvidhapadāpekṣayetyarthaśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10020: dīrghīkuvannityanenoktaṃ siprāvātahetukaṃ kūjitasya dīrghatvaṃ daiśikaṃ kālikaṃ svasajātīyasaṃvalanakṛtaṃ ceti trividhamiti vivṛṇoti--saprāvātenetyādi dīrghatvamityantena /
GK16andhvc3u:10029: sphuṭitānītyasya truṭitānītyarthaṃ manasivṛtya tatra hetuṃ gamyaṃ darśayati--antarityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:10031: yatra strīṇāṃ harati surataglānimaṅgānukūlaḥ siprāvātaḥ priyatama iva prārthanācāṭukāraḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:10032: locanam tathā sphuṭitāni vikasitāni nayanahārīṇi yāni kamalāni teṣāṃ ya āmodastena
GK16andhvc3u:10036: sarvasya tathāvidhasya trailokyasārabhūtasya ya evaṃ karoti suratakṛtāṃ glāniṃ tāntiṃ harati,
GK16andhvc3u:10037: atha ca tadviṣayāṃ glāniṃ punaḥ sambhogābhilāṣoddīpanena harati /
GK16andhvc3u:10038: na ca prasahyaprabhutatayāpi tvaṅgānukūlo hyadyasparśaḥ hṛdayāntarbhūtaśca /
GK16andhvc3u:10041: prārthanārthaṃ cāṭūni karotīti tena tathā kāryata iti parasparānurāgaprāṇaśṛṅgārasarvasvabhūto 'sau pavanaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10042: yuktaṃ caitattasya yataḥ siprāparicito 'sau vāta iti nāgariko na tvavidagdho bālapriyā bhāvārthamāha--nayaneti /
GK16andhvc3u:10045: tena parasparānukūlyasya parasparopakāritvasya lābha ityartha-. atrāvicchinnassaṃśleṣo lakṣyārthaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:10061: priyatame iti ca padacchedamabhipretya priyatame prārthanā cāṭukāra iti vātaviśeṣaṇatayāpi yojayati--priyatama ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:10065: cāṭukāra iti ṇyantātkartari pratyaya ityāha--cāṭūni atra hi maitrīpadamavivakṣitavācyo dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10068: priyatamo 'pi ratānte 'ṅgānukūlaḥ saṃvāhanādinā prārthanārthaṃ cāṭukāra evameva surataglāniṃ harati /
GK16andhvc3u:10070: cāṭukaraṇāvasare ca sphuṭitaṃ vikasitaṃ yatkamalakāntidhārivadanaṃ tasya yāmodamaitrī sahajasaurabhaparicayastena kaṣāya uparakto bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:10072: evaṃ śabdarūpagandhasparśā yatra hṛdyā yatra ca pavano 'pa tathā nāgarikaḥ sa tavāvaśyamabhigantavyo deśa iti meghaḍhūte meghaṃ prati kāmina iyamuktiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10079: ityetadantaṃ vyākhyāyodāharaṇāni ca nirūpya 'punarapi' iti yatkārikābhāge padadvayaṃ tasyārthaṃ prakāśayatyudāharaṇadvāreṇaiva---saṃsṛṣṭetyādi
GK16andhvc3u:10080: punaḥśabdasyāyamarthaḥ---na kevalaṃ dhvaneḥ svaprabhedādibhiḥ saṃsṛṣṭisaṅkarau vivakṣitau yāvatteṣāmanyonyamapi svaprabhedānāṃ bālapriyā kārayatīti
GK16andhvc3u:10115: dantakṣatāni karajaiśca vipāṭitāni prodbhinnasāndrapulake bhavataḥ śarīre /
GK16andhvc3u:10117: atra hi samāsoktisaṃsṛṣṭena virodhālaṅkāreṇa saṃkīrṇasyālakṣyakamavyaṅgyasya dhvaneḥ prakāśanam /
GK16andhvc3u:10119: locanam svaprabhedairguṇībhūtavyaṅgyena vā saṅkīrṇānāṃ saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ ca dhvanīnāṃ saṅkīrṇatvaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:10120: saṃsṛṣṭatvaṃ ca durlakṣamiti vispaṣṭodāharaṇaṃ na bhavatītyabhiprāyeṇālaṅkārasyālaṅkāreṇa
GK16andhvc3u:10121: saṃsṛṣṭasya saṃkīrṇasya vā dhvanau saṃkarasaṃsargau pradarśanīyau /
GK16andhvc3u:10123: bodhisattvasya svakiśorabhakṣaṇapravṛttāṃ siṃho prati nijaśarīraṃ vitīrṇavataḥ kenaciccāṭukaṃ kriyate /
GK16andhvc3u:10128: jātaspṛhairiti ca vayamapi kadācidevaṃ kāruṇikapadavīmadhirokṣyāmastadā satyato munayo bhaviṣyāma iti manorājyayuktaiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10156: dharmasya dayāprayuktatvādatra dayāvīraśabdena dharmavīra evokta iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10159: sa rasaḥ dharmavīraśśānto vā saṃsṛṣṭālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭatvaṃ ca dhvaneryathā---
GK16andhvc3u:10164: jātapulakastathā tvaṃ parārthasampādanāya svaśarīradāna ita karuṇātiśayo 'nubhāvavibhāvasampadoddīpitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10167: yadi vā pathikānāṃ śyāmāyitaṃ duḥkhavaśena śyāmikā yebhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10169: abhinayaprayogarasikeṣu pathikasāmājakeṣu satsu mayūravṛndānāṃ prasāritagītānāṃ prakṛṣṭasāraṇānusārigītānāṃ tathā grīvārecakāya prasāritagrīvāṇāṃ nṛttaṃ śobhate /
GK16andhvc3u:10178: munibhirapi jātaspṛhairavalokitānītyanena dayāvīrasya paripoṣapratītyā virodhasyānugrāhakatvaṃ spaṣṭamiti manasi kṛtya samāsoktestadupapādayati--samāsoktimahimnetyādi
GK16andhvc3u:10205: evaṃ dhvaneḥ prabhedāḥ prabheda-bhedāś ca kena śakyante /
GK16andhvc3u:10206: saṅkhyātuṃ diṅ-mātraṃ teṣām idam uktam asmābhiḥ // DhvK_3.44 //
GK16andhvc3u:10207: evaṃ dhvaneḥ prabhedāḥ prabhedabhedāśca kena śakyante /
GK16andhvc3u:10209: anantā hi dhvaneḥ prakārāḥ sahṛdayānāṃ vyutpattaye teṣāṃ diṅmātraṃ kathitam /
GK16andhvc3u:10210: ity ukta-lakṣaṇo yo dhvanir vivecyaḥ prayatnataḥ sadbhiḥ
GK16andhvc3u:10211: sat-kāvyaṃ kartuṃ vā jñātuṃ vā samyag abhiyuktaiḥ // DhvK_3.45 //
GK16andhvc3u:10213: satkāvyaṃ kartuṃ vā jñātu vā samyagabhiyuktaiḥ // 45 //
GK16andhvc3u:10214: uktasvarūpadhvaninirūpaṇanipuṇā hi satkavayaḥ sahṛdayāśca niyatameva locanam sandehāspadatvena saṅkīrṇābhyāmabhinayaprayoge,
GK16andhvc3u:10215: abhinavaprayoge ca rasikeṣviti prasāritagītānāmiti yaḥ śabdaśaktyudbhavasta saṃsargamātramanugrāhyatvābhāvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:10216: 'pahiasāmāiesu' ityatra tu pade saṅkīrṇābhyāṃ tābhyāmupamārūpakābhyāṃ śabdaśaktimūlasya dhvaneḥ saṅkīrṇatvamekavyañjakānupraveśāditi saṅkīrṇālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:10220: atha 'sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye' iti yatsūcitaṃ tadidānīṃ na śabdamātramapi tu nirvyūḍhamityāśayenāha--ityukteta /
GK16andhvc3u:10221: yaḥ prayatnato vivecyaḥ asmābhiścoktalakṣaṇo dhvaniretadeva kāvyatattvaṃ yathoditena
GK16andhvc3u:10224: 'ahiṇaa' ityasya abhinaya abhinava ityubhayathāpi cchāyeti darśayan dhvaniṃ darśayati--abhinayetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:10235: yathoditamityasya vyākartumityanena sambandha iti darśayan vivṛṇoti--yathoditenetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:10243: etaddhvanipravartanena nirṇītaṃ kāvyatattvamasphuṭasphuritaṃ sadaśaknuvadbhiḥ pratipādayituṃ vaidarbhī gauḍī pāñcālī ceti rītayaḥ pravartitāḥ
GK16andhvc3u:10244: rītilakṣaṇavidhāyināṃ hi kāvyatattvametadasphuṭatayā manāksphuritamāsāditi lakṣyate tadatra sphuṭatayā sampradarśitenānyena rītilakṣaṇenana kiñcit /
GK16andhvc3u:10249: asmin vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvavivecanamaye kāvyalakṣaṇe jñāte sati yāḥ kāścitprasiddhā
GK16andhvc3u:10254: yatra śabdānāmarthānāṃ ca keṣāñcitpratipattṛviśeṣasaṃvedyaṃ locanam pravartitā ityuttarakārikayā sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10261: yadāha--viśeṣo guṇātmā guṇāśca rasaparyavasāyina eveti hyuktaṃ prāgguṇanirūpaṇe 'śṛṅgāra eva madhuraḥ' ityatreti // 45// -46 //
GK16andhvc3u:10265: bālapriyā ityuktetyādikamekaṃ vākyamasphuṭetyādivākyāntaraṃ tatraitadityanena dhvaneḥ parāmarśaśceti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:10271: anubhavasiddhatvamiti vṛttau vakṣyamāṇaṃ phalitamarthaṃ manasikṛtya vivṛṇoti---anubhavetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:10272: jātyatvamiva ratnaviśeṣāṇāṃ cārutvamanākhyeyamavabhāsate kāvye tatra dhvanivyavahāra iti yallakṣaṇaṃ dhvanerucyate kenācittadayuktamiti nābhidheyatāmarhati
GK16andhvc3u:10275: arthānāṃ ca sphuṭatvenāvabhāsanaṃ vyaṅgyaparatvaṃ vyaṅgyāṃśaviśiṣṭatvaṃ ceti viśeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10276: tau ca viśeṣau vyākhyātuṃ śakyete vyākhyātau ca bahuprakāram /
GK16andhvc3u:10284: tathā--'vṛttayaḥ kāvyamātṛkāḥ' iti yaduktaṃ muninā tatra rasocita eva ceṣṭāviśeṣo vṛttiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10286: iyatā 'tasyābhāvaṃ jagadurapare' ityādābhāvavikalpeṣu 'vṛttayo rītayaśca gatāḥ śravaṇagocaraṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:10288: tatra kathañcidabhyupagamaḥ kṛtaḥ kathañcicca dūṣaṇaṃ dattamasphuṭasphuritamiti vacanena /
GK16andhvc3u:10289: idānīṃ vācāṃ sthitamaviṣaye' iti yadūce tattu prathamoddyote dūṣitamapi dūṣayat sarvaprapañcakathane hi asambhāvyamevānākhyeyatvamityabhiprāyeṇa
GK16andhvc3u:10296: kiñca rītipadavīmavatarantītyatra kāvyalakṣaṇajñānasya hetutvamapi durghaṭamityato 'nyathaivātra pāṭha ityāha--pratītipadavīmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:10299: ratnaviśeṣāṇāṃ jātyatvamiva pratipattṛviśeṣasaṃvedyaṃ yatra keṣāñcicchabdānāmarthānāṃ ca cārutvamanākhyeyamevāvabhāsata ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10302: cārutvaṃ nāma kaścidviśeṣa iti vaktavyamityabhipretya nābhidheyatāmarhatītyuktamupapādayati--'yata' ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:10313: prakāśamānatvaṃ tu yadanākhyeyatvamucyate kvacit tadapi kāvyaviśeṣāṇāṃ ratnāviśeṣāṇāmiva na sambhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:10318: sahṛdayā eva hi kāvyānāṃ rasajñā iti kasyātra vipratipattiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10319: yattvanirdeśyatvaṃ sarvalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ bauddhānāṃ prasiddhaṃ tattanmataparīkṣāyāṃ granthāntare nirūpayiṣyāmaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10320: iha tu granthāntaraśravaṇalavaprakāśanaṃ sahṛdayavaimanasyapradāyīti na prakriyate /
GK16andhvc3u:10321: bauddhamatena vā yathā pratyakṣādilakṣaṇaṃ tathāsmākaṃ dhvanilakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GK16andhvc3u:10324: sāmānyasparśī yo vikalpastato yaḥ śabdaḥ dṛṣṭānte 'pi anākhyeyatvaṃ nāstīti darśayati--ratnaviśeṣāṇāṃ ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:10329: evaṃ hi sarvabhāvavṛttāntatulya eva dhvaniriti dhvanisvarūpamanākhyeyamityativyāpakaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10330: granthāntara iti viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ dharmottaryāṃ yā vivṛtiramunā granthakṛtā kṛtā tatraiva tadvyākhyātam /
GK16andhvc3u:10340: ratnaviśeṣāṇāṃ jātyatvādisāmānyasya sambhāvanayaiva mūlyaparikalpanāyā darśanāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10343: tadgranthāntare nirūpayiṣyāma ityuktyā sūcitamanirdeśyatvarūpalakṣaṇasya doṣaṃ darśayati--evaṃ hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:10352: kvacit granthe bhāva iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10353: tatpakṣe anākhyeyāṃśabhāvitvamiti śloke tasyoktameva dhvanilakṣaṇaṃ sādhīyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10360: anākhyeyāṃśasyābhāso vidyate yasmin kāvye tasya bhāvastanna lakṣaṇaṃ dhvaneriti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10363: anyastu 'nirvācyārthatayā' ityatra niso nañarthatvaṃ parikalpyānākhyeyāṃśabhāsitve 'yaṃ heturiti vyācaṣṭe,
GK16andhvc3u:10387: āsūtritānāṃ bhedānāṃ samyaksūtrairnirdiṣṭānāṃ dhvanyādibhedarūpāṇāṃ kāvyavāṇīnāṃ yā sphuṭatāpattiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10392: śubhamastu sarvaṃ śivam iti śrīrāmaśārakaracitāyāṃ locanaṭippaṇyāṃ tṛtīya uddyotaḥ //
